vt. 追逐；追捕；试图赢得；雕镂 vi. 追逐；追赶；奔跑 n. 追逐；追赶；追击 同义词:go after, track down, pursue, go after, pursuit, hunting The children are chasing one another among the bushes.孩子们在树丛中互相追逐。
adj. 便宜的；小气的；不值钱的 adv. 便宜地 同义词:inexpensive, ten-cent I was very lucky to get it so cheap .我这么便宜地买到它，真是幸运极了。
vt. 欺骗；骗取 vi. 欺骗；作弊 n. 欺骗，作弊；骗子 同义词:sell, fox, kid, kid, pull a fast one, fraud, sharp, deception You've been cheated.你受骗了。
vi. 核对无误；将军（象棋）；证明无误 vt. 检查；制止；寄存 n. 支票；阻止；阻止物 同义词:examine, inspect, review, park, prevention, cheque He checked his horse sharply.他猛然把马勒住。
n. 面颊，脸颊；臀部 vt. 无礼地向…讲话，对…大胆无礼 同义词:bottom, vizard How could a student cheek his teacher like this?一个学生怎么能对老师这样无礼地讲话?
vt. 欢呼；使高兴；为…加油 n. 欢呼；愉快；心情；令人愉快的事 vi. 欢呼；感到高兴 同义词:please, glad, satisfy, sunshine, breast, applause, brightness, hurray The movie star was warmly cheered as he got on the stage.这位影星登上舞台时受到人们的热烈欢呼。
adj. 快乐的；愉快的；高兴的 同义词:happy, pleased, glad, good, bright His life was hard , but Dick was always cheerful .迪克的生活虽然艰苦，但他始终很快乐。

n. [食品] 奶酪；干酪；要人 vt. 停止 adj. 叛变的；胆小的 同义词:personage, fromage, quit, cease from, desist from, come to a stop, to stop, timid, scary Milk , butter , and cheese are shipped here from the dairy farms .牛奶、黄油和奶酪都是各个制酪场运到这里来的。
n. 化学制品，化学药品 adj. 化学的 同义词:chymic It requires chemical signals from sorghum seeds to grow .它的生长需要高粱种子的化学信号。
n. 化学家；药剂师 同义词:pharmacist, dispenser They found the answer in chemist structure of plastic itself .他们发现答案其实在塑料的结构本身上。
n. 化学；化学过程 同义词:chymist, chemical process These were put together by normal chemistry .这些都是用普通化学做到的。
n. 支票 同义词:check I hope this cheque doesn't bounce .我希望这张支票别遭退票。
n. 樱桃；樱桃树；如樱桃的鲜红色；处女膜，处女 同义词:hymen, virginal membrane You might even choose your flavor - cherry or strawberry , for example .你或许还能选择口味——比如樱桃或草莓味的。
n. 国际象棋，西洋棋 同义词:checkers Do you know all the moves in chess ?你知道国际象棋的所有走法吗?。
n. 胸，胸部；衣柜；箱子；金库 同义词:bureau, treasury, breast The knife penetrated his chest .刀子穿过他的胸腔。
n. 咀嚼；咀嚼物 vt. 嚼碎，咀嚼 vi. 细想，深思 同义词:mastication, quid, masticate, consider, pore, reflect You must chew your food well before you swallow it.你必须先把食物嚼碎再咽下去。

n. 鸡肉；小鸡；胆小鬼，懦夫 adj. 鸡肉的；胆怯的；幼小的 同义词:sheep, chucky, small, baby She promised to climb up the perilous peak along with us the next day,but she chickened out at the last moment.她答应第二天和我们一道去攀登险峰，但到时候却不敢去了。

n. 首领；酋长；主要部分 adj. 首席的；主要的；主任的 adv. 主要地；首要地 同义词:leader, captain, boss, primary, major, central, leading, great, mainly, basically, largely, mostly, primarily And many Republicans criticize the Fed chief -- himself a Republican -- for what they see as too much spending .很多共和党人批评联邦领袖自己也是个共和党人--他们知道的大量的花费。
n. 童年时期；幼年时代 I had no family , no memories , no childhood .我没有家人，没有记忆，没有童年。
adj. 幼稚的，孩子气的 同义词:tender, puerile Someone thinks my interest in children's literature is childish .有人认为我对儿童文学的兴趣是幼稚。
n. 寒冷；寒意；寒心 adj. 寒冷的；冷漠的；扫兴的 vt. 冷冻，冷藏；使寒心；使感到冷 vi. 冷藏；变冷 同义词:cold, algor, cold, distant, refrigerate I want this beer to chill so I'll leave it in the fridge for an hour.我想要啤酒变凉，因此我把它放在冰箱里一小时。
n. 烟囱 同义词:smoke stack, lum OK . Santa Claus comes down from chimney and puts presents in our stockings .好的。圣诞老人会从烟囱下来把礼物放到我们的长筒袜里。
n. 下巴；聊天；引体向上动作 vt. 用下巴夹住；与…聊天；在单杠上作引体向上动作 vi. 闲谈；作引体向上动作 同义词:chat, jaw, visit, dish A couple of old women were chinning in the corner.几个老太婆在角落里聊天。
n. 瓷器 adj. 瓷制的 同义词:porcelain ware, stoneware, porcelain China hit back over the weekend .中国上周末进行了反击。
n. 巧克力，巧克力糖；巧克力色 adj. 巧克力色的；巧克力口味的 The best was the chocolate cake .最好吃的就是巧克力蛋糕。
n. 选择；选择权；精选品 adj. 精选的；仔细推敲的 同义词:chose, selection, option, election, pick, picked, select, chosen You have your choice between the two .在这两个之中，你有选择权。
vt. 呛；使窒息；阻塞；抑制；扑灭 vi. 窒息；阻塞；说不出话来 n. 窒息；噎；[动力] 阻气门 同义词:control, stay, restrain, plug up, block up, asphyxia, apnea The smoke almost choked me.烟呛得我几乎透不过气来。
vt. 选择，决定 vi. 选择，挑选 同义词:condition, conclude, opt for, to make a choice Choose your friends carefully.选择朋友要慎重。
n. 砍；排骨；商标；[网]削球 vt. 剁碎；砍 (俚)丑人 同义词:brand, label, logo, cut, hew, hew Chop some wood for the fire.给炉子劈点木柴来。
n. 基督徒，信徒 adj. 基督教的；信基督教的 All of the schools are Christian .所有的学院学生都是基督徒。
n. 圣诞节 We give gifts to our friends and family at Christmas .我们在圣诞节给我们的朋友和家人礼物。
n. 香烟；纸烟 同义词:coffin nail Good evening , sir . Do you have anything to declare ? Any cigarette , perfume , liquor ?晚上好，先生。您有需要申报的东西吗？香烟，香水，酒？
n. 电影；电影院；电影业，电影制作术 同义词:film, motion picture How about going to cinema ?去电影院怎么样？
n. [电子] 电路，回路；巡回；一圈；环道 vi. 环行 vt. 绕回…环行 同义词:electrocircuit, contour, round There will soon be a new bus route circuiting the old city.围绕着这座古城不久将有一条新的公共汽车环行线。

adj. 循环的；圆形的；间接的 n. 通知，传单 同义词:indirect, cyclic, rounded, notice, advice, information The altar bore a circular mirror in an ornately carved wooden frame : an emblem of Shinto worship .祭坛上有一面用精致雕刻木框镶嵌的镜子，是日本神教信仰的象征。
vi. 传播，流传；循环；流通 vt. 使循环；使流通；使传播 同义词:spread abroad, to disseminate, cycle Traffic circulates in the streets of a city.车辆和行人在市内街上川流不息。
n. 圆周；周长；胸围 同义词:periphery, chest/bust One way is by making muscles larger in circumference and hence heavier in mass.一个方法是依靠增加肌肉的周长在整体上增强力量。
n. 环境，情况；事件；境遇 同义词:context, situation, setting, event, occurrence, thing, scene In any circumstance where light is being absorbed , there is a pressure.在任何情况下，凡在光被吸收的地方，就有光压。
n. 公民；市民；老百姓 同义词:people, municipality It is one of legality construction contents to make citizen know and obey law .让公民懂得法律和遵守法律是法制建设的一项重要内容。
adj. 公民的；民间的；文职的；有礼貌的；根据民法的 同义词:folk, polite Yes . and every citizen enjoys the capacity for civil rights from birth to death .是的。每个公民从出生起到死亡止都享有民事权利能力。
n. 文明；文化 同义词:culture, kultur This simple experiment was not undoing the clock ; it was undoing civilization .这个简陋的实验并非在逆转时钟，而是在逆转文明。
vt. 使文明；教化；使开化 vi. 变得文明 同义词:to teach Schools will help to civilize the wild tribes there.学校教育将有助于使那里的野蛮部落逐步开化。
vi. 提出要求 vt. 要求；声称；需要；认领 n. 要求；声称；索赔；断言；值得 同义词:exact, say, lack, desire, call for, requirement, do, assurance, need, desire Every citizen may claim the protection of the law.每个公民都可以要求受到法律的保护。
vi. 鼓掌，拍手；啪地关上 vt. 拍手，鼓掌；轻轻拍打某人 n. 鼓掌；拍手声 同义词:plaud, handclap They clapped their hands to welcome him.他们鼓掌欢迎他。
vt. 澄清；阐明 vi. 得到澄清；变得明晰；得到净化 同义词:illustrate, elucidate Can you clarify this long sentence?你能把这个长句子解释清楚吗?
n. 扣子，钩子；握手 vt. 紧抱；扣紧；紧紧缠绕 vi. 扣住 同义词:handshake, shake-hands, press, button, buckle, button up She clasped a bracelet round her wrist.她将手镯戴在手腕上。
adj. 古典的；经典的；传统的；第一流的 n. 古典音乐 同义词:traditional, conventional, royal, classic music Yes , I like classical music .是的，我喜欢古典音乐。
n. 分类；类别，等级 同义词:category, degree, grade, rate, rank The new approach could help make such classification routine .这种新方法可促进此种归类方式的普及。
vt. 分类；分等 同义词:categorize, sort through He says the administration decision to re- classify those documents is symptomatic of a larger , growing problem .他说将档案重新分类处理的行政决定是问题更严重，不断扩大的一种前兆。
n. 同班同学 I have a new classmate . She 's a girl !我有一位新同学。她是一个女孩子！
n. 教室 同义词:schoolroom, teaching room We have many pictures and crafts in our classroom .我们的教室里有许多图画和工艺品。
n. 爪；螯，钳；爪形器具 vi. 用爪抓（或挖） vt. 用爪抓（或挖） 同义词:talon, unguis to claw a hole用爪挖洞
n. [土壤] 粘土；泥土；肉体；似黏土的东西 vt. 用黏土处理 同义词:earth, flesh, dirt It is also important to dry the clay containers slowly .缓慢的干燥粘土容器也是十分重要的。

adj. 清洁的，干净的；清白的 vt. 使干净 vi. 打扫，清扫 adv. 完全地 n. 打扫 同义词:pure, sanitary, do out, rid up, totally, entirely, completely, absolutely, thoroughly, strictly, fully, dusting, sweep She only cleaned one of the bedrooms in the whole morning.整个上午她只打扫了一间卧室。

adj. 清楚的；清澈的；晴朗的；无罪的 vt. 通过；清除；使干净；跳过 vi. 放晴；变清澈 adv. 清晰地；完全地 n. 清除；空隙 同义词:distinct, liquid, fair, fine, crystal, track, jump, totally, entirely, completely, absolutely, thoroughly, strictly, fully, removel, liquidation The rain cleared the air, and the grass smelt fresh and sweet.雨水使空气变得洁净，青草发出清新芬芳的气味。
adv. 清晰地；明显地；无疑地；明净地 同义词:obviously, easily, no doubt, broadly The rain cleared the air, and the grass smelt fresh and sweet.雨水使空气变得洁净，青草发出清新芬芳的气味。
n. 职员，办事员；店员；书记；记帐员 vi. 当销售员，当店员 同义词:secretary, office staff Three years ago he clerked in a bank.三年前他在一家银行里当职员。
adj. 聪明的；机灵的；熟练的 同义词:intelligent, experienced, wise, skilled, smart The queen was a very clever woman .皇后是个非常聪明的女人。
n. 悬崖；绝壁 同义词:precipice, escarpment The true dips are commonly observed in quarry faces, cuttings and cliff etc .在采场面，断面和断崖等面上人们常看到真倾角。
n. 气候；风气；思潮；风土 同义词:weather, terroir The climate there is tropical .那里的气候是炎热的。
vi. 爬；攀登；上升 vt. 爬；攀登；上升 n. 爬；攀登 同义词:arise, raise, scale, scale, come up, escalade The old lady climbed up the stairs with difficulty.这位老太婆艰难地爬上楼梯。
n. 斗蓬；宽大外衣；托词 vt. 遮掩；隐匿 同义词:subterfuge, cloke, overcurtain, obscure She was cloaked in red silk.她披着红丝斗篷。
adv. 紧密地；接近地；严密地；亲近地 同义词:hard, cheek by jowl Pandora closely behind.潘多拉紧跟其后。
vt. 给…穿衣；覆盖；赋予 同义词:dress, invest, put, house, sheet He clothed himself in his best clothes.他穿上最好的衣服。
n. 线索；（故事等的）情节 vt. 为…提供线索；为…提供情况 同义词:action, plot, scenario Nobody clued us to this mystery.没有人向我们提供解开这个奥秘的线索。
adj. 笨拙的 同义词:awkward, inept But it was a clumsy one.但这是一个笨拙的内阁。
n. 教练；旅客车厢；长途公车；四轮大马车 vt. 训练；指导 vi. 作指导；接受辅导；坐马车旅行 同义词:drilling, mentors, discipline, supervise He is now being coached by a famous pianist.他现在正由一位著名的钢琴家进行辅导。
vi. 上煤；加煤 vt. 给…加煤；把…烧成炭 n. 煤；煤块；木炭 同义词:char, charcoal, xylanthrax Coaling a ship is a dirty job.给轮船装煤是很脏的活。
adj. 粗糙的；粗俗的；下等的 同义词:crude, rough, low, inferior, lower Nematode damage to the soybean roots is characterized by coarse roots .线虫破坏大豆根系的特征是：根系粗糙。
vi. 滑行；沿岸航行 vt. 沿…岸航行 n. 海岸；滑坡 同义词:taxi, rivage, seacoast The sledge coasted down the mountain slope.雪橇滑下山坡。
n. 公鸡；龙头；雄鸟；头目 vt. 使竖起；使耸立；使朝上 vi. 翘起；竖起；大摇大摆 同义词:rooster, coq, peak, stick up, tilt The man cocked his hat in the latest fashion.这个男人按照最近时兴的方式歪戴着帽子。
n. 代码，密码；编码；法典 vt. 编码；制成法典 vi. 指定遗传密码 同义词:password, cryptogram, encode to code a telegram将电报译成密码
n. 咖啡；咖啡豆；咖啡色 同义词:caffe Not even for a cup of coffee .就算连一杯咖啡钱也不出的。
vt. 盘绕，把…卷成圈 n. 线圈；卷 vi. 成圈状 同义词:entwine, book, volume, roll, winding, wreathe He coiled the rope on the deck.他在甲板上把绳子绕好。
vt. 铸造（货币）；杜撰，创造 n. 硬币，钱币 同义词:invent, to create, piece, specie The mint is coining pennies.造币厂正在铸造每枚价值一便士的硬币。
vi. 倒塌；瓦解；暴跌 vt. 使倒塌，使崩溃；使萎陷 n. 倒塌；失败；衰竭 同义词:founder, fall in, crumple up, failure, loss, losing, defeat, reverse The roof collapsed.屋顶倒塌了。
n. 衣领；颈圈 vt. 抓住；给…上领子；给…套上颈圈 同义词:neck, grasp, noble She collared my black wool coat with otter pelts.她把我的黑呢上衣镶上了水獭领。
n. 同事，同僚 同义词:brother, fellow, associate Colleague : 19 candles ? What did you do, burn them at both ends ?同事：19支？有没有搞错，难道每支蜡烛两头烧吗？
vt. 收集；募捐 vi. 收集；聚集；募捐 adv. 由收件人付款地 adj. 由收件人付款的 同义词:gather in, assemble, concentrate, mass, crowd Will you collect all the students to the classroom?您把全体学生召集到教室中好吗?
n. 采集，聚集；[税收] 征收；收藏品；募捐 同义词:clustering, gather He also has many dreams in his collection .他的收藏中也有许多的梦想。

adj. 集体的；共同的；集合的；集体主义的 n. 集团；集合体；集合名词 同义词:mutual, corporate, common, joint, bloc, clan Still collective effort of the states is already beginning to compensate for the lack of reductions by the Bush administration .不过，美国各州的努力全部加起来，已经使得布希政府没有降低排放量的情形有所补偿。
n. 大学；学院；学会 同义词:university, academy, campus, school You know what I hate most about college life ?你知道我最讨厌的大学生活是什么？
n. （意见，看法）的抵触，冲突 同义词:interference, conflict, war, crash, impact The other process of droplet growth is by collision and coalescence .云滴增长的另一个过程是各云滴间的碰撞和并合。
n. 陆军上校 The new UN presence there is meant in part to get the gangs to react , says Colonel Magno .马格诺上校表示，联合国的初来乍到某种程度上会激起这些团伙的反抗。
n. 殖民地；移民队 同义词:settlements Experts gave a name to this mysterious situation , colony collapse disorder .专家给这种神秘的状况取名“蜂群衰竭失调症候”。
n. 颜色；肤色；颜料；脸色 vt. 粉饰；给...涂颜色；歪曲 vi. 变色；获得颜色 同义词:paint, farbe, sugar, prettify, discolor What color is this bird ?这只鸟是什么颜色的？
n. 纵队，列；专栏；圆柱，柱形物 同义词:pillar, tier This column leans towards the instrumental approach .本专栏倾向于工具主义方法。
n. 梳子；蜂巢；鸡冠 vt. 梳头发；梳毛 vi. （浪）涌起 同义词:crista galli, cockscomb, upsurge If you combed your hair more often you wouldn't look so untidy.如果你勤梳着点你的头发，就不会显得那么邋遢了。
n. 结合；组合；联合；[化学] 化合 同义词:combined with, alliance, unity, union, association On its face , that seems an odd combination .表面上，这似乎是个古怪的结合。
vt. 使化合；使联合，使结合 vi. 联合，结合；化合 n. 联合收割机；联合企业 同义词:bond, associate, band, bond, couple, become one, connect, integrated works, Konzern We shall combine the three departments.我们将合并这三个部门。
n. 安慰；舒适；安慰者 vt. 安慰；使（痛苦等）缓和 同义词:relief, ease, consolation, quiet, soothe Her mother's word comforted the sobbing girl.她母亲的话使这个哭哭啼啼的女孩得到慰藉。
adj. 舒适的，舒服的 n. 盖被 同义词:pleasant, easy, cozy Very comfortable and quiet .很舒服，也很安静。

vi. 命令，指挥；控制 vt. 命令，指挥；控制；远望 n. 指挥，控制；命令；司令部 同义词:order, control over, require, possess, regulate, order, contain, instruction, control, headquarters, bidding, order He commanded the soldiers to shut the gate.他命令士兵们把大门关上。
n. 指挥官；司令官 同义词:comandante, sardar The US commander there says if he needs more he will ask for more .那儿的美军司令官说如果需要的话他将请求更多的部队。

n. 评论；意见；批评 vi. 发表评论；发表意见 vt. 为…作评语 同义词:opinion, criticism, mind, judgement, thinking, declare oneself, air one's opinion Would you care to comment on why you voted against the new housing project?对您投票反对新住宅规划的原因您愿意解释一下吗?

n. 贸易，商业 同义词:trade, traffic Especially in the prevailing political climate , they will be designed in order to strike political compromises rather than free up commerce .尤其是在当前主流政治气候下，它们的制定将是为了达成政治妥协而非让贸易自由化。
adj. 商业的；营利的；靠广告收入的 n. 商业广告 同义词:merchant The outlines of such a commercial software are pretty clear .这样一个商业软件的轮廓是相当清晰的。
n. 委员会；佣金；犯；委任；委任状 vt. 委任；使服役；委托制作 同义词:council, soviet, brokerage, authorization, depute, authorise They commissioned an architect to design the new library.他们委托一位建筑师设计这座新图书馆。
vt. 犯罪，做错事；把...交托给；指派…作战；使…承担义务 同义词:sin, do sth. wrong The old man committed his will to the care of the lawyer.老人把他的遗嘱委托律师保管。
n. 委员会 同义词:council, soviet The entire committee will talk over the proposal .全体委员会将要讨论这项建议。
adj. 共同的；普通的；一般的；通常的 n. 普通；平民；公有地 同义词:mutual, corporate, usual, ordinary, collective, ordinary, populace Even a common indoor plant can improve the feeling of a room .即便一种普普通通的室内植物也能提高室内感觉。
adv. 一般地；通常地；普通地 同义词:currently, normally, generally But farmers commonly use futures as a way to protect against low crop prices .但是农民们通常使用期货作为一种方法来保护农作物的低价格。
vi. 通讯，传达；相通；感染 vt. 传达；感染；显露 同义词:contract, intercommunicate, affect, catch, contract, convey Shool children often communicate colds to each other.学校的孩子们常常互相传染感冒。
n. 通讯，[通信] 通信；交流 同义词:telecommunications, exchange We want to talk about the creative aspect of communication .我们想谈论的是沟通富有创造性的方面。
n. 共产主义 I want to point out that Sharism is not Communism , nor Socialism .我要指出分享主义不是共产主义，也不是社会主义。
n. 共产党员；共产主义者 adj. 共产主义的 Realistically , though , there is zero risk of a military coup in Canada while China is a communist dictatorship .但在现实中，加拿大发生军事政变的风险为零，而中国是共产党专政国家。
n. 社区；[生态] 群落；共同体；团体 同义词:village, organization, body, group What makes it a community is ultimately in- person meetings .正是亲身的会面最终形成了一个社区。
n. 同伴；朋友；指南；手册 vt. 陪伴 同义词:friend, guide, fellow, manual, notebook, attend, keep company They companioned the visitors to the classroom他们陪着来宾到教室去。

n. 公司；陪伴，同伴；连队 vi. 交往 vt. 陪伴 [ 复数companies 过去式companied 过去分词companied 现在分词companying ] 同义词:corporation, establishment, firm, incorporation, travel, associate, sort, mix, attend, accompany May smooth sailing company your journey.祝你旅途一帆风顺。
adj. 比较的；相当的 n. 比较级；对手 同义词:corresponding, condign, equal, opponent, match, rival In poor rural areas , owning a bicycle is a sign of comparative wealth .在贫穷的农村地区， 有辆自行车就是比 较富裕的象征。
vt. 比较；对照；比喻为 vi. 比较；相比 n. 比较 同义词:contradistinguish, be confronted with, match, parabole Compare this new TV set with the old one, you will see which is better.将这台新电视机与旧电视机一比，你就会看出哪一台更好一些。
n. 比较；对照；比喻；比较关系 同义词:parabole, imagery She is right : comparison , football is only a game .她是对的：相比之下，足球只是一种游戏。
n. 指南针，罗盘；圆规 vt. 包围 同义词:calliper, divider, case, invest, circumvent, encircle, ring about Their ship was compassing the earth.他们的船正围绕着地球环行。
vt. 强迫，迫使；强使发生 同义词:pressure, force, enforce They were often compelled to work eleven or twelve hours a day.他们常常被迫每天工作十一二个小时。
vi. 竞争；比赛；对抗 同义词:contest, war, cope About 800 athletes competed in fifteen events.大约有800名运动员参加了15个项目的竞赛。
adj. 胜任的；有能力的；能干的；足够的 同义词:able, capable, efficient, sufficient, adequate He is a highly competent teacher .他是一个十分称职的教师。
n. 竞争；比赛，竞赛 同义词:game, war, match, tournament, struggle The speaker claims that competition teaches inferior enterprises how to survive and develop .发言人称竞争教会了较差的企业如何去生存与发展。
vt. 编译；编制；编辑；[图情] 汇编 同义词:to edit, copy-edit It often takes five or six years of hard work to compile a good dictionary.编一部好的词典常常需要苦干五六年。
vi. 投诉；发牢骚；诉说 vt. 抱怨；控诉 同义词:whine about, beef, beef about, rail against She is always complaining.她整天发牢骚。
n. 抱怨；诉苦；疾病；委屈 同义词:sickness, complain of The most common complaint centres on foreign policy .最常见的抱怨集中在其外交政策上。
adj. 完整的；完全的；彻底的 vt. 完成 同义词:whole, thorough, full, absolute, total, accomplish, carry out, achieve, perform, fulfil Her medical course was completed ahead of time.她的医学课程提前完成了。

adv. 完全地，彻底地；完整地 同义词:entirely, totally, thoroughly, fully, absolutely, strictly, perfectly The report does say basic math skills must be taught completely in the early years of school .报告并没有说基本的数学技巧一定要在上学早期就完全教给学生。

adj. 复杂的；合成的 n. 复合体；综合设施 同义词:sophisticated, involved, synthetic, detailed, intricate Predictions about a mechanism as complex as the climate cannot be made with any certainty .对某种机制的预测就像不能作出任何肯定的气候预测一样复杂。
vt. 使复杂化；使恶化；使卷入 同义词:aggravate, exacerbate You mustn’t complicate the problem by raising new issues.你千万不要提出新的争端使问题更加复杂化。
adj. 难懂的，复杂的 同义词:involved, detailed, sophisticated, elusive You mustn’t complicate the problem by raising new issues.你千万不要提出新的争端使问题更加复杂化。
adj. 组成的，构成的 n. 成分；组件；[电子] 元件 同义词:constituent, module, element, constituent Cannot perform this operation on a component without a site .如果没有站点，将不能在组件上执行此操作。
vt. 构成；写作；使平静；排…的版 vi. 组成；作曲；排字 同义词:constitute, form, structure, calm, write, consist, make up England, Scotland and Wales compose the island of Great Britain.英格兰、苏格兰和威尔士组成大不列颠岛国。
n. 作文，作曲；[材] 构成；合成物 同义词:synthetic, songwriting He crossed off the needless words in his composition .他从作文中把不必要的字都删掉了。

vt. 合成；混合；和解妥协；搀合 vi. 和解；妥协 n. [化学] 化合物；混合物；复合词 adj. 复合的；混合的 同义词:synthetise, mix together, make it up, make peace with someone, mixture, hybrid, mix, mixed, hybrid He compounded water, sand and soil and formed bricks.他将水、沙和土掺和一起做成砖。
n. 理解；包含 同义词:containing, grasp, understanding, involved in, involvement I did practice a lot , like doing lots of reading comprehension exercises every day .我做了很多练习，每天做很多好像阅读理解这类的练习。
adj. 综合的；广泛的；有理解力的 n. 综合学校；专业综合测验 同义词:extensive, integrated, synthetic, widespread, general We have a rather comprehensive subway system here .我们这儿有相当广泛的地铁系统。
vi. 受压缩小 vt. 压缩，压紧；精简 同义词:impact, pack Wood cuttings and sawdust can be compressed into boards.木头的碎渣和锯末可以压成木板。
vt. 包含；由…组成 同义词:involve, contain The committee comprises men of widely different views.该委员会包括了具有各种不同意见的人。
vt. 妥协；危害 vi. 妥协；让步 n. 妥协，和解；折衷 同义词:harm, meet someone halfway, meet someone halfway, come to terms with, accommodation, reconciliation He refused to compromise his principles.他对他的原则寸步不让。
vt. 计算；估算；用计算机计算 vi. 计算；估算；推断 n. 计算；估计；推断 同义词:cast, figure, figure, cast, calculation, estimation, appraisal, valuation, count Who can compute the distance of the moon from the earth?谁能计算出月球与地球的距离?
n. 计算机；电脑；电子计算机 同义词:calculating machine, computing machine My computer sends it all.我的计算机发送它。
n. 同志；伙伴 同义词:partner, mates Can you recommend a comrade who can take up the job ?你能不能推荐一位能承担这项工作的同志?。
vt. 隐藏；隐瞒 同义词:lock, pocket, to hide He concealed the key inside his tie.他把钥匙藏在领带里面。
vi. 集中；浓缩；全神贯注；聚集 vt. 集中；浓缩 n. 浓缩，精选；浓缩液 同义词:focus, collect, mass, crowd, centre, localise, compression, solidification You must concentrate all your energies on the study of English.你必须集中全力学习英语。
n. 浓度；集中；浓缩；专心；集合 同义词:thickness, compression, assembly, convergence, set They smuggled in some food for the comrades in the concentration camp .他们给集中营里的同志们偷偷送进去一些食物。
n. 观念，概念 同义词:idea, sense, notion, construct Indeed , the concept of free speech .的确，言论自由的概念。
vt. 涉及，关系到；使担心 n. 关系；关心；关心的事 同义词:deal with, to relate to, relationship, connection, attention, consideration, bearing This matter concerns all of us.这件事与我们每个人都有关系。
prep. 关于；就…而言 v. 涉及；使关心（concern的ing形式）；忧虑 同义词:about, as for, with reference to, in relation to, in respect of, involving, relating He heard nothing concerning this matter.关于这件事他什么都没听到。

n. 音乐会；一致；和谐 vt. 使协调；协同安排 vi. 协调；协力 adj. 音乐会用的；在音乐会上演出的 同义词:accordance, unity, agreement, identity, keeping, coordinate with, attune, cooperate, sort They were able to concert their difference.他们能商议调解他们之间的分歧。
vt. 推断；决定，作结论；结束 vi. 推断；断定；决定 同义词:understand, condition, deduce from, draw the conclusion They concluded the meeting at 6 o'clock in the afternoon.他们于下午六点结束了会议。

n. 结论；结局；推论 同义词:outcome, ending, consequence, verdict In conclusion , Indians can make wonderful , inexpensive employees provided you put them to the job they will do best in.综上所述，印度人能成为极好的廉价雇员，如果你安排他们工作，他们将做得最好。
adj. 混凝土的；实在的，具体的；有形的 vi. 凝结 vt. 使凝固；用混凝土修筑 n. 具体物；凝结物 同义词:honest, effective, real, to freeze, clot, coagulation The workmen are still busy concreting the road.工人们仍忙着用混凝土铺路。
vt. 谴责；判刑，定罪；声讨 同义词:denounce, deplore Most people condemn war.大多数人都谴责战争。
vi. 浓缩；凝结 vt. 使浓缩；使压缩 同义词:concentrate, to freeze, dewater, inspissate If steam touches cold surfaces, it is condensed into water.蒸气接触到冷的表面就凝结成水。
n. 条件；情况；环境；身份 vt. 决定；使适应；使健康；以…为条件 同义词:circumstance, situation, context, qualification, thing, adapt, suit, season, conclude She soon conditioned the children to the cold weather.她很快就使孩子们适应了寒冷的天气。
vi. 导电；带领 vt. 管理；引导；表现 n. 进行；行为；实施 同义词:lead through, manage, run, direct, represent, aim, going on, behavior, dealing, enforcement, administration He conducted himself in a gracious manner.他为人和蔼可亲。
n. 导体；售票员；领导者；管理人 同义词:leader, Moses, supervisor, administrator Yang Lihua . He 's a famous conductor in China .杨利华。他是一位著名的中国指挥家。
n. 会议；协商；讨论；[篮]联盟 This is a superlative conference .这是一个最高级会议。
vt. 承认；坦白；忏悔；供认 vi. 承认；坦白；忏悔；供认 同义词:accept, recognize, agree, acknowledge, grant, accept, recognize Now, I must confess that I'm at my wit's end.现在我必须承认我已毫无办法。
n. 信心；信任；秘密 adj. （美）诈骗的；骗得信任的 同义词:faith, trust, secret, privacy, hope Have you always lacked confidence ?您总是缺乏信心吗?。

adj. 自信的；确信的 同义词:sure, convinced, assured But we leave here today more confident and more united in the common effort of advancing security and prosperity for all of our people .但是，当我们今天离开此地时，我们更有信心，更加团结，决心为增进我们各国人民的安全和繁荣共同努力。
n. 界限，边界 vt. 限制；禁闭 同义词:boundary, border, block, set a limit to I wish you would confine yourself to the matter under discussion.希望你只谈目前我们正在讨论的问题。
vt. 确认；确定；证实；批准；使巩固 同义词:identify, favor, sustain, validate The experiment confirmed my theory.实验证实了我的理论。
n. 冲突，矛盾；斗争；争执 vi. 冲突，抵触；争执；战斗 同义词:interference, difference, war, battle, collision, combat, collide with The hours of those two exams conflict.那两门测验的钟点互有抵触。
vt. 使混乱；使困惑 同义词:cloud, discombobulate The two steps cannot be confused.这两个步骤不能搞混了。

n. 混淆，混乱；困惑 同义词:chaos, disorder, involvement, mix, turmoil Some of this confusion reflects a widespread misunderstanding about how China's integration into the world economy affects prices in the rich world .这些困惑反映了对于融入全球经济的中国如何影响发达国家的价格产生的世界范围内的误解。
vt. 祝贺；恭喜；庆贺 同义词:celebrate, felicitate I sent him a telegram, congratulating him on his success.我给他发去一个电报，祝贺他的成功。
n. 祝贺；贺辞 同义词:felicitation, gala Congratulation on your wedding , Rose .祝贺你们结婚了，柔斯。
n. 国会；代表大会；会议；社交 同义词:session, conversation, meeting, parliament The aversion of Congress to hard decisions is no small obstacle for the president .国会对难以决定的事项的厌恶对总统来说是一个不小的障碍。

n. 结合；[语] 连接词；同时发生 同义词:combination, coupling, bond, wedding, join Like any pursuit that relies on an ephemeral conjunction of conditions , information technology has taken some of the magic away .同任何其他依靠各种瞬间条件组合的嗜好一样，冲浪运动也已因为信息技术而丧失了几分神秘色彩。
vt. 连接；联合；关连 vi. 连接，连结；联合 同义词:couple, hand in hand, band, combine The two cities are connected by a railway.一条铁路连接起这两个城市。
n. 连接；关系；连接件 同义词:relationship, bearing, link, concern, junction Receipt of these cells at an endpoint indicates a fault along the path of the connection .在一个端点上接收到这些信元表明在连接的通道上存在着故障。
vt. 战胜，征服；攻克，攻取 vi. 胜利；得胜 同义词:defeat, master, overcome, win the day They conquered the southern part of the country in a few months.他们在几个月的时间里攻占了该国的南部。
n. 征服，战胜；战利品 同义词:prize, defeat, capture The legislation also applies to dating - simulation videogames , in which the goal is a graphic conquest .立法同样适用于模拟约会电玩，目的是为了在反黄色图片方面取得成绩。
n. 道德心，良心 In effect, he plans to give the machine a conscience .也就是说，雅金打算给予无人战斗机一个“良心”。
adj. 意识到的；故意的；神志清醒的 同义词:aware, intended, studied, designed They are conscious acceptors of culture from other country and active spreaders of it as well.外语教师既是异域文化自觉的接受者，又是异域文化主动的传播者。
n. 意识；知觉；觉悟；感觉 同义词:feel, aesthesia Other warning signs include losing consciousness or becoming dizzy and weak .其他警告信号还包括失去知觉或眩晕、虚弱乏力。
vi. 同意；赞成；答应 n. 同意；（意见等的）一致；赞成 同义词:grant, comply, engage, agreement, accordance, unity, identity, yes I'm sure she wouldn't consent.我敢肯定她不会答应的。
n. 结果；重要性；推论 同义词:outcome, product, result, significance, event, conclusion Its chief consequence is that they cannot do their job well.其主要后果是，它们不能做好自己的本职工作。

adv. 因此；结果；所以 同义词:therefore, hence, accordingly, thus, as a result of Consequently , the black mother , normally working as a domestic or nursemaid , was the family provider by default.结果，通常充当家庭佣人和保姆的黑人母亲们，就是不出场的家庭供养者。
n. 保存，保持；保护 同义词:preservation, protection, maintenance, lee, safeguard This highlights one of the biggest problems in forest conservation .这就突出了森林保护领域的一个最大的问题。
adj. 保守的 n. 保守派，守旧者 同义词:standpat, backward-looking, old guard, pontificator Even so , the report says the prediction of substantial damage by 2030 is conservative .虽然如此，报告还指出，对2030年破坏程度的预测是保守的。
vt. 考虑；认为；考虑到；细想 vi. 考虑；认为；细想 同义词:expect, find, guess, feel, view, allow, think about, pore You have to consider what to do next.你必须考虑下一步该做什么。
adj. 相当大的；重要的，值得考虑的 同义词:crucial, important, material, big, major That merchant stacked up considerable profits in a few months .那个商人在几个月内就积聚起大量利润。
adj. 体贴的；体谅的；考虑周到的 同义词:thoughtful, wary And Mr. Ralph is always considerate .拉尔夫先生总是考虑很周到。
n. 考虑；原因；关心；报酬 同义词:attention, compensation, payment, cause, matter After due consideration , he decided to accept the position .经过适当考虑后，他决定接受这位置。
vi. 组成；在于；符合 同义词:make up, be composed of Carbon dioxide consists of carbon and oxygen.二氧化碳是由碳和氧组成的。
adj. 始终如一的，一致的；坚持的 同义词:united, corresponding, uniform, matching, solid A simple and consistent set of endings indicates grammatical functions of words .一个简单的和一致的结局设置显示文字语法功能。
adj. 不变的；恒定的；经常的 n. [数] 常数；恒量 同义词:permanent, steady, invariable They face a constant battle to protect pockets of high profits and have few chances to grow .他们面临一场保护高额利润口袋持久的战斗，这些利润很少有机会增加。
n. 宪法；体质；章程；构造 同义词:formation, fabric, structure, build, make This is to ensure that no single party can later change constitution .这是为了确保没有单独的政党在将来能够改动宪法。
vt. 建造，构造；创立 n. 构想，概念 同义词:found, institute, frame, structure, father, concept, formulation, idea, notion Can we construct a model that balances innovation and responsibility ?我们能否创建一种平衡创新与责任的模式呢？
n. 建设；建筑物；解释；造句 同义词:interpretation, explanation, fabric, building, structure But most of the casinos are still under construction .然而大多数赌场的建设仍在进行中。
vt. 查阅；商量；向…请教 vi. 请教；商议；当顾问 同义词:look up, speak together, take advice, seek advice I have to consult the manager about the matter.关于这件事我得向经理请示一下。
vt. 消耗，消费；使…著迷；挥霍 vi. 耗尽，毁灭；耗尽生命 同义词:waste, to use up, peter, spend He had consumed the best years of his life in prison.他在狱中度过了他的大好年华。
n. 消费；消耗；肺痨 同义词:expense, depletion To push them up artificially would merely raise unemployment , which would depress consumption and imports still further .人为地推高工资只不过是提高了失业率，这将进一步降低消费和进口。
n. 接触，联系 vt. 使接触 vi. 联系，接触 同义词:touch, link, meet, to link When you contact these two wires, the machine will start at once.当你使这两条导线一接触，这台机器就会立刻开始运转。
vt. 包含；控制；容纳；牵制（敌军） vi. 含有；自制 同义词:involve, possess, regulate, manage, accept, restrain oneself, abstain The bowl contained a variety of fruit.这个碗里盛着各种各样的水果。
n. 集装箱；容器 同义词:vessel, pocket Cover the container with a clean piece of wood .在容器上盖上一块干净的木板。
n. 同时代的人；同时期的东西 adj. 当代的；同时代的；属于同一时期的 同义词:coeval, modern-day, cotemporary This play is the image of contemporary urban life .这个剧本是当代城市生活的生动写照。
n. 轻视，蔑视；耻辱 同义词:despite, defiance He interpreted . the silence as contempt .他把这沉默视为轻蔑。
n. 内容，目录；满足；容量 adj. 满意的 vt. 使满足 同义词:satisfaction, directory, bulk, list, fill, satisfactory, well-pleasing, gratify, appease Two glasses of beer contented him.两杯啤酒就使他心满意足了。
vt. 争辩；提出质疑 vi. 竞争；争辩 n. 竞赛；争夺；争论 同义词:argue against, chop logic, cope, rival, competition, match, combat The seat was being hotly contested among the politicians.政客们正在激烈地争夺那个席位。
n. 大陆，洲，陆地 adj. 自制的，克制的 同义词:mainland, earth, land, self-regulating, restrained Europe must become the " continent of choice" for talented researchers from around the globe .欧洲必须成为为全球的有才华的研究者提供支持的大陆。
adj. 持续不断的；频繁的 同义词:frequent Bill Venners : Continual learning is part of the notion of software craftsmanship ?比尔·凡纳斯：不断学习是软件工艺概念的一部分？
vi. 继续，延续；仍旧，连续 vt. 继续说…；使…继续；使…延长 同义词:run on, carry on with After a short break the play continued.经过短暂的休息以后，戏继续上演。
adj. 连续的，持续的；继续的；连绵不断的 The continuous transformation connects smoothly to the unit operator .连续变换光滑地衔接到单位算符。
vi. 收缩；感染；订约 vt. 感染；订约；使缩短 n. 合同；婚约 同义词:communicate, shrink, affect, catch, communicate, compact, engagement A hedgehog often contracts its body into a ball.刺猬常常把它的身体收缩成一个圆球。
n. 矛盾；否认；反驳 同义词:conflict, discrepancy This is the contradiction in the rescue plan .这就是本份援助计划的矛盾之处。

adj. 相反的；对立的 adv. 相反地 n. 相反；反面 同义词:opposite, adverse, counter, against, cross, counter, backward, conversely, inversely, inverse, verso If the Fed 's board has only four governors, the regional presidents will be in the majority — contrary to what the Fed's founders intended .如果美联储董事会只有四位成员，那么地方的联储主席将会占大多数——而这与联储缔造者的初衷相背离。
vi. 对比；形成对照 vt. 使对比；使与…对照 n. 对比；差别；对照物 同义词:parallel, distinction, differential When the synthetic is contrasted with the natural one, the difference is very apparent.把人工制品与天然品一比，其差别是很明显的。
vt. 贡献，出力；投稿；捐献 vt. 贡献，出力；投稿；捐献 同义词:make contribution, offer up, make contribution, offer up They contributed food and clothing for the refugees.他们向难民捐助了食物和衣服。

n. 控制；管理；抑制；操纵装置 vt. 控制；管理；抑制 同义词:governance, administration, management, supervision, checking, possess, manage, regulate, bottle, conduct The pressure of steam in the engine is controlled by this button.发动机中蒸汽的压力由这个按钮控制。
n. 便利；厕所；便利的事物 同义词:john, bathroom, toilet But efficacy , not convenience , should be the goal of policymakers .不过，政策制定者的目标应放在功效而非省事上。
adj. 方便的 同义词:commodious, expedient Selling stakes in profitable enterprises is a convenient way to raise money .出售盈利企业的股份是一种筹集资金的简便方法。
n. 大会；[法] 惯例；[计] 约定；[法] 协定；习俗 同义词:tradition, usage, institution, appointment, bond Have you been to that convention center before ?你以前去过那个会议中心吗？

adj. 符合习俗的，传统的；常见的；惯例的 同义词:traditional, usual, familiar, classical The vaccine works differently from conventional vaccines in that it does not prevent infection directly .这个疫苗作用方式不同于一般的疫苗，它并不会直接防止感染。
n. 交谈；会话；社交 同义词:congress, dialog They are really polite ways of ending a conversation .它们是很有礼貌的结束谈话的方法。
adv. 相反地 同义词:contrary, counter, backward, inversely Conversely , the same processes can actually amplify star formation in large galaxies .相反的，相同的过程在大型星系中却能增强恒星的形成。

n. 转换；变换；[金融] 兑换；改变信仰 同义词:transformation, reforming, switching, exchange, changing Oregon has one of the best wave climates for wave energy conversion anywhere in the world .俄勒冈拥有可以媲美世界上任何地方、并能转变称能源的海浪气候。
vt. 使转变；转换…；使…改变信仰 vi. 转变，变换；皈依；改变信仰 n. 皈依者；改变宗教信仰者 同义词:transform, shift, idolater, proselytizer Water is converted into steam if it is boiled.水沸腾时转化为蒸汽。
vt. 传达；运输；让与 同义词:communicate, release, transport This train conveys over one thousand passengers every day.这列火车每天运送一千多位旅客。
vt. 说服；使确信，使信服 同义词:assure, reason, satisfy, argue He convinced me of the difficulty of the work.他使我确信这件工作的艰巨性。
vt. 烹调，煮 vi. 烹调，做菜 n. 厨师，厨子 同义词:chef, kitchener She cooked her meals on a gas range.她在煤气灶上做饭。
vi. 合作，配合；协力 同义词:fit, work together Let's all cooperate to get the work done quickly.让我们通力合作使这项工作迅速完成。
n. 坐标；同等的人或物 adj. 并列的；同等的 vt. 调整；整合 vi. 协调 同义词:paratactic, tantamount, adjust, restructure, sort, concert You must coordinate the movements of your arms and legs when swimming.游泳时你必须使臂和腿的动作相协调。
vi. 处理；对付；竞争 n. 长袍 同义词:manage, contest, gown, robe They coped with each other for the prize.他们为了获得奖品而相互竞争。
n. 铜；铜币；警察 adj. 铜的 vt. 镀铜于 同义词:police, pig, cupreous Give papa a cup of proper coffee in a copper coffee cup .给爸爸一杯用铜制的咖啡杯盛的味道适宜的咖啡。
vi. 复制；复印；抄袭 vt. 复制；复印；抄袭 n. 副本；一册；摹仿 同义词:to duplicate, print off, repeat, lift, repeat, counterpart She immediately copied the letter in her notebook.她立即把这封信抄在她的笔记本里。
n. 绳索；束缚 vt. 用绳子捆绑 同义词:chain, restriction, rope to cord a trunk用绳子捆衣箱
adj. 热忱的，诚恳的；兴奋的 n. 补品；兴奋剂；甜香酒，甘露酒 同义词:genuine, heady, a shot in the arm, agonist It pleases her brother to see us cordial , and that pleases me .她哥哥看见我们和睦就高兴，这也使我高兴。
n. 核心；要点；果心；[计] 磁心 vt. 挖...的核 同义词:quick, kernel, main, heart, essential She cored the apples.她挖掉苹果的核。
n. （美）玉米；（英）谷物；[皮肤] 鸡眼 vt. 腌；使成颗粒 同义词:grain, zea mays, preserve to corn beef腌牛肉
n. 角落，拐角处；地区，偏僻处；困境，窘境 vi. 囤积；相交成角 vt. 垄断；迫至一隅；使陷入绝境；把…难住 同义词:region, area, difficulty, zone, section, stock, forestall, monopolize The police finally cornered the thief.警察最后把盗贼逼得走投无路。
n. 公司；法人（团体）；社团；大腹便便；市政当局 同义词:establishment, company, society, association, league A good example is the China Investment Corporation .最好的例子就是中国投资公司。
vt. 改正；告诫 vi. 调整；纠正错误 adj. 正确的；恰当的；端正的 同义词:rectify, admonish, adjust, adapt for, right, true, just The teacher returned to her room to correct exercise books.老师回到房间去改练习簿。
n. 改正，修正 同义词:modification, reform, rectification, revision, amendment Correction of a bug on the frequency of the monitor linked with the choice of the resolution .修正了一个关于监视器刷新频率上选择图形分辨率的错误。
vi. 符合，一致；相应；通信 同义词:cotton, identify, square, accord, meet with His actions do not correspond with his words.他的言行不一。
n. 通讯记者；客户；通信者；代理商行 同义词:client server software, client server relationship FALLING ill in Kazakhstan is often a dreadful experience , as correspondent can attest .在哈萨克斯坦生病是很可怕的经历，就如记者能证明的一样。

adj. 相当的，相应的；一致的；通信的 v. 类似（correspond的ing形式）；相配 同义词:united, consistent, comparative, solid, matching, suiting All that are needed to create a scaffold are a database table , its corresponding model and controller , and some conventions.创建一个脚手架所需要的东西包括一个数据库表，对应模型以及控制器，以及一些鬼测。
n. 走廊 同义词:hall, passage, gallery, verandah, slype Jack listens and exits out the corridor .杰克只好从命，离开了走廊。
vt. 花费；使付出；使花许多钱 n. 费用，代价，成本；损失 vi. 花费 同义词:invested, spend, expend, fee, charge, expense, price, losing It must cost a good deal to live here.住在这里一定要花很多钱的。
adj. 昂贵的；代价高的 同义词:expensive, rich, dear A year off , away from home , can be costly .一年时间，离开家的调整，需要花费很多。
n. 小屋；村舍；（农舍式的）小别墅 同义词:shed, cabin Why heterosexual men go cottaging or cruising baffles most people.大多数人对异性恋者像同性恋者一样在公共厕所聚集或四出猎艳感到迷惑不解。
n. 棉花；棉布；棉线 vi. 一致；理解；和谐；亲近 adj. 棉的；棉制的 同义词:algodon, Baumwolle, square, identify, coincide He could not cotton with the manager.他和经理相处不好。
n. 委员会；会议；理事会；地方议会；顾问班子 同义词:committee, session, congress, meeting, soviet All the candidate nations promised to work toward the aim of the new council .所有的候选国家都作出承诺，要朝着新理事会设立的目标而努力。
vt. 计算；认为 vi. 计数；有价值 n. 计数；计算；伯爵 同义词:figure, expect, guess, find, feel, calculation, computation, valuation She was counting her money.她正在数她的钱。

n. 计数器，计算器；柜台；计算者 adv. 相反地 v. 反击；反对 adj. 相反的 同义词:arithmometer, counting machine, contrary, backward, conversely, inversely, Break back, knock back, contrary, opposite, adverse, cross He countered my blow.他对我的强击进行还击。
n. 郡，县 同义词:prefecture, shire Cook County has high rates of poverty .当时库克郡的贫穷指数很高。
n. 过程；进程；道路；一道菜 vt. 追赶；跑过 vi. 指引航线；快跑 同义词:path, mechanism, process, way, road, pursue, chase after, double up The deer coursed the open field.这只鹿奔跑越过开阔的原野。
n. 法院；球场；朝廷；奉承 vt. 招致（失败、危险等）；向…献殷勤；设法获得 vi. 求爱 同义词:playfield, banc, invite, secure, spell, incur, woo He has been courting her for the last three months.在过去的三个月中他一直在向她求爱。
n. 堂兄弟姊妹；表兄弟姊妹 She is visiting her cousin Kitty .她来拜访她的表姐基蒂。
n. 懦夫，懦弱的人 adj. 胆小的，懦怯的 同义词:chicken, molly, timid, harehearted Why don't you come and tear me to pieces , you coward ?你为什么不来把我撕成碎片，你这个胆小的东西？

vt. 使破裂；打开；变声 vi. 破裂；爆裂 n. 裂缝；声变；噼啪声 adj. 最好的；高明的 同义词:fracture, open up, fracture, come apart at the seams, split, crevice, greatest, best, perfect, prime Don't pour hot water into the glass or it will crack.不要把热水倒入玻璃杯里，否则杯子会破裂。
n. 工艺；手艺；太空船 vt. 精巧地制作 同义词:technology, hand, ship, workmanship a carefully crafted story一个精心编造的故事
n. 吊车，起重机；鹤 vi. 伸着脖子看；迟疑，踌躇 vt. 用起重机起吊；伸长脖子 同义词:suspended ceiling, derrick, hesitate, stand at to crane up building material用起重机吊起建筑材料

n. 碰撞；崩溃；坠落 vt. 坠落；破碎；撞碎 vi. 碰撞；坠毁；闯；突然倒台 adj. 速成的 同义词:collision, precipitation, impact, fall of, fall to pieces, hit, impact on, quickie She crashed the glass angrily against the table.她愤怒地把玻璃杯摔碎在桌子上。
vi. 爬行；匍匐行进 vt. 爬行；缓慢地行进 n. 爬行；养鱼池；匍匐而行 同义词:creep, creep, aquarium A child learns to crawl before he learns to walk.小孩在学走路之前先学爬。
adj. 疯狂的；狂热的，着迷的 同义词:wild, possessed, mad, enthusiastic, insane The bond markets would go crazy otherwise .否则，债券市场将上演疯狂走势。
n. 奶油，乳脂；精华；面霜；乳酪 同义词:essence, elite, flower, prime, distillation Don't stir the milk until it creams.不要搅动牛奶，直到上面结皮。
vt. 创造，创作；造成 同义词:produce, invent Shakespeare created many comic characters.莎士比亚创作了很多喜剧人物。
adj. 创造性的 Well, you can take a creative writing course .你可以参加一门创作力写作课程。
n. 动物，生物；人；创造物 同义词:animal, biology, person Inside every solitary creature is a swarm of non- creature things .每一个单独的生物个体内都有一大群非生物的东西。
n. 信用，信誉；[金融] 贷款；学分；信任；声望 vt. 相信，信任；把…归给，归功于；赞颂 同义词:faith, reputation, honor, loan, confidence, put faith in, believe in I didn't credit that absurd tale.我不相信那个荒谬绝伦的故事。
vi. 爬行；蔓延；慢慢地移动；起鸡皮疙瘩 n. 爬行；毛骨悚然的感觉；谄媚者 同义词:to spread, to extend, toadeater, kiss-ass The tortoise crept along at a very slow speed.乌龟以极慢的速度向前爬。
n. 队，组；全体人员，全体船员 vi. 一起工作 vt. 使当船员 同义词:team, group, personnel, suit Will you crew for me in tomorrow's race?你愿意在明天的赛艇比赛中充当我赛艇上的队员吗?
n. 板球，板球运动；蟋蟀 同义词:Chinese Cricket, grig Specialist sports , such as cricket and golf , often include a lot of sporting jargon in the commentary .像板球和高尔夫这样的专业赛事中，解说词常常会包含许多专业术语。
n. 罪行，犯罪；罪恶；犯罪活动 vt. 控告……违反纪律 同义词:sin, evil, guilt We cannot extenuate your crime .我们不能减轻你的罪。
n. 罪犯 adj. 刑事的；犯罪的；罪恶的 同义词:offender, culprit, penal, peccant Even with new leadership , criminal - justice system is still in disarray .即使在新的领导班子下，刑事司法系统还是一团混乱。
vt. 削弱；使跛；使残废 n. 跛子；残废 adj. 跛的；残废的 同义词:break, to weaken, disablement, lameness, disabled, spavined He was crippled in the war.他在战争中成了跛子。
n. 危机；危险期；决定性时刻 adj. 危机的；用于处理危机的 同义词:defining moment, critical stage Such imbalances are at the root of crisis .这样的失衡正是如今这场危机的根源。
n. 批评家，评论家；爱挑剔的人 同义词:commenter, reviewer As a critic complained , his shops were like mousetraps .一个评论家抱怨，格伦设计的商店像是捕鼠器。
adj. 鉴定的；[核] 临界的；批评的，爱挑剔的；危险的；决定性的；评论的 同义词:dangerous, crucial, final, decisive, marginal The imagination imitates . It is the critical spirit that create .想象是模仿，批判的精神才具有创造力。
n. 批评；考证；苛求 同义词:comment, animadversion Criticism of the cuts has led in some places to efforts to give students more time for exercise , not less .对削减运动计划的批评导致一些地方经历给学生更多的运动时间，而不是减少。
vt. 批评；评论；非难 vi. 批评；评论；苛求 [ 过去式criticized 过去分词criticized 现在分词criticizing ] 同义词:observe on, to comment on, observe on, to comment on He openly criticized the plan as impracticable.他公开批评该计划不切实际。
n. 产量；农作物；庄稼；平头 vt. 种植；收割；修剪；剪短 vi. 收获 同义词:output, yield, plant, harvest, plant, shear, grow, gather, harvest, to harvest, get in They are cropping wheat.他们正在收割小麦。
vi. 啼叫；报晓 n. [鸟] 乌鸦；鸡鸣；撬棍 同义词:corbie, wrecking bar The rooster crows at dawn.公鸡在黎明时打鸣儿。

n. 群众,一伙;一堆,许多,大众 v. 拥挤,挤满,挤进 vt. 挤满,将...塞进;催促,催逼 vi. 挤,拥挤,聚集 同义词:burst at the seams, be packed with, lot, band, concentrate, pile, collect, mass, pack They crowded around the table to get their food.他们围着桌子领取食物。
n. 王冠；花冠；王权；顶点 vt. 加冕；居…之顶；表彰；使圆满完成 同义词:height, sky, summit, peak, lei, coronate, cite British kings are crowned in Westminster Abbey.英国国王都在威斯敏斯特教堂加冕。
adj. 粗糙的；天然的，未加工的；粗鲁的 n. 原油；天然的物质 同义词:rough, native, robust, raw, coarse Brent crude futures have fallen to 55 dollars a barrel .北海布伦特原油期货收于每桶55美元。
adj. 残酷的，残忍的；使人痛苦的 同义词:iron, brutal Without love a person could go hayward and also become cruel and ferocious .没有爱的人生可能会误入禁区，也会变得残酷而凶恶。
vt. 压碎；弄皱，变形；使…挤入 vi. 挤；被压碎 n. 粉碎；迷恋；压榨；拥挤的人群 同义词:crunch, become deformed, pile, crowd, pack, compression, comminution Don't crush this box; there are flowers inside.别把这个盒子压坏了，里面有花。
n. 外壳；面包皮；坚硬外皮 vi. 结硬皮；结成外壳 vt. 盖以硬皮；在…上结硬皮 同义词:outer housing, encloser Ice crusted the lake last night.湖面上昨夜结了一层冰。
n. 结晶，晶体；水晶；水晶饰品 adj. 水晶的；透明的，清澈的 同义词:Irish diamond, transparent, liquid, clear In the present representation this crystal would correspond to a parallel array of helices .在这种表示法中，晶体应相当于许多螺旋线的平行排列。
n. 立方；立方体；骰子 vt. 使成立方形；使自乘二次；量…的体积 同义词:solid, die Cube the apples before putting them in the pan.把苹果切成方块再放在盘子里。

adj. 立方体的，立方的 同义词:cuboid But in the most polluted cities in Asia , Latin America and Africa they could exceed 100 or even 200 micrograms per cubic metre .而在亚洲、拉丁美洲和非洲污染最严重的城市，每立方米微粒含量可能超过100微克甚至200微克。
n. 黄瓜；胡瓜 同义词:Chinese wampee, cuke And tomato and cucumber salad .西红柿和黄瓜沙位。
vt. 培养；陶冶；耕作 同义词:rear, foster, plant, nurse Millet is cultivated on some farms here.这里有些农场种小米。
n. 文化，文明；修养；栽培 vt. [细胞][微] 培养（等于cultivate） 同义词:civilization, planting, rear, foster, plant, nurse " It was an enormous culture shock , " she says.她说：“那是一种巨大的文化冲击。

adj. 狡猾的；巧妙的；可爱的 n. 狡猾 同义词:happy, lovely, designing, knowing, pretty, artfulness, subtility I know we had a nice boost over the last couple of days , but elections are cunning things .我知道在过去几天中，我们取得了一个漂亮的提升，但是选举是件有趣的事。
n. 碗柜；食橱 同义词:dresser, spense He foraged about in the cupboard .他在碗橱里到处寻找食物。
vt. 治疗；治愈；使硫化；加工处理 vi. 治病；痊愈；受治疗；被硫化；被加工处理 n. 治疗；治愈；[临床] 疗法 同义词:help, remedy, heal up, therapy, medical treatment His cough was nearly cured.他的咳嗽差不多全好了。
n. 好奇，好奇心；珍品，古董，古玩 同义词:treasure, pearl He went only out of curiosity .他仅仅是由于好奇心才去的。
adj. 好奇的，有求知欲的；古怪的；爱挑剔的 同义词:critical, odd Martin Fowler : It is curious thing .马丁：这是很有意思的一件事。
vt. 使…卷曲；使卷起来 vi. 卷曲；盘绕 n. 卷曲；卷发；螺旋状物 同义词:crisp, wave, wavy hair Her mother curled her hair every morning.她的母亲每天早晨给她卷头发。

adj. 现在的；流通的，通用的；最近的；草写的 n. （水，气，电）流；趋势；涌流 同义词:recent, now, universal, late, present, tendency, direction, tide, trend, set The excitation system should provide the appropriate field current at all times so that it is reliable and requires little maintenance .励磁系统在任何时候应能提供恰当的励磁电流，因此，励磁系统是可靠的和很少需要维修的。
n. 诅咒；咒骂 vt. 诅咒；咒骂 vi. 诅咒；咒骂 同义词:oath, anathema, drat, beshrew, swear at, Curse of Lola “Curse you,you ungrateful creature!”he cried in anger.“愿上帝惩罚你，你这个忘恩负义的东西!”他怒喊道。
n. 幕；窗帘 vt. 遮蔽；装上门帘 同义词:screen, window hangings, shadow, shield I have enough material to curtain all the windows.我有足够的料子把所有的窗户都挂上窗帘。
n. 曲线；弯曲；曲线球；曲线图表 vt. 弯；使弯曲 vi. 成曲形 adj. 弯曲的；曲线形的 同义词:give, winding, wind, bend, winding, flexural, crooked He curved the piece of wood.他把这块木头弯成弧形。
n. 垫子；起缓解作用之物；（猪等的）臀肉；银行储蓄 vt. 给…安上垫子；把…安置在垫子上；缓和…的冲击 同义词:gaddi, mat She cushioned her head against his shoulder.她把头靠在他的肩上。
n. 习惯；风俗；海关 adj. 定制的，定做的 同义词:manner, habit, way, made-to-order, tailored Local Muslim custom requires that the dead are buried within 24 hours .当地的穆斯林习俗要求死者在24小时内下葬。
n. 顾客；家伙 同义词:client, apple, consumer, fellow, egg Customer : The restaurant must have very clean kitchens .顾客：你们餐馆的厨房一定很干净。
n. 循环；周期；自行车；整套；一段时间 vt. 使循环；使轮转 vi. 循环；骑自行车；轮转 同义词:circle, revolution, rotation, round, bike, circulate, circumrotate, ride a bike This machine cycles automatically.这台机器自动循环运动。
adj. 日常的；每日的 n. 日报；朝来夜去的女佣 adv. 日常地；每日；天天 同义词:everyday, household, routine, journal, habitually, diurnally The careful observation and inference was his daily work .他的日常工作便是仔细的观察和诊断。
n. 奶制品；乳牛；制酪场；乳品店；牛奶及乳品业 adj. 乳品的；牛奶的；牛奶制的；产乳的 同义词:milker, milking cow, milky Milk , butter , and cheese are shipped here from the dairy farms .牛奶、黄油和奶酪都是各个制酪场运到这里来的。
v. 控制；筑坝 n. [水利] 水坝；障碍 同义词:control over, take control of, bar, obstacle, let, stop They dammed up the river to make a lake for their water supply.他们拦河筑坝，形成湖泊供水。
vi. 损害；损毁；赔偿金 n. 损害；损毁 vt. 损害，毁坏 同义词:do harm to, let in for, injury, harm, lesion, destroy, hurt, blast Harry damaged the saw on a nail.哈里锯在钉子上弄坏了锯子。
vt. 使潮湿；使阻尼；使沮丧，抑制 vi. 减幅，阻尼；变潮湿 n. 潮湿，湿气 adj. 潮湿的 同义词:control, stay, restrain, moisturize, moisture, humidity, wet, wet, humid, moisty to damp clothes before ironing them在熨衣服前把它们喷湿
adj. 危险的 同义词:critical, risky, threatening, precarious, perilous Unlike asthma it is not dangerous , so people rarely worry about it.不同的是哮喘没有什么威胁，所以人们很少担心。
adj. 大胆的，勇敢的 n. 胆量，勇气 v. 敢（dare的现在分词） 同义词:bold, game, brave, courage, nerve, heart Daring , brave riders sped across the country on horseback , riding day and night .勇敢的骑手在马背上飞快地穿越这个国家，日夜兼程。
n. 心爱的人；亲爱的 同义词:beloved, the light of one's eyes Louise , darling , we've got just one chance !亲爱的路易丝，我们刚刚获得了一个机会。
n. 破折号；冲撞 vt. 使…破灭；猛撞；泼溅 vi. 猛冲；撞击 同义词:jerking motion, discomfit, knock against, impinge on She dashed the glass into smithereens against the wall.她把玻璃杯撞在墙上砸得粉碎。
n. 数据（datum的复数）；资料 The police had the leader in the movement dataed.警察收集了有关这次运动的领导人的情报。
n. 黎明；开端 vt. 破晓；出现；被领悟 同义词:morning, origin, come out, break of day The day dawned with a cloudless sky.东方发白，晴空万里无云。
adj. 致命的；非常的；死一般的 adv. 非常；如死一般地 同义词:intense, kill, fatal, extremely, badly, highly, greatly, too Cancer is a deadly disease .癌是一种致命的疾病。
vt. 处理；给予；分配；发牌 vi. 处理；讨论；对待；做生意 n. 交易；（美）政策；待遇；份量 同义词:afford, allow, extend, deliver, part, manage, debate, cope with, policy, business, trade, truck Science deals with facts.科学是论述客观事实的。
adj. 亲爱的；尊敬的；昂贵的 adv. 高价地；疼爱地 int. 哎呀 n. 亲爱的人 同义词:loving, expensive, rich, costly, oh, my, ohone, machree Look , dear . Do you like the beautiful moon ?看，亲爱的。你喜欢美丽的月亮吗？
n. 死；死亡；死神；毁灭 同义词:destruction, dying Strokes can cause death or disability .中风能够造成死亡和残疾。
vt. 辩论，争论，讨论 vi. 辩论，争论，讨论 n. 辩论；辩论会 同义词:reason, dispute about, deal, pro-and-con, dispute, controversy When I left, the men were still debating.我离开时，那些人仍在辩论。
n. 债务；借款；罪过 同义词:liability, loan, borrowing But some people get deep into debt .但有些人也深陷于债务之中。
n. 十年，十年期；十 同义词:decennium, dix the decade of the 1990’s 20世纪90年代的十年间
vi. 衰退，[核] 衰减；腐烂，腐朽 n. 衰退，[核] 衰减；腐烂，腐朽 vt. 使腐烂，使腐败；使衰退，使衰落 同义词:fail, flag, recession, downturn, decline, decomposition, corrupt, septicize vegetation that was decaying腐烂中的草本
n. 欺骗；谎言；欺诈手段 同义词:fraud, lie, fiction Intrigue and deceit seem to dog the management of just about every political party .阴谋与欺骗看来尾随着几乎每一个政党的管理。
v. 欺骗；行骗 同义词:take in sb, give the shaft She deceived me by pretending to be a famous movie star.她冒充著名的电影明星来蒙骗我。
n. 十二月 This is me at school in December .这就是十二月在学校中的我。

adj. 正派的；得体的；相当好的 同义词:proper, goodish The best argument is that , having committed to building a decent state in Afghanistan , the west has a moral obligation to keep going.最有说服力的论据是，既然承诺在阿富汗建立一个像样的国家，西方就背负着信守承诺的道德义务。
vt. 决定；解决；判决 vi. 决定，下决心 同义词:settle, condition, conclude, will, determine to The judge decided the case in favour of the defendant.法官对此案做出有利于被告的判决。
n. 决定，决心；决议 同义词:determination, resolution, push, backbone Tyson decisioned his opponent by a point score rather than a knockout.泰森靠判定而不是靠击倒对手获胜。
n. 甲板；行李仓；露天平台 vt. 装饰；装甲板；打扮 同义词:board, storage room, paint, hang, dress oneself, array They were all decked out in their Sunday best.他们着意打扮，穿上了节日盛装。
vt. 宣布，声明；断言，宣称 vi. 声明，宣布 同义词:bill, state, to announce, hand down to declare one's position in a controversy表明某人在争论中的立场
vt. 装饰；布置；授勋给 vi. 装饰；布置 同义词:paint, hang, make, post, set sth out, trick out to decorate walls of the lobby with murals用壁画装饰大厅的墙壁
n. 减少，减小；减少量 vi. 减少，减小 vt. 减少，减小 同义词:reduction, loss, to cut down, fall off, shorten, weaken Water consumption decreased during the winter.冬季期间水消耗量减少。
vt. 推论，推断；演绎出 同义词:understand, reason, conclude From the evidence the detective deduced that the servant had done it.根据证据侦探推断是佣人所为。
n. 行动；证书；[法] 契据 vt. 立契转让 同义词:action, letter, certificate, act The property has been deeded to her by her husband.这笔财产已由她丈夫立契约转让给她。
vt. 使加深；使强烈；使低沉 vi. 变深；变低沉 Larger ships will be able to navigate the river after the main channel is deepened.主要河床被挖深后，较大船舶将能航行于此河流。
vt. 击败，战胜；挫败；使…失败 n. 失败；战胜 同义词:down, get the best of, failure, loss, losing, reverse, collapse They defeated the enemy in the battle.他们在那次战斗中打败敌人。
n. 缺点，缺陷；不足之处 vi. 变节；叛变 同义词:deficiency, disadvantage, vice, fault, shortcoming, apostatize, rise up The scientist defected to another country.那名科学家叛逃到另一国家了。
n. 防御；防卫；答辩；防卫设备 同义词:protection, reply, answer China also feels that its nuclear strategy is being undermined by missile defence systems under development .此外，中国还觉得自己的核战略正被开发中的导弹防御系统削弱。
vt. 辩护；防护 vi. 保卫；防守 同义词:to claim, forefend, hold position The sentry defended the gate against sudden attack.哨兵守卫大门以防突然袭击。
vt. 定义；使明确；规定 同义词:regulate, state, rule They disagreed on how to define “liberal”.他们对如何解释“liberal”一词的词义有不同意见。
adj. 一定的；确切的 I want an appointment for a definite time and place .我要一个有确定的时间和地点的约会。
adv. 清楚地，当然；明确地，肯定地 同义词:certainly, surely, specifically, particularly, plain " China is definitely not the cheapest place to produce any more, " he says .“中国肯定不再是生产什么成本都是最低的地方了”，他说。
n. 定义；[物] 清晰度；解说 同义词:difinition, sharpness At the time , WHO said it would rewrite its pandemic definition to avoid announcing one.当时，世卫组织说，它将改写流感大流行的定义，回避了宣布大流行。
n. 程度，等级；度；学位；阶层 同义词:extent, classification, measure, grade, plane The university bestowed a degree on him .那所大学授予他一个学位。
vi. 延期；耽搁 vt. 延期；耽搁 n. 延期；耽搁；被耽搁或推迟的时间 同义词:wait, hold over, hold over, stand over, raincheck, postponement The driver delayed the drive until the weather cleared.驾驶员延迟到天气转晴后才出车。

n. 代表团；授权；委托 同义词:commitment, mission, authorization, warranty Our delegation , he told the assembled experts on board , would be the only disinterested spokesman at the conference .他告诉船上的专家们说，我国代表团将是会上唯一大公无私的发言人。
vt. 删除 同义词:expurgate, prune away It will be clearer if you delete the last paragraph.如果你删去最后那一段，它将会更清楚。
adj. 微妙的；精美的，雅致的；柔和的；易碎的；纤弱的；清淡可口的 同义词:subtle, female, refined, fine, fragile What a delicate work of art !多精美的一件艺术品啊！
adj. 美味的；可口的 同义词:palatable, delectable You will enjoy delicious dumplings .你们会吃上美味的饺子。
n. 高兴 vi. 高兴 vt. 使高兴 同义词:joy, cheerfulness, pleasure, be pleased, glad, pleasure, satisfy The circus show delighted everyone.马戏团表演使每个人欣喜。
vt. 交付；发表；递送；释放；给予（打击）；给…接生 vi. 实现；传送；履行；投递 n. 投球 同义词:afford, allow, extend, deal, free, come true, come to pass to deliver mails投递邮件
n. [贸易] 交付；分娩；递送 同义词:labour, handing over CAAC requires delaying delivery of new aircrafts .中国民航推迟新飞机交付。
vt. 要求；需要；查询 vi. 需要；请求；查问 n. [经] 需求；要求；需要 同义词:exact, lack, desire, call for, wish, have need of, necessity, need, do, desire, want She demanded that we let her in.她要求我们让她进来。
n. 民主，民主主义；民主政治 That said , democracy in Latin America faces two significant threats .换句话说，拉美国家的民主面临两大威胁。
adj. 民主的；民主政治的；大众的 同义词:popular And cooperation is what the president and the new Democratic leaders have promised .而且合作正是总统和新的民主党领导人所承诺的事。
vt. 证明；展示；论证 vi. 示威 同义词:prove, give evidence of The philosopher demonstrated a philosophical principle.那位哲学家论证了一条哲学原理。
adj. 稠密的；浓厚的；愚钝的 同义词:crass, beef-witted At the center is a dense cluster of ultra- sensitive vision cells .在中央，是一团浓密的对景象超级敏感的细胞。
n. 密度 同义词:specific mass We say the gas becomes ideal in the zero- density limit .我们说在零密度的极限条件下，气体变成理想的。
vt. 否定，否认；拒绝给予；拒绝…的要求 vi. 否认；拒绝 同义词:negative, disavow, object, refuse to deny an accusation否认指控，否认被指控的罪状
vi. 离开；出发，起程；违反；去世 adj. 逝世的 同义词:leave, split, vary, quit, get out The train departs at 8：30 AM.列车于上午8点30分开出。
n. 部；部门；系；科；局 同义词:ministry, division, bureau, sector Welcome to the sports department !欢迎来到运动品部！
n. 离开；出发；违背 同义词:leaving, starting, violation, breach, quit Usually two hours before the flight departure .通常在飞机起飞前两个小时。
vi. 依赖，依靠；取决于；相信，信赖 同义词:hope, tie to You may depend on the accuracy of the report.你可以信赖报告的准确性。
adj. 依靠的；从属的；取决于…的 n. 依赖他人者；受赡养者 同义词:under, servient Do you think [the energy policy recognises we will be ] dependent on fossil fuels for some time ?你是否认为（能源政策认定我们仍将）在一段时期内依赖于化石燃料？
n. 存款；保证金；沉淀物 vt. 使沉积；存放 vi. 沉淀 同义词:fund, saving, covers, sludge, precipitation, trust in, trust with, settle, to precipitate She deposited her paycheck every Saturday.她每星期六都存储她的薪金支票。
vt. 压低；使沮丧；使萧条 同义词:drive down, weigh down His sad news depressed us all day.他的不幸消息令我们整天难过。
n. [海洋] 深度；深奥 同义词:profoundity, deepness Even a single flower , in depth of winter , is a miracle and a symbol of hope .在严冬季节，鲜花即使是一枝独秀，也是一种奇迹和希望的象征。
vt. 源于；得自 vi. 起源 同义词:to originate He derives great satisfaction from his stamp collection.他从集邮中得到极大的满足。
vi. 下降；下去；下来；遗传；屈尊 vt. 下去；沿…向下 同义词:decline, go down They descended from the mountaintop.他们从山顶下来。
vt. 描述，形容；描绘 同义词:represent, trace, figure, depict She described the accident very carefully.她非常仔细地描述了事故。
n. 描述，描写；类型；说明书 同义词:presentation, type, style, characterization This simple example is a pretty good description of how evolution works .这个简单的例子是进化发生的一个非常好的描述。
vt. 遗弃；放弃；逃跑 vi. 遗弃；开小差；逃掉 n. 沙漠；荒原；应得的赏罚 adj. 沙漠的；荒凉的；不毛的 同义词:yield, quit, run out on, walk out on, sands, wold, wild, hungry Jack deserted his wife.杰克抛弃了妻子。
vi. 应受，应得 vt. 应受，应得 同义词:be deserving of, be deserving of a theory that deserves consideration值得考虑的理论
vt. 设计；计划；构思 n. 设计；图案 vi. 设计 同义词:project, engineer, style, schedule, frame, programming, device, pattern, project, engineer They designed us a beautiful building.他们为我们设计了一幢漂亮的大楼。
adj. 令人满意的；值得要的 n. 合意的人或事物 同义词:satisfying, fulfilling But it is desirable for any news outfit .对任何新闻团体这都是合理的。

n. 欲望；要求，心愿；性欲 vt. 想要；要求；希望得到… vi. 渴望 同义词:requirement, wants, do, need, wish, feel like, wanna, require, mean, exact, rare, aspire, long for, yearn for, die for I desired candy all the time I was dieting.当我节食时我很想吃糖果。
n. 绝望；令人绝望的人或事 vi. 绝望，丧失信心 同义词:hopelessness, acedia, throw up one's hands, lose heart I despair of ever finding him again.我对再找到他已丧失信心。
adj. 不顾一切的；令人绝望的；极度渴望的 同义词:venturous, devil-may-care Outsiders may do more to help — at least to tackle the desperate plight of civilians .局外人也许能给予更多的帮助——至少可以缓解平民的绝望困境。
vt. 轻视，鄙视 同义词:slight, set light by I despise anyone who is cruel to animals.我鄙视那些虐待动物的人。
prep. 尽管，不管 n. 轻视；憎恨；侮辱 同义词:in spite of, for all that, hate, hatred, contempt I failed the test despite studying all night.尽管整夜学习，我还是考试不及格。
n. 目的地，终点 同义词:goal, end-point Thus , the destination plus the DSAP define the recipient of a packet .所以，目标地址和DSAP一起定义了数据包的容器。
vt. 破坏；消灭；毁坏 同义词:undermine, founder Fire destroyed several houses in the area.大火烧毁了该地区的几栋房子。
n. 破坏，毁灭；摧毁 同义词:breaking, death, blasting, disruption, demolition It is simply a matter of decreasing sequestration and destruction of platelet .这是减少血小板的隔离与破坏这么简单的一个问题。
n. 细节，详情 vt. 详述；选派 vi. 画详图 同义词:specific, minutia, expand on, enlarge on The computer's characteristics are fully detailed in the brochure.计算机的性能在这小册子里有详尽说明。
vt. 察觉；发现；探测 同义词:explore, perceive She detected the odor of gas in the room.她闻到房里有煤气味。
n. 侦查，探测；发觉，发现；察觉 同义词:exploration, discovery, occurrence, find The main function of the computer fetal monitoring device is fetal heart rate detection .胎心率的自动检测和监护是电脑胎儿监护仪的主要功能。
n. 决心；果断 同义词:decision, resolution, push, backbone The criticism sapped his determination .批评削弱了他的决心。
vt. 决定；判决；使…下定决心 vi. 确定；决定；判决，终止 同义词:condition, conclude, identify, drop, finish, judge He determined that he would travel to New York this summer holiday.他决定今年暑假将旅行到纽约。
vt. 开发；进步；使成长；使显影 vi. 发育；生长；进化；显露 同义词:exploit, open up, grow, flower to develop natural resources开发自然资源
n. 发展；开发；发育；住宅小区（专指由同一开发商开发的）；[摄] 显影 同义词:exploitation, growth, making, advance, progress Many experts argue that NASA should invest more in technology development .许多专家认为NASA应该投资更多在技术开发。
n. 装置；策略；图案 同义词:apparatus, installation, strategy, unit, gear This is its first attempt to sell its own device .这是它第一次尝试销售自己的研发产品。
n. 魔鬼；撒旦；家伙；恶棍 vt. 折磨 同义词:apple, customer, egg, fellow, guy, harry, worry, trouble, tear, torture to devil rags and cloth用扯碎机扯碎破旧衣服和布
vt. 设计；想出；发明；图谋；遗赠给 n. 遗赠 同义词:design, engineer, style, project, frame, legacy, bequest The professor has devised a new method of teaching foreign languages.那位教授发明了一种教外语的新方法。
vt. 致力于；奉献 同义词:commit oneself to, bend oneself to to devote one's time to reading把时间专用于阅读
n. 珠，滴；露水；清新 vt. （露水等）弄湿 vi. 结露水 同义词:drop, gutta, get wet, moisten If there's any rising mist or dew in your photo , chances are it's sunrise .如果在你的照片中有任何上升的雾气或露水，十有八九就是日出。
n. 图表；图解 vt. 用图解法表示 同义词:chart, graph The engineer diagrammed the bridge.工程师绘制了桥的示意图。
n. 转盘；刻度盘；钟面 vi. 拨号 vt. 给…拨号打电话 同义词:rotating disc, turntable to dial my favourite programme收听(或收看)我最喜爱的节目
n. 方言，土话；同源语；行话；个人用语特征 adj. 方言的 同义词:patois, provincialism The actress speaks in a Beijing dialect in the opera rather than rhyming lines.他说起话来有一点京味儿，又有一点港味儿。
n. 对话；会话 同义词:conversation, sesion A properties dialog box generally controls the current selection .一般来说，属性对话框控制当前的选择。
n. 直径 We must gauge the diameter of wire first .我们必须先测量电线的直径。
n. 钻石，金刚石；菱形；方块牌 adj. 菱形的；金刚钻的 同义词:sparkler, adamas, rhombic to diamond a ring给戒指镶钻石
n. 日志，日记；日记簿 同义词:journal, day book to diary the morning把当天上午发生的事记入办公日志
vt. 命令；口述；使听写 vi. 口述；听写 n. 命令；指示 同义词:require, order, command, instruction, order, bidding, telling, word The president has dictated some letters to his secretary.总裁已向秘书口授了一些信稿。
n. 听写；口述；命令 同义词:instruction, bidding, order, word, charge The teacher gave the pupils dictation .教师让学生听写。
n. 字典；词典 同义词:lexicon, wordbook May I borrow your dictionary ?我可以借你的词典吗？
vt. 使…相异；使…不同 vi. 相异；意见分歧 同义词:divide Each writer's style differs from that of another.每个作家的风格各不相同。
n. 差异；不同；争执 同义词:diversity, conflict, disparity, deviations Every country has something that differences it from another.每个国家自有与别国不同之处。
adj. 不同的；个别的，与众不同的 同义词:diverse, unlike, unusual, individual, varying Different nations have different levels of technology .不同的国家的科技水平不同。
adj. 困难的；不随和的；执拗的 同义词:hard, tough RELATE 】It is difficult to relate these results to her mistake .要将这些结果和她的错误连接起来是困难的。
n. 困难，困境 同义词:poverty, corner, hardness, dilemma, fix No difficulty , no fun .无难事，便无乐趣。
vt. 消化；吸收；融会贯通 vi. 消化 n. 文摘；摘要 同义词:absorb, drink in, abstract, brief, summary, resume The baby had a hard time digesting such rich food.婴儿很难消化如此油腻的食物。
adj. 数字的；手指的 n. 数字；键 同义词:numerical, figure, key, number Or some other digital black - magic box ?或其他一些数字黑色魔术匣？
adj. 勤勉的；用功的，费尽心血的 同义词:industrious, hard-working He is a most diligent student .他是极其勤奋的学生。

adj. 暗淡的，昏暗的；模糊的，看不清的；悲观的，怀疑的 vt. 使暗淡，使失去光泽；使变模糊 vi. 变模糊，变暗淡 n. 笨蛋，傻子 同义词:fuzzy, dark, dirty, lowering, breathe upon, fog, mist, simple, turkey, put, idiot, stupid When the music started,someone dimmed the lights.乐曲开奏时就有人把舞台上的灯光转暗了。
n. [数] 维；尺寸；次元；容积 vt. 标出尺寸 adj. 规格的 同义词:measurement, size Dimension the shelves so that they fit securely into the cabinet.把搁板刨成需要的尺寸以便它们可牢固地镶入贮藏橱中。
n. 晚餐，晚宴；宴会；正餐 同义词:supper, evening meal Wanna dinner together? My treat .想一起吃晚餐吗？我请客。
vt. 浸，泡，蘸；舀取；把伸入 vi. 浸；下降，下沉；倾斜；舀，掏 n. 下沉，下降；倾斜；浸渍，蘸湿 同义词:steep, dunk, decline, pitch, slope, swim, reduction, decline, slope, fall, subsidence He dipped the brush into the paint bucket.他拿画笔蘸颜料桶中的颜料。

adj. 直接的；直系的；亲身的；恰好的 vt. 管理；指挥；导演；指向 vi. 指导；指挥 adv. 直接地；正好；按直系关系 同义词:immediate, right, manage, conduct, run, officer, control, supervise, to command, immediately, straight, just, fair The general manager directed the company through a difficult time.总经理带领公司渡过了难关。
n. 方向；指导；趋势；用法说明 同义词:orientation, guidance, aspect, tendency, instruction Does light travel out in one direction or in all directions?光是沿着一个方向还是所有方向往外传播的？
adv. 直接地；立即；马上；正好地；坦率地 conj. 一…就 同义词:rapidly, straight, fair, immediately, than We went directly to the factory .我们立刻就到工厂去了。
n. 主任，主管；导演；人事助理 同义词:co-director, boss-man The director thanked him again and promised to investigate .董事总经理再次向他道谢，并承诺展开调查。
n. 污垢，泥土；灰尘，尘土；下流话 同义词:earth, dust, clay, powder They have to have someone else to do the dirt .他们必须找其他人来做这件肮脏的事情。
adj. 下流的，卑鄙的；肮脏的；恶劣的；暗淡的 vt. 弄脏 vi. 变脏 同义词:poor, mean, blue, base, gross, soil, soil, mud, spot Try not to dirty your new white shirt.设法别弄脏你的白衬衫。
vt. 使失去能力；使残废；使无资格 同义词:maim She was disabled by blindness.她因失明而丧失视力。
n. 缺点；不利条件；损失 同义词:defect, deficiency, vice, losing, expense He was disadvantaged by illness.疾病使他伤了元气。
vi. 不同意；不一致；争执；不适宜 同义词:conflict, to disapprove of The conclusions disagree with the facts.这些结论与事实不符。
vi. 消失；失踪；不复存在 vt. 使…不存在；使…消失 同义词:blank, vanish away, plough under She disappeared down the corridor.她消失在走廊尽头。
vt. 使失望 同义词:fail, let down I'm sorry to disappoint your expectation.很遗憾，我辜负了你的期望。
n. 灾难，灾祸；不幸 同义词:tragedy, evil, calamity, grief So far rust has not caused a disaster .到目前为止，锈病并没有造成灾害。

vt. 抛弃；放弃；丢弃 vi. 放弃 n. 抛弃；被丢弃的东西或人 同义词:yield, desert, quit, fall out of, render up, to renounce, to abandon, to give up, rejection, abandonment He discarded an old hat and an old pair of shoes.他扔掉了一顶旧帽子和一双旧鞋。
vt. 解雇；卸下；放出；免除 vi. 排放；卸货；流出 n. 排放；卸货；解雇 同义词:issue, forgive, issue, shed, firing, dismissal The dockers discharged a ship.码头工人卸下了船上的货物。
n. 学科；纪律；训练；惩罚 vt. 训练，训导；惩戒 同义词:science, punishment, rod, knowledge, payment, coach, drill The football team was disciplined by a professional trainer.这支足球队受过专业教练员的训练。
vt. 公开；揭露 同义词:reveal, expose to disclose a secret泄露秘密
vt. 阻止；使气馁 同义词:stem, block, dispute, prohibit She was discouraged in her marriage.她对自己的婚姻感到泄气。
vt. 发现；发觉 vi. 发现 同义词:detect, sniff out, sniff out, to find He discovered America in 1492.他于1492年发现了美洲。

n. 发现，发觉；被发现的事物 同义词:detection, occurrence, find Still , the discovery is seen as good news for people who have severe dry skin or other conditions that cause itching .对于那些患有由严重皮肤干燥或其它原因引起的瘙痒病人，这一发现仍然是一个好消息。
vt. 讨论；论述，辩论 同义词:debate, reason, argue The council discussed the proposed law on taxes.委员会讨论了所提的税法议案。
n. 病，[医] 疾病；弊病 vt. 传染；使…有病 同义词:illness, ill, sickness, complaint, to infect The doctor discovered that his heart was diseased.医生发现他的心脏有病。
vt. 掩饰；假装；隐瞒 n. 伪装；假装；用作伪装的东西 同义词:simulate, come, simulation, acting The president was disguised as a peasant.总统假扮成农民。
n. 厌恶，嫌恶 vt. 使厌恶；使作呕 同义词:aversion, abomination, indispose, repel The awful food at the inn disgusted us.小饭馆的劣质菜使我们作呕。
n. 碟，盘；一道菜 vt. 把…装盘；使成碟状 vi. 成碟状；闲谈 同义词:plate, course, visit, chin music She dished the food onto plates.她把食物盛在盘上。
vt. 拒付；使丢脸；拒绝承兑；不履行（诺言等） n. 拒付；不名誉 同义词:default, decline draft, nonpayment, ill fame The congressman's corruption dishonoured himself and his family.这名国会议员的腐败败坏了他自己及其家庭的声誉。
n. [计] 磁盘，磁碟片；圆盘，盘状物；唱片 同义词:magneticdisc, circular disc To skip creating your startup disk , click Cancel .要跳过制作启动盘，请单击“取消”。
vt. 解散；解雇；开除；让...离开 vi. 解散 同义词:remove, fire out, disband, break up The teacher dismissed the class early.老师早下课。
n. 混乱；骚乱 vt. 使失调；扰乱 同义词:chaos, confusion, disturbance, turmoil, involvement, upset, disarrange The room was disordered when they arrived at the scene of the burglary.当他们到达夜盗现场时房间被弄得乱七八糟。
n. 显示；炫耀 vt. 显示；表现；陈列 vi. [动] 作炫耀行为 adj. 展览的；陈列用的 同义词:exhibition, manifestation, reveal, make clear, conduct oneself, prove, represent The vendors displayed their fruit.摊贩展示他们的水果。
vt. 使生气；触怒 vi. 使生气；使不快 同义词:bring out in, disoblige, bring out in, jar on Her reply displeased her father.她的回答令父亲不快。

n. 处理；支配；清理；安排 同义词:transactions, settlement, treating, handling, governance Right now , the only thing the company cares about is efficient waste disposal and higher profits .现在，公司唯一关心的事情就是有效地进行废物处理和提高利润。
vt. 处理；处置；安排 vi. 处理；安排；（能够）决定 n. 处置；性情 同义词:schedule, budget, settle, place in, cope with, manage, place in, cope with, make, temperament He disposed his money in charity.他将自己的钱用于慈善事业。
vt. 辩论；怀疑；阻止；抗拒 vi. 争论 n. 辩论；争吵 同义词:discuss, debate, argue, stem, block, debate, argue with, argument, debate, brush, controversy We disputed with each other on various issues.我们为各种问题互相争论。
vt. 不满足；使……感觉不满 That new plan dissatisfied everyone.那项新计划令人人不满。
vt. 使溶解；使分解；使液化 vi. 溶解；解散；消失 n. 叠化画面；画面的溶暗 同义词:hemolyze, haemolyze, melt, disappear Water dissolves salt.水能使盐溶解。
n. 距离；远方；疏远；间隔 vt. 疏远；把…远远甩在后面 同义词:separation, space, interval, remove, stand off, cold-shoulder to distance all the other runners把其他选手远远地抛在后面
adj. 遥远的；冷漠的；远隔的 同义词:remote, faraway A faint impression of a submerged castle shimmered in distant background .一座朦胧的水下城堡在深远的背景中微微闪光。
adj. 明显的；独特的；清楚的；有区别的 同义词:obvious, visible, unique, evident, individual In the medium term , a sharp rise in inflation is a distinct possibility .在中期，通货膨胀的急剧上升是一次明显的可能。
n. 区别；差别；特性；荣誉、勋章 同义词:quality, identity, character, tang, discrimination The first is the thermodynamic distinction between past and future .第一个是过去与未来在热力学上的区别。
vt. 区分；辨别；使杰出，使表现突出 vi. 区别，区分；辨别 同义词:tell apart, differentiate, differentiate, tell from She was distinguished from the other girls by her height.她身材高挑有别于其他女孩。
n. 危难，不幸；贫困；悲痛 vt. 使悲痛；使贫困 同义词:poverty, disaster, evil, want, grief, aggrieve The news of my mother's death distressed me greatly.母亲逝世的噩耗令我极为悲痛。
vt. 分配；散布；分开；把…分类 同义词:portion, part, spread They distributed political pamphlets in the hall.他们在大厅里散发政治小册子。
n. 分布；分配 同义词:allocation, assignment The general question of size distribution and its representation was briefly discussed .谱分布及其表示法的一般问题已简单地讨论过了。
n. 区域；地方；行政区 同义词:area, place to district the city into three election districts.把该市划分成三个选区
vt. 打扰；妨碍；使不安；弄乱；使恼怒 vi. 打扰；妨碍 同义词:let, violate, intrude upon, hinder from Please do not disturb us when we are working.工作的时候请不要打扰我们。
vt. 在…上掘沟；把…开入沟里；丢弃 vi. 开沟；掘沟 n. 沟渠；壕沟 同义词:reject, slough off, furrow, conduit, sike The fortress was ditched in all around.要塞周围挖了壕沟。
vi. 潜水；跳水；俯冲；急剧下降 n. 潜水；跳水；俯冲；扑 同义词:pitch down, phreatic water, underground water She dove straight into the pool.她径直跳入池中。

adj. 不同的；多种多样的；变化多的 同义词:different, unlike, varying, another, dissimilar They then proceed to use this analytical framework to explore subjects as diverse as cancer , pregnancy , mate choice , literature and religion .于是，他们着手利用这一分析框架，探讨癌症、怀孕、择偶、文学和宗教等多种多样的主题。

vt. 划分；除；分开；使产生分歧 vi. 分开；意见分歧 n. [地理] 分水岭，分水线 同义词:distribute, part, differ, come between, shed, watershed The teacher divided the class and took one section to the library and left the other to write an article.老师把该班分开，把一组领去图书馆，留下其余的人写作文。
n. 除法；部门；分割；师（军队）；[体]赛区 同义词:ministry, department, sector, segmentation, dom Religion is not the only source of division .宗教问题并不是分裂的唯一来源。
vt. 使离婚，使分离；与…离婚 n. 离婚；分离 vi. 离婚 同义词:separate, split, separation, detachment Mrs. John divorced her husband.琼斯太太与她丈夫离婚了。
n. 码头；船坞；被告席；尾巴的骨肉部分 vt. 使靠码头；剪短 vi. 入船坞 同义词:landing, pier, crop, bob The pilot docked the ship and cut all the engines.引航员领船进港后并关上了所有发动机。
adj. 国内的；家庭的；驯养的；一心只管家务的 n. 国货；佣人 同义词:internal, household, home, family, servant Do you want domestic or imported beer ?你是要国产的还是进口的啤酒?。
n. 驴子；傻瓜；顽固的人 同义词:ass, stupid donkey has long ears .驴有很长的耳朵。
n. 宿舍（等于dormitory） 同义词:lodging house, lodging quarters What a mess ! How can you stand living in such a messy dorm ?这里真是又脏又乱！你们怎么能忍受得了住在这么脏乱的宿舍里呢?。
n. 宿舍，学生宿舍 adj. 住宅区的 同义词:lodging house, student hostel, uptown The dormitory was aired in the morning .早晨，宿舍通过风。
n. 剂量；一剂，一服 vi. 服药 vt. 给药；给…服药 同义词:dosage, potion, take medicine, physic Feverish patients were dosed with quinine.给发高烧病人服用了奎宁。
n. 点，圆点；嫁妆 vi. 打上点 vt. 加小点于 同义词:dowry, tocher The President's address is WWW dot Whitehouse dot.gov.总统的网址是 WWW. Whitehouse. gov。
n. 怀疑；疑问；疑惑 v. 怀疑；不信；恐怕；拿不准 同义词:challenge, question, query, suspicion, suspect of, be suspicious of I never doubted you; I was sure you would bring me the money.我从不怀疑你的，我肯定你会给我带来这笔钱的。
adj. 可疑的；令人生疑的；疑心的；不能确定的 同义词:suspicious, questionable A generous explanation is that France is doubtful about the wisdom of premature fiscal tightening .一种堂皇的解释是，法国对于过早收缩财政正确与否心存疑虑。

adv. 无疑地；确定地；大概，多半 adj. 无疑的；确定的 同义词:easily, no doubt, probably, clearly, possibly, established, fixed, defined, certain, positive Even after final rulings are made, doubtless be interminable hearings on how to implement them.甚至在终审裁定后，无疑将会是对如何执行裁定举行无止尽的听证会。
adj. 向下的，下降的 adv. 向下 同义词:falling, descensive, alow, netherward These direct light downward to reduce light pollution at night .这些向下的直射光减少了夜间的光污染。
n. 十二个，一打 adj. 一打的 同义词:twelve I'll dozen eggs.我要把鸡蛋组成打。
n. 草稿；汇票；草图；[篮球]选秀 vt. 起草，设计；为...打样 He drafted his speech.他起草了讲演稿。
vt. 拖累；拖拉；缓慢而吃力地行进 vi. 拖曳；缓慢而吃力地行进 n. 拖；拖累 同义词:cumber with, ball and chain, daggle, pull, tow We dragged the carpet out of the room.我们费力地把地毯拖出房间。
n. 龙；凶暴的人，凶恶的人；严厉而有警觉性的女人 同义词:tiger, wyrm No . You have to do something special to be famous . You have to kill dragon .不，一个人必须做某种很特殊的事情才会出名，他必须杀死一条龙。
vi. 排水；流干 vt. 喝光，耗尽；使流出；排掉水 n. 排水；下水道，排水管；消耗 同义词:discharge of water, exhaust, use out, consumption, sewage to drain oil from a crankcase把曲轴箱里的油排干
n. 戏剧，戏剧艺术；剧本；戏剧性事件 同义词:stage, theater, scenario Richard Nixon announced it in 1972 with drama of a CEO reading out the company report .1972年理查德•尼克松宣布登月成功时的架势就像是一位宣读公司报表的CEO。

n. 干旱；缺乏 同义词:shortage, deficiency, need, short of, want For example , Australia , a major wheat exporter , faces a drought .例如，在主要小麦输出国澳洲，面临着干旱。

adj. 每；各自的 adv. 每个；各自 pron. 每个；各自 同义词:respective, several, apiece Each individual has his own personality .每个人都有自己的个性。

vt. 赚，赚得；获得，挣得；使得到；博得 同义词:acquire, buy, find, make, score to earn one's living谋生

n. 地震；大动荡 同义词:temblor, seismic event Faults , however , do not open up during earthquake .尽管如此，地质断层不会在地震中裂开。

adv. 容易地；无疑地 同义词:clearly, no doubt, readily, lightly Water easily propagates sound .水容易传导声音。

n. 肘部；弯头；扶手 vt. 推挤；用手肘推开 同义词:rail, rider, thrust, push against I tried to stop her, but she elbowed me out of the way.我企图拦阻她，但她用肘把我搡开。

n. 选举；当选；选择权；上帝的选拔 同义词:option, vote, choice IT IS only a mid-term election , for half of the lower house of Congress and a third of the senate .这仅仅是一次议会中期选举，争夺的仅是国会下议院半数席位以及参议院三分之一的席位。

adj. 电的；电动的；发电的；导电的；令人震惊的 n. 电；电气车辆；带电体 同义词:dynamoelectric, motor-driven, electrified body And though he is not the most electric of speakers , crowds listen to him because of who he is.尽管他不是演讲者中最令人兴奋的，人们听他说话是因为他的所作所为。

n. 电力；电流；强烈的紧张情绪 同义词:electric power, electric force Aluminium requires lots of expensive electricity to produce .生产铝需要耗用很多昂贵的电能。
n. 电子 同义词:elektron Much greater magnification can be obtained with the electron microscope .用电子显微镜能获得大得多的放大倍数。
adj. 电子的 He used an electronic device to measure and record the eye movements .他用一种电子仪器来测量和记录眼睛的这种运动。
n. 电子学；电子工业 同义词:electronic industry The electronics make the instrument bulky and hard to use in hot environments , like the interior of the Earth .这些电子器件使地震仪变得笨重，难以在地球内部等炎热环境下使用。
n. 元素；要素；原理；成分；自然环境 同义词:theory, mechanism, factor, basic, essential The playlist must contain at least one media element .播放列表必须包含至少一个媒体元素。
adj. 基本的；初级的；[化学] 元素的 同义词:basic, fundamental, essential, primary, first Tin is an elementary substance .锡是一种元素物质。

n. 电梯；升降机；升降舵；起卸机 同义词:lift, moving staircase Next I intend to build an elevator to store the corn I 'll harvest .下一步我打算建一个谷物仓库，来贮藏我将收获的玉米。
vt. 消除；排除 同义词:avoid, exclude to eliminate hunger消灭饥饿现象
n. 消除；淘汰；除去 同义词:removing, erasure Elimination of fuel subsidies – for producers and consumers – is an idea whose time has come .取消对生产者和消费者的化石燃料补贴，是一个时机已经成熟的想法。
adv. 其他；否则；另外 adj. 别的；其他的 同义词:otherwise, extra, other, tother somebody else别人
adv. 在别处；到别处 同义词:otherwhere It would probably raise no extra revenue for the state , and would drive talent and capital elsewhere .这很可能不会为政府增加任何额外收入，反而会将人才和资金赶到别处去。
vt. 使局促不安；使困窘；阻碍 同义词:slow, abash His bad table manners embarrassed her.他的不雅的吃相使她很尴尬。
vt. 拥抱；信奉，皈依；包含 vi. 拥抱 n. 拥抱 同义词:involve, contain, hug, cuddle, hug He embraced his daughter tenderly.他温柔地拥抱女儿。
vi. 浮现；摆脱；暴露 同义词:ray, cast off The sun emerges from behind the clouds.太阳从云层里露出。

vt. 发出，放射；发行；发表 同义词:deliver, ray The sun emits light.太阳放出光。
adj. 情绪的；易激动的；感动人的 同义词:excitable, nervy Some people are known as " emotional eaters ".有些人被认为是“情绪进食者”。
n. 皇帝，君主 同义词:sovereignty, Kaiser emperor and his family lived there .皇帝和他家人都住在那里。
n. 重点；强调；加强语气 同义词:stress, unode But , delegates are divided as to how much emphasis to give to the issue .但是代表们对给予该问题多少的重要程度意见不一。
vt. 强调，着重 同义词:stress, highlight to emphasize a point强调某一点
n. 帝国；帝王统治，君权 同义词:seignorage, empery With the fall of the Roman empire , historical evidence becomes scarce .随着罗马帝国的沦落，历史性的证据变得稀少。
vt. 使用，采用；雇用；使忙于，使从事于 n. 使用；雇用 同义词:introduce, make use of, fashion, exercise, usage, utilization, use, hire This factory employs thousands of people.这家工厂雇用数千人。
n. 雇员；从业员工 同义词:hireling They also get a chance to see if a student might make a good future employee .这些组织也有机会来了解一个学生将来是不是一个优秀的员工。
n. 雇主，老板 同义词:boss, guvnor It certainly is if you are an employer .假如你是一名雇主，那当然是这样。
n. 使用；职业；雇用 同义词:usage, utilization, profession, career, use, pursuit He has no permanent employment .他没有永久性的工作。
