vt. 鼓励，怂恿；激励；支持 同义词:heart, stimulate, power, hand, second Her coach encouraged her throughout the marathon race to keep on running.她的教练在马拉松赛全程鼓励她继续不断奔跑。
vt. 忍耐；容忍 vi. 忍耐；持续 同义词:resist, tough, abide, resist, abide They could endure much pain.他们能忍受很多痛苦。
n. 敌人，仇敌；敌军 adj. 敌人的，敌方的 同义词:foe, hostes, hostile They defended the castle against enemy .他们保卫城堡不让敌人攻入。
n. [物] 能量；精力；活力；精神 同义词:vitality, spirit, soul, mind, spring He brought new energy to the science department .他为科学教育部带来了新的活力。
vt. 实施，执行；强迫，强制 同义词:perform, actualize to enforce laws strictly严格执行法律
vt. 吸引，占用；使参加；雇佣；使订婚；预定 vi. 从事；答应，保证；交战；啮合 同义词:attract, absorb, draw, appropriate, budget, comply, wage She engaged herself to repay her debt within two months.她答应在两个月内偿还她的债务。
n. 引擎，发动机；机车，火车头；工具 同义词:facilities, instrument, vehicle, tool, gear The pilot managed to fly the damaged bomber in safely on one engine .飞行员靠一台发动机设法使损坏了的轰炸机安然降落。
n. 工程师；工兵；火车司机 vt. 设计；策划；精明地处理 vi. 设计；建造 同义词:gineer, sapper, design, style, project, frame, scheme, project, design He's engineered several big industrial projects.他已监造过几个大的工业项目。
n. 工程，工程学 v. 设计；管理（engineer的ing形式）；建造 同义词:project, managing, planning, controlling, guiding You could study astronomy , or space engineering , and be good at it.你可以学习天文学，或是空间工程学，可以学的很棒。
vi. 扩大；放大；详述 vt. 扩大；使增大；扩展 同义词:extend, broaden, extend, grow We enlarged the house by adding a west wing.我们加盖西厢房以扩建房屋。
adj. 庞大的，巨大的；凶暴的，极恶的 同义词:huge, tremendous, massive, macro, vast " It was an enormous culture shock , " she says.她说：“那是一种巨大的文化冲击。
vt. 保证，确保；使安全 同义词:undertake, assure, insure I cannot ensure his being on time.我不能保证他会准时。
vt. 娱乐；招待；怀抱；容纳 vi. 款待 同义词:serve, invite, attend, contain, accept, welcome in to entertain children with funny stories给孩子们讲有趣的故事
n. 热心，热忱，热情 同义词:passion, flame, fire, warmth The authors of the several volumes deserve much credit for their enthusiasm which made this experiment possible .若干卷的作者值得我们予以推崇，由于他们的热情使本项实验成为可能。
adj. 热情的；热心的；狂热的 同义词:intense, warm, crazy, eager, tropical But it is already clear that there would be few enthusiastic takers .但是很少有感兴趣的接收者，这一点早已明确了。
adj. 全部的，整个的；全体的 同义词:overall, all, total, corporate, universal He idled away his entire vacation .他把整个假期都浪费掉了。
vt. 称做…；定名为…；给…称号；使…有权利 His executive position entitled him to certain courtesies rarely accorded others.他的行政职务使他享有某种极少给予别人的礼遇。
n. 入口；进入 vt. 使出神，使入迷 同义词:threshold, access, portal, way in to be hypnotically entranced使受催眠似地神志恍惚
n. 进入；入口；条目；登记；报关手续；对土地的侵占 同义词:threshold, registration, access, portal Go over every statement and question every entry .查阅每个清单，对每条记录进行质疑。
n. 信封，封皮；包膜；[天] 包层；包迹 同义词:cover, involucrum Yes , you can . Please put your articles in this envelope and seal it .是的，可以。请把您的物品放在这纸袋中封起来。
n. 环境，外界 同义词:context, circumstance, setting, surrounding, condition What can we do to protect the environment ?为保护环境，我们能做些什么呢？
n. 嫉妒，妒忌；羡慕 vt. 嫉妒，妒忌；羡慕 vi. 感到妒忌；显示出妒忌 同义词:jealousy, green-eyed monster, green eyed, be jealous He envies her the position she has achieved in her profession.他妒忌她在她的职业中已取得的地位。

adj. 平等的；相等的；胜任的 vt. 等于；比得上 n. 对手；匹敌；同辈；相等的事物 同义词:competent, adequate, equivalent, even, be equivalent to, bear comparison with, comparative, opponent, rival, match, adversary If A equals B and B equals C,the A equals C.如果A等于B，而B等于C，那么A也等于C。“x=y”
n. 平等；相等；[数] 等式 同义词:equivalence, egality The author also proposes a new concept : demurrage equality .同时，提出滞期费等式这一新概念。
n. 方程式，等式；相等；[化学] 反应式 同义词:eqs, equivalence Cost of living is an important element in equation .在这里生活成本是一个重要的因素。
vt. 装备，配备 同义词:prepare, provide troops equipped for battle为打仗整装待发的部队
n. 设备，装备；器材 同义词:furniture, facility, plant, arm, fixture We plan to finish the adjustment of the equipment before Sunday .我们计划在星期日以前完成设备的调试工作。
adj. 等价的，相等的；同意义的 n. 等价物，相等物 同义词:equal, even, countertype, quid pro quo Irradiance or its equivalent , the plane radiant temperature , can be simply measured .可以简单地量测辐照度或其当量--平面辐射温度。
n. 时代；年代；纪元 同义词:years, age, time, date It is a new era .现在是一个新时代。
vt. 使竖立；建造；安装 adj. 竖立的；笔直的；因性刺激而勃起的 vi. 直立；勃起 同义词:construct, fit, fix, structure, frame, straight, upright, to stand on end, get it up to erect a house盖房
n. 误差；错误；过失 同义词:mistake, deviation, fault, sin, blame A place in a program where execution is stopped because of error .程序中的一位置，在此位置上由于出错而使执行停止。
vt. 逃避，避免；被忘掉 vi. 逃脱；避开；溜走 n. 逃跑；逃亡 同义词:get out of, shun, get away, keep clear of, hijra, desertion to escape from the burning house逃出失火的房子
adv. 特别；尤其；格外 同义词:peculiarly, notably Also , the training is easy to forget , especially in a crisis .而且，这个训练很容易忘记，特别是在紧要关头。
n. 散文；试图；随笔 vt. 尝试；对…做试验 同义词:attempt, prose, sample, have a try to essay to do something企图做某事

adj. 基本的；必要的；本质的；精华的 n. 本质；要素；要点；必需品 同义词:elementary, fundamental, basic, necessary, primary, element, principle, entity, necessity, requirement, texture It is an essential principle that we must combine theory with practice .我们必须把理论与实践相结合是个重要的原则。
vt. 建立；创办；安置 vi. 植物定植 同义词:build, found, constitute, put, station to establish a university创办一所大学
n. 确立，制定；公司；设施 同义词:corporation, facility, company, firm Establishment of border trade district is one of efficient routes .设立边境互市贸易区是有效途径之一。

vi. 估计，估价 n. 估计，估价；判断，看法 vt. 估计，估量；判断，评价 同义词:evaluate, guess at, computation, appraisal, calculation, assessment, judgment, evaluation, viewpoint, measure, value, score to estimate the cost of a college education估计上大学的费用
adj. 欧洲的；欧洲人的 n. 欧洲人 IT WAS formally one election to a single body , the European Parliament .形式上讲，这只是欧洲议会这一个部门的一次选举。
vt. 评价；估价；求…的值 vi. 评价；估价 同义词:value, score, rate, prize, to assess, to appraise to evaluate property给财产估价
vt. 使……蒸发；使……脱水；使……消失 vi. 蒸发，挥发；消失，失踪 同义词:vapor, disappear, blank The puddle evaporated rapidly in the sun.水坑在阳光下迅速蒸发。
n. 前夕；傍晚；重大事件关头 同义词:evening, sunset Christmas eve is the night before Christmas which celebrates the birth of Jesus Christ .圣诞前夜是指圣诞前一天，人们借此庆祝基督耶稣的诞生。

adj. [数] 偶数的；平坦的；相等的 adv. 甚至；即使；还；实际上 vt. 使平坦；使相等 vi. 变平；变得可比较；成为相等 同义词:flat, equivalent, equal, level, actually, really, too, effectively, yet, equate with, flatten out an even worse mistake一个更为严重的错误
n. 事件，大事；项目；结果 同义词:incident, occurrence, circumstance, outcome, item, scene, product That victory is perhaps the most important event in professional tennis .这次胜利或许是职业网球赛中最重要的事件。
adv. 最后，终于 同义词:finally, ultimately, lastly To lighten their reading material , people eventually began to write on silk .为了减轻读本的重量，人们最终开始在丝绸上书写。
adv. 永远；曾经；究竟 同义词:forever, always, once How would he ever know ?他怎么样才能知道呢？

n. 证据，证明；迹象；明显 vt. 证明 同义词:authentication, certification, demonstration, proof, breath, demonstrate, prove, argue, bear witness to She evidenced her approval by promising her full support。她答应全力支持，以此来表明她的赞成。

adj. 明显的；明白的 同义词:obvious, distinct, visible Even on his last day at the White House , when the thinning hair and gaunt face of a cancer patient was so evident , he stressed how he loved his job .即使在他在白宫的最后一天，在一个癌症病人的稀疏的头发和憔悴的脸如此明显的情况下，他仍表达了他是多么的热爱他的工作。
adj. 邪恶的；不幸的；有害的；讨厌的 n. 罪恶，邪恶；不幸 同义词:harmful, ill, black, ugly, wicked, sin, disaster, crime, grief The Evil Queen thinks Snow White is dead .邪恶的皇后以为白雪公主死掉了。
n. 演变；进化论；进展 同义词:unfolding, Monkey to Man Evolution often takes away rather than adding .进化往往做减法而不是加法。
vt. 发展，进化；进化；使逐步形成；推断出 vi. 发展，进展；进化；逐步形成 同义词:go way, to develop, grow, expand, advance to evolve a scheme制订(或发展)一项计划
adv. 恰好地；正是；精确地；正确地 同义词:accurately, correctly, properly, precisely, right That, I think , exactly his aim .我认为，这正是他的目的所在。
vt. 使扩大；使增大 vi. 夸大；夸张 同义词:enlarge, broaden, put it on, pile it on to exaggerate the difficulties of a situation夸大处境的困难
n. 考试；检查；查问 同义词:inspection, checking, monitoring She fondly imagined that she could pass her examination without working .她天真地以为自己无须努力学习便能通过考试。
vt. 检查；调查； 检测；考试 vi. 检查；调查 同义词:inspect, review, survey, probe, check for to examine a prospective purchase仔细检查一件想买的东西
n. 例子；榜样 vt. 作为…的例子；为…做出榜样 vi. 举例 同义词:mirror, lead, sample, illustrate At best , it can have influence through advocacy and example .充其量，它可以通过鼓吹和模范产生影响。
vt. 超过；胜过 vi. 超过其他 同义词:better than, overcome, top, cap, outdo to exceed a speed limit超过时速限制，超速(行驶等)
adv. 非常；极其；极度地；极端 同义词:extremely, badly, highly, greatly, too " Failure rates exceedingly high , " notes a JAMA editorial .“减肥失败率极高，”JAMA的一位编辑说到。
adj. 卓越的；极好的；杰出的 同义词:remarkable, wonderful, famous, prominent, brilliant Oh , Zeng , excellent . I could use some good news right now.哦，小曾，很好。我可以听你给我带来的好消息了。
vt. 不计；把…除外 vi. 反对 prep. 除…之外 conj. 除了；要不是 同义词:object, sit down on, to oppose, unless, besides, in addition to, but for present company excepted在座者除外
n. 例外；异议 同义词:dissention, demurral It was , however , an exception .然而，这是一个例外。
n. 超过，超额；过度，过量；无节制 adj. 额外的，过量的；附加的 同义词:immoderation, exorbitance, additional, added, attached, extra, plus It would export excess supply , instead .相反，它将输出过度的供应。
adj. 过多的，极度的；过分的 同义词:extreme, ultra, tall Meanwhile , China will move to decrease foreign reserves and review excessive investments in dollar assets .与此同时，中国将减少外汇储备，并审视对美元资产的过度投资。
n. 交换；交流；交易所；兑换 vt. 交换；交易；兑换 vi. 交换；交易；兑换 同义词:communication, conversion, turn, truck, trade, traffic Most stores will allow the purchaser to exchange goods.大多数商店将允许顾客更换商品。
vt. 激起；刺激…，使…兴奋 vi. 激动 同义词:warm, stir up, warm, fire, to agitate Tapping on the hive excited the bees.轻拍蜂箱触动了蜜蜂。
adj. 令人兴奋的；使人激动的 v. 激动；刺激（excite的ing形式）；唤起 同义词:infusive, thrilling, motivating, stimulating Tapping on the hive excited the bees.轻拍蜂箱触动了蜜蜂。
vi. 呼喊，惊叫；大声叫嚷 vt. 大声说出 同义词:bay, shout to exclaim in pain痛苦得大叫起来
vt. 排除；排斥；拒绝接纳；逐出 同义词:preclude, rule out They excluded people under 20 from (joining) the club.他们拒绝20岁以下的人加入俱乐部。
adv. 唯一地；专有地；排外地 同义词:solely For one thing, humanity 's ancestors do not seem to have exclusively coastal .首先一点就是，人类祖先的活动范围似乎并不仅限于海岸附近。
n. 偏移；远足；短程旅行；离题；游览圆 同义词:skewing, short trip But the point of an excursion is that you come home again .但是所谓旅行，那是终得归家来的。
n. 借口；理由 vt. 原谅；为…申辩；给…免去 vi. 作为借口；请求宽恕；表示宽恕 同义词:reason, sake, account, blind, occasion, forgive, pardon for, beg for mercy Excuse her bad manners.原谅她的坏态度。
vt. 实行；执行；处死 同义词:perform, implement, enforce to execute another's orders执行别人的命令
adj. 行政的；经营的；执行的，经营管理的 n. 经理；执行委员会；执行者；经理主管人员 同义词:administrative, front-office, manager, gerente Students with poor executive function need help to organize research .执行功能不好的学生需要帮助来组织研究。
n. 运动；练习；运用；操练；礼拜；典礼 vt. 锻炼；练习；使用；使忙碌；使惊恐 vi. 运动；练习 同义词:movement, sport, ceremony, campaign, practice, make use of, fashion, occupy, alarm, employ, motion, do sport to exercise the body锻炼身体
vt. 运用，发挥；施以影响 同义词:handle, to put to use to exert strength, influence, etc.尽力，施加影响等
vt. 排出；耗尽；使精疲力尽；彻底探讨 vi. 排气 n. 排气；废气；排气装置 同义词:issue, drain out, air out, air discharge, flue gas I have exhausted myself working.我工作得精疲力竭。
vt. 展览；显示；提出（证据等） n. 展览品；证据；展示会 vi. 展出；开展览会 同义词:introduce, reveal, prove, make clear, prefer, proof, witness to exhibit the latest models of cars展出最新式汽车模型
n. 展览，显示；展览会；展览品 同义词:expo, display, show, fair, manifestation The company showed the prototype of the new model at the exhibition .公司在展览会上展示了这种新模型的原型。
vi. 存在；生存；生活；继续存在 同义词:occur, live, harbor The world exists, whether you like it or not.不管你喜欢与否，这个世界照样存在。
n. 存在，实在；生存，生活；存在物，实在物 同义词:presence, being, entity, life, is What is the status of an existence without substances ?没有物质存在的存在又是什么样的状态？
n. 出口，通道；退场 vi. 退出；离去 同义词:door, channel, route, way out, to quit, back out Please exit by the fire escape.请从太平梯离开。
vt. 扩张；使膨胀；详述 vi. 发展；张开，展开 同义词:dwell on, enlarge on, grow, go way They hope to expand their company.他们希望扩大公司的规模。
n. 膨胀；阐述；扩张物 同义词:inflation, exposition He also questioned the firm 's expansion plans and overseas acquisitions .他还质疑该公司的扩展计划和海外收购活动。
vt. 期望；指望；认为；预料 vi. 期待；预期 同义词:promise oneself, guess, find, feel, make, look foward to, to look forward to Hunter expects that she will come.亨特预料她会来。
n. 期待；预期；指望 同义词:Prospects, looking forward to, be Problems still exist . I have no expectation .问题依然存在，我没有指望。

n. 损失，代价；消费；开支 vt. 向…收取费用 vi. 被花掉 同义词:consumption, losing, price, cost, disadvantage It must also be fair , not allowing one task to run efficiently at the expense of another .它也必须公平，不能因为要有效率地执行某项任务，而牺牲了另一项任务。
adj. 昂贵的；花钱的 同义词:rich, dear, costly Aluminium requires lots of expensive electricity to produce .生产铝需要耗用很多昂贵的电能。
n. 经验；经历；体验 vt. 经验；经历；体验 同义词:areer, suffer, live, undergo to experience nausea感到晕船
vi. 尝试；进行实验 n. 实验，试验；尝试 同义词:have a try, try one's hand, stroke, proof, try, go to experiment with a new procedure试验新步骤
adj. 实验的；根据实验的；试验性的 同义词:tentative, laboratorial From the diagram one can in each case determine the experimental conditions required .可以根据曲线图来确定每种情况所要求的实验条件。
adj. 熟练的；内行的；老练的 n. 专家；行家；能手 vt. 当专家；在…中当行家 同义词:skilled, accomplished, clever, diplomatic, practiced, operator, specialist to expert the American studies像专家那样研究美国问题
v. 说明；解释 同义词:bring sb to do sth, go to show to explain an obscure point阐明一个含糊的观点
n. 说明，解释；辩解 同义词:notes, interpretation, construction, legend, account After listening to the explanation .听完我嫂子的解释。
vi. 爆炸，爆发；激增 vt. 使爆炸；爆炸；推翻 同义词:blow apart, burst up, shoot, spring, blast The bomb and other explosive exploded.炸弹和其他爆炸物爆炸了。
vt. 开发，开拓；剥削；开采 n. 勋绩；功绩 同义词:develop, mine, merit, feat to exploit a business opportunity利用商业机会
vt. 探索；探测；探险 vi. 探索；探测；探险 同义词:detect, probe into, probe into, search after Let us explore the possibilities for improvement.让我们探索改善的可能性。
n. 爆炸；爆发；激增 同义词:blast, burst, detonation The force of the explosion sent ash 200 feet into the air over Auckland .爆炸的冲力使得灰尘冲上了奥克兰200英尺的天空。
adj. 爆炸的；爆炸性的；爆发性的 n. 炸药；爆炸物 同义词:volatile, fulminic, blasting agent, detonator How can we improve jumping ability and explosive leg strength?如何才能提高跳跃能力和腿部的爆发力？
n. 输出，出口；出口商品 vi. 输出物资 vt. 输出，出口 同义词:output, exit, output, bulk out to export tea to other countries向其他国家出口茶叶
vt. 揭露，揭发；使曝光；显示 同义词:reveal, prove, make clear, disclose to expose one's character to attack使自己的品质受到攻击
n. 暴露；曝光；揭露；陈列 同义词:layout, reveal, showing Also , skin doctors warn people to be careful with sun exposure because of the risk of skin cancer .并且，皮肤科医生警告人们要小心阳光直射，因为会有皮肤癌的危险。
vt. 表达；快递 adj. 明确的；迅速的；专门的 n. 快车，快递，专使；捷运公司 同义词:voice, put, precise, decided, technical, rapid, specific, rapido, flier to express an idea clearly清楚地讲述(或表达)一个想法
n. 表达，表示；表情；表现力；措辞 同义词:utterance, representative of Do you know that expression ?你知道这个表达吗？

vt. 延伸；扩大；推广；伸出；给予；使竭尽全力；对…估价 vi. 延伸；扩大；伸展；使疏开 同义词:afford, allow, deal, deliver, finger, reach, spread, range, enlarge, push The carpenter extended the measuring tape as far as it would go.木匠把卷尺拉长到不能再拉为止。
n. 延长；延期；扩大；伸展；电话分机 同义词:delay, spread We must expand our own education , research , and extension .我们的教育，研究和推广事业必须扩大。
adj. 广泛的；大量的；广阔的 同义词:widespread, massive, comprehensive, substantial, vast It is the only institution so far to extensive use of the grade .剑桥是目前为止唯一一个充分利用到各种级别的机构。

n. 程度；范围；长度 同义词:degree, boundary, region, length, spectrum, territory, area To what extent do you think whether you write tests first or second is a personality choice ?那么，你认为先写测试或后写测试在多大程度上属于一种个人的选择？
adj. 外部的；表面的；外在的 n. 外部；表面；外型；外貌 同义词:outer, outside, surface, facial, aspect, without, colour Urine may drain through one or more skin sinuses to the exterior .尿液可通过一个或几个皮肤窦而流到体外。
adj. 外部的；表面的；[药] 外用的；外国的；外面的 n. 外部；外观；外面 同义词:foreign, outer, outside, surface, out, outside, without, surface, face, garment Why should it depend for recovery on external demand ?其经济复苏为何要依赖于外部需求呢？

adv. 特别地，非常；另外 n. 临时演员；号外；额外的事物；上等产品 adj. 额外的，另外收费的；特大的 同义词:specifically, particularly, badly, highly, greatly, too, walker-on, special edition, additional, added, excess We have a teacher at my school who gives us extra lessons sometimes .我们学校里有名老师有时给我们上一些额外的课程。
adj. 非凡的；特别的；离奇的；临时的；特派的 同义词:remarkable, particular, temporary, special, wonder Our economy is emerging from extraordinary recession into recovery .我们的经济正摆脱衰退到惊人的复苏。

adj. 极端的；极度的；偏激的；尽头的 n. 极端；末端；最大程度；极端的事物 同义词:ultra, excessive, terminal, bottom I admit , sticking around for a whole day is a bit extreme . Here is another example (right).我承认，要一直逗留下来一整天有一些过激。（但）这是另一个例子（图二）
adv. 非常，极其；极端地 同义词:badly, highly, greatly, too, rare Eisenhower was a hero of the war and was an extremely popular man .艾森豪威尔是战争英雄，也是一个非常受欢迎的人。
n. 视力；目力 同义词:vision, sight, eye, seeing They are blind or have poor eyesight so they need a text only browser / reader / Braille reader .他们是盲人或视力不佳等，他们需要一个文本浏览器/卡机/文读本。
n. 设施；设备；容易；灵巧 同义词:equipment, furniture, establishment, plant, fixture Might stringing things together be a core facility of the brain ?串连事物的本领会是我们脑部的核心技能吗？
n. 因素；要素；[物] 因数；代理人 vi. 做代理商 vt. 把…作为因素计入；代理经营；把…分解成 同义词:element, deputy, agent, basic, essential He factored his cousin's estate for five years.他经管他表兄弟的财产有五年之久。
n. 科，系；能力；全体教员 同义词:ability, capacity, competence, department, power She had , of course , no faculty for quenching memory in dissipation .她当然也没有以放荡纵欲来冲淡记忆的能耐。
vi. 褪色；凋谢；逐渐消失 vt. 使褪色 adj. 平淡的；乏味的 n. [电影][电视] 淡出；[电影][电视] 淡入 同义词:peter, color fading, discolor, stupid, literal-minded The blue rug has faded over years.蓝色的地毯多年后已经褪色了。
adj. 华氏温度计的；华氏的 n. 华氏温度计；华氏温标 同义词:Farenheit thermometer, Fah Water freezes at 32 Fahrenheit ( 32 F) or zero / nought degrees Celsius ( 0 C).水结成冰的温度是32华氏度（32）或零摄氏度（0℃）。
n. 失败；故障；失败者；破产 同义词:loss, defeat, losing, fault, trouble All schemes and intrigues are doomed to failure .一切阴谋诡计都是注定要失败的。
adj. 模糊的；头晕的；虚弱的；[医] 衰弱的 vi. 昏倒；变得微弱；变得没气力 n. [中医] 昏厥，昏倒 同义词:fuzzy, weak, dark, vague, pass out, flake out, asphyxy, swound She fainted away with the shock of the news.她听到这个消息后震惊得晕过去了。

adj. 公平的；美丽的，白皙的；[气象] 晴朗的 adv. 公平地；直接地；清楚地 vi. 转晴 n. 展览会；市集；美人 同义词:beautiful, fine, clear, just, impartial, definitely, directly, equally, immediately, straight, expo, exhibition, beauty " I am living proof this election is not free and fair , " he says , " if it was I would still be publishing ".“这次选举不是自由和公正的，我是活的证据”，他说，“如果它是的话，我应该仍然在发行报纸”。
adv. 相当地；公平地；简直 同义词:relatively, simply, comparatively, equally, reasonably He is a fairly good player .他是一个相当好的选手。

n. 信仰；信念；信任；忠实 同义词:belief, confidence, trust, credit, loyalty He says the best heroes are flawed , but are guided by faith in their mission , and in movies they triumph .他说道，最好的英雄是有缺点的，然而他们会受到使命中信仰的指引，并在影片中获胜。
adj. 忠实的，忠诚的；如实的；准确可靠的 同义词:loving, devoted Deep under Old Faithful , where the molten rock is, the pressure is much greater.在老守信湖地下更深处，熔岩活动的地方，气压要高得多。
adj. 错误的；虚伪的；伪造的 adv. 欺诈地 同义词:artificial, wrong, incorrect, improper, inaccurate, trickily But this is almost certainly a false hope as well as a callous policy .但几乎是显然的，这是个错误的希望，同时也是个无情的政策。

n. 名声，名望；传闻，传说 vt. 使闻名，使有名望 同义词:tradition, celebrity, tale A sports career may not last very long , or lead to the wealth and fame that young players may dream of .一个运动员的职业生涯可能并不会持续很长，也不会带来年轻运动员梦想的财富与名誉。

adj. 熟悉的；常见的；亲近的 n. 常客；密友 同义词:conventional, near, close, frequenter, regular customer Some more familiar forms of life , found in much shallower waters , also hold out the promise of new medicines .在很多较浅的水域发现的一些更熟悉的生物，也显示出开发新药物的征兆。
n. 饥荒；饥饿，奇缺 同义词:hunger, fames Warnings of flood , famine , drought and mass extinction merge into an overwhelming sense of futility .洪水、饥荒、干旱和物种灭绝等征候，渐渐化作无法抑制的徒劳感。
adj. 著名的；极好的，非常令人满意的 同义词:noted, wonderful, excellent, super, great He 's a famous conductor in China .他是一位著名的中国指挥家。
vt. 煽动；刺激；吹拂 vi. 成扇形散开；飘动 n. 迷；风扇；爱好者 同义词:stimulate, egg, float, flutter, lover, aficionado He fanned the fire.他用扇子扇火。

n. 幻想；想像力；爱好 adj. 想象的；奇特的；昂贵的；精选的 vt. 想象；喜爱；设想；自负 vi. 幻想；想象 同义词:interest, like, fantasy, expensive, rich, ideal, picked, dear, enjoy, vision, image, have vision of, to imagine Can you fancy him in uniform?你能想像一下他穿制服的样子吗?
vi. 经营；进展；遭遇；过活 n. 票价；费用；旅客；食物 同义词:round, advance, passenger, food, fee, charge, diet He usually fares sumptuously.他平常吃得很丰富。
n. 告别，辞别；再见；再会 int. 别了！（常含有永别或不容易再见面的意思）；再会！ adj. 告别的 同义词:adieux, leave-taking, tara, valedictory to farewell the friends向朋友告别
n. 时尚；时装；样式；时髦人物 vt. 使用；改变；做成…的形状 同义词:mode, style, type, make use of, employ, influence, exercise, shift to fashion a doll from a piece of wood用木块制成玩具娃娃
adj. 流行的；时髦的；上流社会的 同义词:popular, going, modern, ruling, epidemic Fundamentally , from the view point of their own class , the fashionable writers were correct .从根本上看，从他们本阶级的观点看，这些流行作家是正确的。
vt. 使固定；集中于；扎牢；强加于 vi. 扣紧；抓住；集中注意力 同义词:focus on, fix, pay attention, take hold to fasten a boat to a tree by a rope用绳索把船系在树上
adj. 致命的；重大的；毁灭性的；命中注定的 同义词:important, significant, great, fell, kill In drivers and workers it can lead to fatal accidents .这在司机或工人身上可能引发致命的事故。
n. 命运 vt. 注定 同义词:lot, destiny, fortune, portion, cup of tea, predestine, foreordain It was fated that they should fail.他们注定要失败。
n. 岳父；公公；继父 同义词:step-father He met his future father-in - law during his visit to Boston .他在波士顿小住期间遇见了他未来的岳父。
n. 父亲，爸爸；神父；祖先；前辈 vt. 发明，创立；当…的父亲 同义词:dad, root, da, daddy, priest, found, construct, institute He fathered a son.他生了个男孩。
n. 疲劳，疲乏；杂役 vt. 使疲劳；使心智衰弱 vi. 疲劳 adj. 疲劳的 同义词:tiredness, weariness, wear down, tire Climbing the mountain fatigued the whole scout troop.登山使整个侦察连感到疲劳。
n. 故障；[地质] 断层；错误；缺点；毛病；（网球等）发球失误 vi. 弄错；产生断层 vt. （通常用于疑问句或否定句）挑剔 同义词:error, deficiency, defect, mistake, trouble, mistake, err in, carp at, trip up a performance which could not be faulted无可挑剔的演出

adj. 有错误的；有缺点的 同义词:vicious, imperfect But according to a new piece of research , many of these actions — however virtuous — arise from faulty perceptions of energy savings .然而一项新的研究表明，虽然这种行为很高尚，但却是出于一种对能源保护的错误观念。
n. 偏爱；赞同；善行 vt. 赞成；喜爱；有助于 同义词:acceptance, preference, good, mercy, enjoy, agree, aid, uphold We favour your proposal.我们赞同你的提议。
adj. 有利的，顺利的；赞成的 n. 有利 同义词:beneficial, advantageous, smooth, adventage, profitableness A few privileged investors have always been able to gain such favourable terms .一些有特权的投资者一直都能享受如此优惠的条件。
adj. 特别喜爱的 n. 特别喜欢的人或事物 Waiting for my favourite show .等待我最喜爱的节目。
n. 害怕；恐惧；敬畏；担心 vt. 害怕；敬畏；为…担心 vi. 害怕；敬畏；为…担心 同义词:worry, afraid of, be nervous of, be afraid of, be nervous of, be afraid of The plague was greatly feared in the Middle Ages.在中世纪时，这种瘟疫十分可怕。
adj. 可怕的；担心的；严重的 同义词:worried, acute, terrible, afraid, serious A man solitaryly feels very fearful in such place of oneself .自己一个人孤零零地在这样的地方感到很可怕。
adj. 可行的；可能的；可实行的 同义词:possible, working, potential, viable We should take active attitude feasible countermeasures to stride over the green trade barrier .我们应该采取积极的态度，切实可行的对策，跨越绿色贸易壁垒的障碍。
vt. 享受；款待，宴请 n. 筵席，宴会；节日 vi. 享受；参加宴会 同义词:enjoy, guest, festival, holiday, banquet The poor starve while the rich feast.穷人挨饿，而富人在大吃大喝。
n. 羽毛 vt. 用羽毛装饰 vi. 长羽毛 同义词:plume, plume, fledge to feather an arrow给箭装上翎
n. 特色，特征；容貌；特写或专题节目 vi. 起重要作用 vt. 特写；以…为特色；由…主演 同义词:person, characteristic, star Round-the-clock service features this store.日夜服务是这家商店的特色。
n. 二月 February is the shortest month of the year .二月是一年之中最短的一个月。
adj. 联邦的；同盟的 n. 北部联邦同盟盟员；北京连邦软件产业发展公司，国内主要的正版软件经销商 同义词:confederal, fed. A federal judge says the courts should let the military process play out as Congress intended .一个联邦审判员说，法庭应该让军事进程如同国会计划的那样开始。
n. 费用；酬金；小费 vt. 付费给…… 同义词:charge, cost, tip to fee a waiter付小费给侍者
adj. 微弱的，无力的；虚弱的；薄弱的 同义词:weak, small, thin The agreed sanctions after the fighting stopped were feeble .战斗结束后达成的制裁是无力的。
vt. 喂养；供给；放牧；抚养（家庭等）；靠…为生 vi. 吃东西；流入 n. 饲料；饲养；（动物或婴儿的）一餐 同义词:grass, take care of, range, take food, flow into, meal, breeding, husbandry to feed a baby on breast milk用人奶喂养婴儿
n. 反馈；成果，资料；回复 同义词:production, outcome, information One very important caveat : Do not , I repeat , do not rely on feedback from your nearest and dearest .一个非常重要的告诫：不要--我再次重复--不要依赖于你最亲密、最亲爱的人的反馈。
vt. 感觉；认为；触摸；试探 vi. 觉得；摸索 n. 感觉；触摸 同义词:expect, count, guess, find, make, fish for, poke about, consciousness, sense perception Can you tell what this is by feeling it?你能摸出这是什么东西吗?
n. 感觉，触觉；感情，情绪；同情 adj. 有感觉的；有同情心的；富于感情的 v. 感觉；认为（feel的现在分词）；触摸 同义词:mood, consciousness, emotion, affection, spirit, caring, sensing, handling Can you tell what this is by feeling it?你能摸出这是什么东西吗?

n. 家伙；朋友；同事；会员 adj. 同伴的，同事的；同道的 vt. 使…与另一个对等；使…与另一个匹敌 同义词:apple, customer, friend, member, guy, companionate If no one in our household reacts to our desperate need , I'd advise all fellow flower addicts to buy themselves some flowers immediately .如果我们中没有人对这种迫切要求有所反应，我建议所有对花卉着迷的人立即为自己买一些花卉。
adj. 女性的；雌性的；柔弱的，柔和的 n. 女人；[动] 雌性动物 同义词:delicate, feminine, she, jenny Next , the embryo is placed into the uterus of a female animal .然后，这个胚胎被放置在一个雌性动物的子宫里。
n. 栅栏；围墙；剑术 vt. 防护；用篱笆围住；练习剑术 vi. 击剑；搪塞；围以栅栏；跳过栅栏 同义词:bounding wall, perimeter wall, defend, forefend, prevaricate, tergiversate His land is fenced with barbed wire.他的地用带钩的铁丝围起来。
adj. 富饶的，肥沃的；能生育的 n. 肥沃，多产 同义词:rich, viable, pregnancy, enrichment Fertile lands in some states could be mistaken for lakes .有些州肥沃的土地可能会误变成湖泊。
n. [肥料] 肥料；受精媒介物；促进发展者 同义词:manure fertilizer throughout the season , and cut them back if they get leggy in high summer .在整个季节都要施肥，如果他们的茎在夏天时长得过高，需要削减他们。
n. 节日；庆祝，纪念活动；欢乐 adj. 节日的，喜庆的；快乐的 同义词:holiday, joy, celebration, cheerful, enjoyable This festival was for the king of the gods .这个节日是为众神之王举办的。
vt. 取来；接来；到达；吸引 vi. 拿；取物；卖得 n. 取得；诡计 同义词:absorb, attract, engage, draw, strike, take, taking, procurement, scheme, fraud to fetch a pail of water打回一桶水
n. 发烧，发热；狂热 vt. 使发烧；使狂热；使患热病 vi. 发烧；狂热；患热病 同义词:abandon, febricity, fanaticize, run a temperature, go wild yellow fever黄热病

n. 纤维；纤维制品 同义词:fiber, funicle So once the fibre is drawn the researchers apply a very high electric field to it, causing the molecules to align as the fibre cools .因此，一旦选出合适的纤维材料，研究者们就会将其放于高电场中，让纤维分子在其冷却过程中形成一致性。
n. 小说；虚构，编造；谎言 同义词:invention, novel But the most intriguing is the strange world of fan fiction .而最吸引人的莫过于哈迷小说的奇妙世界。
adj. 凶猛的；猛烈的；暴躁的 同义词:fell, violent, hard A cornered cat becomes as fierce as a lion .被逼急的猫会变得像狮子一样凶猛。

n. 数字；人物；图形；价格；（人的）体形；画像 vi. 计算；出现；扮演角色 vt. 计算；认为；描绘；象征 同义词:digital, price, value, number, rate, occur, cast, offer, come out, indicate, expect, guess, find, feel The sculptor figured the girl in clay.雕塑家用粘土塑造了这个女孩子的形象。

n. 文件；档案；文件夹；锉刀 vt. 提出；锉；琢磨；把…归档 vi. 列队行进；用锉刀锉 同义词:document, portfolio, paper, record, folder, introduce, present, prefer, advance, put in, procession Please file (away) those letters in a drawer.请把那些信件归档放入抽屉内。
vt. 装满，使充满；满足；堵塞；任职 vi. 被充满，膨胀 n. 满足；填满的量；装填物 同义词:full of, fulfill, freight, meet, swell with, intumesce, satisfaction, content to fill the tub for a bath把浴盆注满水洗澡
n. 电影；薄膜；胶卷；轻烟 vt. 在…上覆以薄膜；把…拍成电影 vi. 摄制电影；生薄膜；变得朦胧 同义词:movie, membrane, cinema, cinematograph Tears films her eyes.眼泪布满了她的双眼。
vi. 滤过；渗入；慢慢传开 n. 滤波器；[化工] 过滤器；筛选；滤光器 vt. 过滤；渗透；用过滤法除去 同义词:sink in, seep into, strainer, percolator, penetrate, lauter You need to filter the drinking water.你需要把饮用水过滤。
adj. 最终的；决定性的；不可更改的 n. 决赛；期末考试；当日报纸的末版 同义词:ultimate, crucial, critical, decisive, shoot-off, fight-off That was also her final appearance on TV .那也是她在电视中最后一次演出。
adv. 最后；终于；决定性地 同义词:eventually, ultimately, lastly He finally agreed to my plan .最后他同意了我的计划。
n. 财政，财政学；金融 vt. 负担经费，供给…经费 vi. 筹措资金 同义词:policy of tightening control over expenditure and credit, cameralistics, fund raising to finance a plan负担一项计划所需的经费
adj. 金融的；财政的，财务的 同义词:monetary, fiscal This would encourage financial institutions to take more risk .这将鼓励金融机构承受更大的风险。
vt. 发现；认为；感到；获得 vi. 裁决 n. 发现 同义词:detect, earn, acquire, expect, count, discovery, occurrence, detection, anagnorisis He found a few coins in the car.他在汽车里捡到几枚硬币。
n. 发现；裁决；发现物 v. 找到；感到（find的ing形式）；遇到 同义词:discovery, occurrence, detection He found a few coins in the car.他在汽车里捡到几枚硬币。
adj. 好的；优良的；细小的，精美的；健康的；晴朗的 n. 罚款 vt. 罚款；澄清 adv. 很好地；精巧地 同义词:good, ok, healthy, great, robust, monetary penalty, clarify, amerce, well, Okay to fine gold精炼黄金
n. 手指；指针，指状物 vt. 伸出；用手指拨弄 vi. 用指触摸；拨弄 同义词:index, pointer, extend, reach out to finger a piece of cloth揉搓一块布

vt. 完成；结束；用完 vi. 结束，终止；终结 n. 结束；完美；回味（葡萄酒） 同义词:accomplish, carry out, achieve, perform, complete, drop, determine, completion, achievement, execution, perfection, accomplishment to finish the work完成工作
n. 消防队员；救火队员；锅炉工 同义词:pompier fireman directed his hose at the flames .消防队员将水龙头管对准火焰浇水。

adj. 平坦的；扁平的；浅的；单调的 adv. 平直地；断然地 n. 平地；平面；公寓 vi. 变平 vt. 使变平 同义词:even, low, level, shallow, blank, positively, emphatically, apartment, plane, even Alex flat of his hand impatiently on the conference table .亚历克斯有些不耐烦，用手掌重重拍了一下会议桌。

adj. 灵活的；柔韧的；易弯曲的 同义词:elastic, pliable By this reckoning , a flexible body learns to acclimatize to stresses .由此可以判断，灵活可塑的身体学会适应压力。

n. 四十 adj. 四十的；四十个的 同义词:twoscore The flood forty days on the earth .洪水在地上泛滥了四十天；

n. [法] 继承人；后嗣；嗣子 同义词:heritor, haeres Most Heir Advance clients receive a cash advance on their Inheritance almost immediately ! Probate cash advances typically range from $5, 000 to in excess of $100, 000.最大多数的继承人进步客户几乎立刻接受在他们的遗传方面的一个现金进步！遗嘱查验现金前进典型地范围从$5，000到超过$100，000。
n. [航] 直升飞机 vi. [航] 乘直升飞机 vt. 由直升机运送 同义词:copter, whirlybird, verticraft You can helicopter to the island.你可以乘坐直升机去那个岛。
n. 地狱；究竟（作加强语气词）；训斥；黑暗势力 vi. 过放荡生活；飞驰 int. 该死；见鬼（表示惊奇、烦恼、厌恶、恼怒、失望等） 同义词:Sam Hill, sheol, rocket, ball it up, d*amn, Gadsbodikins He was helling around when in Europe.在欧洲期间，他一直过着花天酒地的生活。
n. 钢盔，头盔 同义词:armet, burgonet The combat troops have been helmeted.所有的作战部队均已配备了头盔。
adv. 因此；今后 同义词:therefore, accordingly, consequently, thus, as a result of Hence the importance of the second question .因此第二个问题也十分重要。
pron. 她的；她 I hope it fits on her finger .我希望她戴在手指上很合适。
n. 兽群，畜群；放牧人 vi. 成群，聚在一起 vt. 放牧；使成群 同义词:drove, menagerie, grass, feed, range Wild geese herd to the south in autumn every year.每年秋天大雁都成群结队地飞往南方。
n. 英雄；男主角，男主人公 同义词:chief actor, starring actor You chose a very good hero .你选了一个很好的英雄。
adj. 英雄的；英勇的；记叙英雄及其事迹的；夸张的 n. 史诗；英勇行为 同义词:bold, gallant, epic poetry, epos His heroic saves saw Germany though to the Final in 2002 World Cup .2002年世界杯上，他英勇的救球将德国队送进了决赛。
n. 女英雄；女杰 adj. 英雄式的 Their battle for control of heroine Sookie Stackhouse has not only fueled the show but also polarized fans into two camps .两人为争夺对女主角苏琪·斯塔克豪斯的控制大打出手，不仅为影片增光添色，粉丝们也随之形成两大阵营。
vi. 踌躇，犹豫；不愿 vt. 踌躇，犹豫；有疑虑，不愿意 同义词:vacillate, stand at, stand at, hang back He hesitated and asked me if he could sit near me.他犹豫了一下，问能不能在我身边坐下。
n. 公路，大路；捷径 同义词:high road, chaussee The bus finally pulled off the highway .最后，汽车驶出了高速公路。
n. 山坡，山腹；山腰 同义词:mountainside, brae On the hillside , aspen trees present a similar picture .山坡上的白杨树也有类似的情况。
n. 暗示；线索 vt. 暗示；示意 vi. 示意 同义词:connotation, reminder, implication, allusion, sign, imply, beckon He clearly hinted that he wanted me not to get in.他明白无误地暗示，要我别进去。
n. 雇用，租用；租金，工钱 vt. 雇用；出租 vi. 雇用，租用；受雇 同义词:employment, rental, letting, rent, employ, take on Sometimes he hired two or three labourers to help his harvest.有时他雇上两三名劳工帮他收割。
adj. 历史的；史学的；基于史实的 With the fall of the Roman empire , historical evidence becomes scarce .随着罗马帝国的沦落，历史性的证据变得稀少。
vt. 打击；袭击；碰撞；偶然发现；伤…的感情 vi. 打；打击；碰撞；偶然碰上 n. 打；打击；（演出等）成功；讽刺 同义词:dong, impact on, impact on, beat upon, success, prosperity, victory, blow, stroke She hit him a hard blow.她狠狠地打了他一拳。
n. 嗜好；业余爱好 同义词:weakness, habit, appetite, liking Was it a hobby for them , too ?画画对他们来讲也是一种爱好吗？

adj. 空的；中空的，空腹的；凹的；虚伪的 n. 洞；山谷；窟窿 vt. 使成为空洞 vi. 形成空洞 adv. 彻底地；无用地 同义词:empty, artificial, false, bare, vacant, hole, cavity, cavitate, thoroughly, entirely, completely, fully, tight He hollowed out a cave in the snowfield for night.他在雪原上挖了个洞以过夜。
adj. 圣洁的，神圣的；至善的 n. 神圣的东西 （俚）太棒了 The holy trinity of Davos used to be top politics , big business and high finance .该论坛最圣洁的三类人，曾经是政界领袖、大企业家和金融高管。
n. 诚实，正直 同义词:integrity, truth, good faith, righteousness, veracity Honesty is his most salient characteristic .诚实是他最显著的特点。
n. 蜂蜜；宝贝；甜蜜 adj. 甘美的；蜂蜜似的 vt. 对…说甜言蜜语；加蜜使甜 vi. 奉承；说甜言蜜语 同义词:sweet, mel, luscious, nectared, lick one's boots, make up to He honied my life when he was alive.他活着的时候，我们的生活过得很甜美。
n. 蜜月；蜜月假期；（新生事物、新建关系等的）短暂的和谐时期 vi. 度蜜月 They're going to honeymoon in Europe.他们打算在欧洲度蜜月。
n. 荣誉；尊敬；勋章 vt. 尊敬；[金融] 承兑；承兑远期票据 同义词:glory, respect, medal, worship, accept, regard, esteem, worship He will be always honoured by the people.他将永远受到人民的敬仰。
adj. 荣誉的；值得尊敬的；表示尊敬的；正直的 同义词:straight, square, just It should be said that there were one or two honourable exceptions .应该说，还是有一两个令人敬仰的例外人员。
n. 挂钩，吊钩 vt. 钩住；引上钩 vi. 钩住；弯成钩状 同义词:towing eye, drawhook, hitch I hooked his foot when he passed me and he staggered but didn't fall.他从我身边走过时我勾住了他的脚，他被绊了一个趔趄可并没摔倒。
adj. 绝望的；不可救药的 同义词:forlorn, broken-hearted When you discover that all external hopeless , the only shows that she had a hopeless .当你发现外在的一切都不可救药时，恰恰说明，自己已经无可救药了。
n. [天] 地平线；视野；眼界；范围 同义词:extent, boundary, region, spectrum, territory, area The captain swept the horizon with a telescope .船长用望远镜环视了一下地平线。
adj. 水平的；地平线的；同一阶层的 n. 水平线，水平面；水平位置 同义词:level, aclinic, hydrostatic level, horizon line Also notice the unfortunate use of horizontal scrollbars in all list fields .不过，注意所有的列表域遗憾地使用了水平滚动条。
n. 喇叭，号角；角 vt. 装角于 同义词:angle, hao to horn deer截锯鹿角
n. 惊骇；惨状；极端厌恶；令人恐怖的事物 同义词:fright, naupathia Do you like horror movies ?你喜欢恐怖电影吗？
n. 马；骑兵；脚架；海洛因 vt. 使骑马；系马于；捉弄 vi. 骑马；作弄人 同义词:prad, yarraman, play tricks on, play tricks with, ride to horse a saddle把鞍放在马背上
n. 马力（功率单位） 同义词:soup For medium and horsepower sizes, this method is generally not cost effective .对于中、大功率（马力）的电机，这种方法通常并不是性价比高的方法。
n. 医院 同义词:infirmary The hospital is a gray building .医院是一栋灰色大楼。
n. [计] 主机；主人；主持人；许多 vt. 主持；当主人招待 vi. 群集；做主人 同义词:lots of, sea, hundred, master, thousands of, to chair, preside over, pack, troop Mr. Marce will host a reception tonight.马斯先生将主持今晚的招待会。
n. 女主人，女老板；女服务员；舞女；女房东 同义词:goodwife, mistress Does she accept to hostess my birthday celebration?她答应作我生日庆祝的女主持了吗?
adj. 敌对的，敌方的；怀敌意的 n. 敌对 同义词:adverse, enemy, opposed, opposition, antagonism She is ruled a hostile witness by the judge .她被法官裁定是一个怀有敌意的证人。
adj. 家庭的；日常的；王室的 n. 家庭；一家人 同义词:domestic, family, daily, everyday, routine, family, race In India the starkest divisions are sometimes within the household .在印度，有时最明显的差别体现在家庭中。
n. 家庭主妇 同义词:materfamilias, frow One busy housewife sweeping up the floor .一个繁忙的家庭主妇扫地板。
adj. 人的；人类的 n. 人；人类 同义词:demic, hominine, person, mankind, man, creature, homo Everyone knows that human life is limited .谁都知道，人的生命是有限的。

vt.
使谦恭，使谦卑；使温顺：
to humble oneself
自卑，低声下气

谦恭，温顺

她的一顿数落打掉了他的锐气。

They tried to humble your importance in that achievement.

proud , conceited
to humble oneself自卑，低声下气

adj. 诙谐的，幽默的；滑稽的，可笑的 同义词:funny, witty Cartoons are humorous pictures with words .漫画是附有文字的幽默图片。
n. 幽默（等于humor）；诙谐 vt. 迁就；使满足 同义词:drollness, pleasantry, content, gratify You shouldn't write such obscene things to humour their dirty interests.你可不应该为迎合某些人的低级趣味而写这些乌七八糟的东西。
n. 饿，饥饿；渴望 vi. 渴望；挨饿 vt. 使……挨饿 同义词:aspiration, famine, rare, aspire Do you hunger? I feel hungry.你饿不饿，我有点饿了。
adj. 饥饿的；渴望的；荒年的；不毛的 同义词:eager, desired, anxious, sick, keen Yes . The hungry bird likes nice big frogs .是的。饥饿的鸟喜欢又大又好的青蛙。
vt. 打猎；搜索 vi. 打猎；搜寻 n. 狩猎；搜寻 同义词:seek, beat for, search, nose about, search, shoot to hunt big game猎捕猛兽
n. 匆忙，急忙 vt. 使赶紧；使匆忙，使急忙 vi. 赶紧，赶快；匆忙 同义词:hasty indeed, haste, hasten, get a hump on, make haste We must hurry up,or we'll be late.咱们快点吧，不然就迟到了。

vt. 使受伤；损害；使疼痛；使痛心 vi. 感到疼痛；有坏处；带来痛苦 n. 痛苦；危害；痛苦的原因 adj. 受伤的；痛苦的；受损的 同义词:wound, blast, pain, smart, painfulness, injured, painful, wounded, bitter She fell down the stairs and hurt her leg.她从楼上跌了下来，摔伤了腿。
vt. 节约地使用（或管理） n. 丈夫 同义词:hubby, worse half to husband expenses节约开支
n. 小屋；临时营房 vt. 使住在小屋中；驻扎 vi. 住在小屋中；驻扎 同义词:shed, cottage, cabin, station, quarter We can hut on the mountain tonight.今晚我们可以住在山上的棚屋里。
n. [化学] 氢 Micro cells use energy sources like hydrogen and methanol .微型电池用像氢气、甲醇这样的能源。
adv. 也就是 abbr. （拉丁）即（id est） Those figures fully manifest the most marked characteristic of deformation art i. e . their weirdness and oddness .这些形象充分显示了变形艺术的最突出的特征，即形象的怪诞、离奇。
adj. 冰淇淋的；乳白色的 n. 冰淇淋 同义词:milky, opalescent, ice, gelato I like chocolate ice-cream .我喜欢巧克力冰淇淋。
adj. 理想的；完美的；想象的；不切实际的 n. 理想；典范 同义词:perfect, full, unreasonable, dream, pink, quintessence She is the ideal girl .她是我理想的女孩。
adj. 同一的；完全相同的 n. 完全相同的事物 同义词:self, same Then he let the soup of identical bugs replicate and ferment .然后他令这些一模一样的菌虫复制并发酵。
vt. 确定；识别；使参与；把…看成一样 vi. 确定；认同；一致 同义词:confirm, recognize, ascertain, cotton, square He identified his baggage among hundreds of others.他在几百件行李中认出了自己的行李。
n. 成语，习语；土话 同义词:phrase, dialect Although this is a serious subject , using this idiom indicates a kind of humor as well .尽管这是个严肃的话题，但是还是要用这个成语来表示一种幽默的方式。
adj. 闲置的；懒惰的；停顿的 vi. 无所事事；虚度；空转 vt. 虚度；使空转 同义词:stopped, lazy, sit around, lie about, moon, dream away Don't idle away your time.别浪费光阴。

adj. 无知的；愚昧的 同义词:dark, empty, innocent If so , ignorant investor may pick and choose at random , knowing that her selections will be priced as keenly as any others .如果是这样的话，无知的投资人就可以随机选取，因为她知道自己所选资产的价格会和其他资产一样公道。
vt. 驳回诉讼；忽视；不理睬 同义词:neglect, pass sb by Nobody could ignore these problems.没有谁会忽视这些问题。

adj. [法] 非法的；违法的；违反规则的 n. 非法移民；间谍 同义词:unauthorized, unlawful, espionage, secret agent A few weeks ago a prominent white rancher near the border was killed , possibly by a smuggler or illegal immigrant .几周前，一位著名的白人大农场主在边境附近被杀害，可能是走私者或非法移民所为。
n. 病；疾病 同义词:disease, ill, sickness, complaint, maladie Humans and animals can spread disease even though they show no sign of illness themselves .人和动物可以传播疾病，即使他们自己没有表现出患病迹象。
vt. 阐明，举例说明；图解 vi. 举例 同义词:clarify, elucidate, give an example, cite an example He illustrates the lesson with a picture.他用一张图片来说明这篇课文。
n. 说明；插图；例证；图解 同义词:explanation, notes, legend, diagram This " top " is meant to get enough mud into the well to stop the flow of oil ( see illustration below ).这次“封顶”是是往井内灌入大量泥浆，堵住原油的涌出（见下面的图解）。
n. 影像；想象；肖像；偶像 vt. 想象；反映；象征；作…的像 同义词:icon, portrait, indicate, vision, glass, figure a warrior imaged in bronze用青铜铸成的武士
adj. 虚构的，假想的；想像的；虚数的 同义词:fictitious, figmentary My pet will be an imaginary duck .我的宠物会是一只虚拟的鸭子。
n. [心理] 想象力；空想；幻想物 同义词:vision, revery The imagination imitates . It is the critical spirit that create .想象是模仿，批判的精神才具有创造力。
vt. 想像；猜想；臆断 vi. 想像；猜想；想像起来 同义词:picture, think of, think of, suppose I can hardly imagine such a scene.我无法想像出这样的情景。
vt. 模仿，仿效；仿造，仿制 同义词:simulate, model after He can imitate the cries of birds.他能模仿鸟叫。
adj. 立即的；直接的；最接近的 同义词:instant, direct, right Yet exit is merely the most immediate challenge .不过，退出仅仅是最直接的挑战。
adv. 立即，立刻；直接地 conj. 一…就 同义词:rapidly, directly, soon, now, shortly, directly, than I told him immediately he arrived.他一到我就告诉他了。
adj. 巨大的，广大的；无边无际的；非常好的 同义词:huge, tremendous, enormous, massive, macro She drew immense strength and wisdom from the masses .她从群众中吸取了巨大的力量和智慧。

adj. 移民的；迁入的 n. 移民，侨民 同义词:emigratory, migration, transplantation An immigrant grandmother , for example , may well struggle to communicate with her American - born children .例如，一个移民祖母会筋疲力尽地与她的美国出生的孩子交流。

vt. 影响；撞击；冲突；压紧 vi. 冲击；产生影响 n. 影响；效果；碰撞；冲击力 同义词:affect, influence, reach, work on, strike, charge at, effect, impression, influence, infection, affection The soldier impacted his sword into the ground.那个战士将他的剑紧紧插入地下。
adj. 焦躁的；不耐心的 同义词:fretful Mike: I 'm starting to impatient now . There is another chicken place just down the street , you know .我开始有点不耐烦了。你也知道，就在街那头还有一家鸡肉店。
n. 含义；暗示；牵连，卷入 同义词:connotation, meaning, import, involvement, reminder But the other implication is not so easily proved .但是，相反的推断不是容易证明的。
vt. 意味；暗示；隐含 同义词:mean, hint at His words implied displeasure.他的话暗示出他很不高兴。
n. 进口，进口货；输入；意思，含义；重要性 vt. 输入，进口；含…的意思 vi. 输入，进口 同义词:significance, stress, value, weight, meaning, to input, type in, to input, type in imported goods进口货
n. 价值；重要；重大；傲慢 同义词:moment, price, value, worth, magnitude Rank tasks in order of importance and write them down .按照重要级别对任务进行排位，并且写下来。
adj. 重要的，重大的；有地位的；有权力的 同义词:crucial, considerable, material, big, significant So , as you can see , he was a very important person .由此你们可以看到，他是一个非常重要的人物。
vi. 利用；欺骗；施加影响 vt. 强加；征税；以…欺骗 同义词:do with, trade on, force, levy tax to impose duties on imported wines向进口酒征税
adj. 不可能的；不可能存在的；难以忍受的；不真实的 n. 不可能；不可能的事 同义词:incorrect, unbearable, a blue moon Today it is impossible to cure cancer completely .今天要完全治愈癌症是不可能的。
vt. 盖印；强征；传送；给予某人深刻印象 vi. 给人印象 n. 印象，印记；特征，痕迹 同义词:propagate, print, mark, characteristic, trace to impress one's seal on a letter在信上盖章
n. 印象；效果，影响；压痕，印记；感想 同义词:infection, effect, influence, affection, print You certainly don't want to leave a bad impression .当然，你肯定不会希望留下一个坏的印象吧。
adj. 感人的；令人钦佩的；给人以深刻印象的 同义词:affecting, heart-warming The most impressive find is the nearly complete skeleton of a huge Columbian mammoth .最震撼的发现是几乎完整的一具大型哥伦比亚猛犸的骨架。
vt. 监禁；关押；使…下狱 同义词:prison, jail China frequently uses the charge of subversion to imprison dissidents .中国经常贾用“颠覆政权”来逮捕持不同政见者。
vt. 改善，增进；提高…的价值 vi. 增加；变得更好 同义词:further, build up, gain, accelerate, grow in to improve relationships改善关系
n. 改进，改善 同义词:reforming, amendment, enrichment, amelioration The analysis and improvement processes needed to ensure conformity of the quality management system .测量分析和改进过程需确保质量管理体系的符合性。
n. 英寸；身高；少许 vt. 使缓慢地移动 vi. 慢慢前进 同义词:height, little, touch, worm to inch one's way forward慢慢前进

n. 事件，事变；插曲 adj. [光] 入射的；附带的；易发生的，伴随而来的 同义词:event, circumstance, occurrence, scene, happening, incoming Last year , a member of United States Congress said he has a sleep driving incident .去年，联邦议会的一位成员说他曾有过睡觉开车的事故。

adj. 错误的，不正确的；不适当的；不真实的 同义词:false, impossible, wrong, improper, unhappy Incorrect task type received ! There are only two task type exist : Sending message task and receiving message task .接收到不正确的任务类型！只存在两种任务类型：发送消息任务和接收消息任务。

adv. 越来越多地；渐增地 同义词:pyramidally, cumulatively And many see the current UN conference as the last chance to shore up increasingly threadbare nuclear non - proliferation treaty .而在许多人看来，本次联合国会议是支持越来越显得陈腐的“核不扩散条约”的最后机会。
adv. 的确；实在；真正地；甚至 int. 真的（表示惊讶、怀疑、讽刺等） 同义词:just, sure, even He is an honest man indeed .他确实是一位诚实的人。
adj. 不确定的；无限的；模糊的 同义词:fuzzy, huge, dark, infinite, unsure He gave me indefinite answer .他给我的答复模棱两可。
n. 独立性，自立性；自主 同义词:freedom, juche How do you celebrate Independence Day ?你们怎么庆祝独立日呢?。

adj. 独立的；单独的；无党派的；不受约束的 n. 独立自主者；无党派者 同义词:alone, free, isolated, separate, specialty But independent decisions of firms to hoard labour also help explain unemployment during the crisis and beyond.同时，企业自发决定储藏员工也可以帮助解读危机前和危机时的失业情况。
n. 指标；指数；索引；指针 vi. 做索引 vt. 指出；编入索引中 同义词:finger, indicatrix, to point out, to indicate to index a book给一本书编索引

vt. 表明；指出；预示；象征 同义词:forecast, index, image, shadow, figure to indicate the direction by pointing with one's finger用手指指示方向

n. 指示，指出；迹象；象征 同义词:instruction, symbol, breath, pointing, evidence One indication that this may be what Sinochem is planning is that it has not yet appointed an adviser .这或许正是中化的打算，有一个迹象可以证明这一点：该公司迄今尚未指定交易顾问。
adj. 漠不关心的；无关紧要的；中性的，中立的 同义词:neutral, insignificant I feel indifferent whether I am comprehended or not .不管人家理解不理解我，我都觉得无所谓。
adj. 愤愤不平的；义愤的 同义词:aggrieved Indignant callers jammed the country 's air waves.愤怒的人们不断打电话到国内电台。
adj. 间接的；迂回的；非直截了当的 同义词:circular, consequential The effect on board decisions will be indirect at best .这充其量只能对董事会决议产生间接的影响。
adj. 不可缺少的；绝对必要的；责无旁贷的 n. 不可缺少之物；必不可少的人 同义词:obbligato Your help is indispensable to me .你的帮助对我是绝对必要的。
adj. 个人的；个别的；独特的 n. 个人，个体 同义词:personal, different, subjective, distinct, unique, unity, private person At the individual level , no one can blame these graduates .从个人层面讲，谁都无权指责这些毕业生。
adv. 在室内，在户内 One easy way to create an uplifting mood indoors is to add some color .要在室内产生愉快心情的一个简单方法是添加一些颜色。
adj. 工业的，产业的；从事工业的；供工业用的；来自勤劳的 n. 工业股票；工业工人 Demand for industrial salt is steady and predictable .工业盐需求是稳定且可预测的。

n. 产业；工业；勤勉 同义词:domain, manufacturing The industry prevailed in each case .三起案件，音乐产业均胜诉。

adj. 无效率的，效率低的；无能的 同义词:helpless, talentless Not only will the boom end in a cyclical bust , but inefficient investment will also drag down China 's long-term growth rate .不但这次的投资热会在周期性的泡沫中结束，而且无效的投资也会将中国的长期增长率拖下来。
adj. 必然的，不可避免的 同义词:certain, necessary, automatic That does not mean a downgrade is inevitable , however .然而，这并不意味着降级是不可避免的。
adj. 便宜的 同义词:cheap, ten-cent It's a diet for a new Depression . Foods we 've always known are good and nutritious -- and inexpensive .对新的抑郁症是一种饮食。我们一直熟知的食物是好的，有营养的，而且不贵。
n. 婴儿；幼儿；未成年人 adj. 婴儿的；幼稚的；初期的；未成年的 同义词:baby, minor, earlier, young, baby, minor, tender Objective To study the clinical value of parotid gland hemangioma operation in infant .目的了解手术治疗婴幼儿腮腺血管瘤的临床价值。
vt. 感染，传染 同义词:affect, contract, catch, disease, communicate She was infected with tuberculosis.她被传染上了肺结核。
vt. 推断；推论 vi. 推断；作出推论 同义词:understand, conclude, reason, conclude, deduce from to infer a motive from an effect从效果推知动机
adj. 差的；自卑的；下级的，下等的 n. 下级；次品 同义词:junior, lower, lessness, subordinate The speaker claims that competition teaches inferior enterprises how to survive and develop .发言人称竞争教会了较差的企业如何去生存与发展。

adj. 无限的，无穷的；无数的；极大的 n. 无限；[数] 无穷大；无限的东西（如空间，时间） 同义词:huge, tremendous, thousand, million, boundless, Mugen, immenseness We must accept finite disappointment , but we must never lose infinite hope .我们必须接受有限的失望，但是不能失去无限的希望。
n. 影响；势力；感化；有影响的人或事 vt. 影响；改变 同义词:effect, infection, impression, affection, incidence, affect, impact of, impact on, reach, fashion The weather influences crops.天气影响收成。

adj. 有影响的；有势力的 同义词:mighty, predominant These positions can be a chance to learn about the government and the business and the chance to meet influential people .这些职位能够提供给大家学习关于政府、商业知识的机会，并且有认识有影响力人物的机会。

n. 信息，资料；知识；情报；通知 同义词:feedback, advice, notice, knowledge of, cognition This is good information to know when you buy .这是买车时你能了解到的一条好信息。

n. 居民；居住者 同义词:liver, resident, dweller, habitant The inhabitant is predispose to rheumatism by the damp climate .因气候潮湿，居民易患风湿症。

adj. 最初的；字首的 vt. 用姓名的首字母签名 n. 词首大写字母 同义词:premier, original an initialed handkerchief绣有姓名首字母的手帕

n. 伤害，损害；受伤处 同义词:harm, damage Weather is a predominant influence in the causation of cold injury .在招致寒冷损伤中，气候是一个突出的影响因素。

n. 客栈；旅馆 vi. 住旅馆 同义词:hotel, roadhouse The fame of southern hospitality has bolstered the region 's hotel chains , such as Inn .南方的热情好客极大的支撑了像是假日酒店这种酒店连锁业的发展。

adj. 无辜的；无罪的；无知的 n. 天真的人；笨蛋 同义词:dark, empty, clear, simple, turkey, put The suspect says he is innocent .此嫌疑人称自己是无辜的。

n. 里面；内部；内情；内脏 adj. 里面的；内部的；秘密的 adv. 在里面 prep. 少于；在…之内 同义词:interior, within, inner, internal, inner, secret, underground, chamber, within, under, in inside the house在房子里面

n. 视察，检查 同义词:examination, checking, monitoring They are using sensors and a camera at the end of the shuttle 's robot arm for the inspection will take about 5 hours .他们在航天飞机机械手端部用一些传感器和一台摄像机进行检查，这将持续约5个小时。
vt. 激发；鼓舞；启示；产生；使生灵感 同义词:stimulate, lift, wake, spirit, effect His speech inspired the soldiers.他的演说使士兵们大受鼓舞。

adj. 立即的；紧急的；紧迫的 n. 瞬间；立即；片刻 同义词:immediate, urgent, emergency, hot, pressing, moment, breath, second The penalty for helping Jews was instant execution .帮助犹太人的面临的处罚是立即处决。
adv. 立即地；马上地；即刻地 conj. 一…就… 同义词:promptly, offhandedly I telegraphed instantly I arrived there.我一到达那里就打电报。
adv. 代替；反而 He should invite his friends here instead of going out .他应该把朋友邀请到这儿来，而不是出去。
n. 本能，直觉；天性 adj. 充满着的 同义词:intuition, natural ability, abrim Cats live instinct .猫靠本能生存。
vt. 开始（调查）；制定；创立；提起（诉讼） n. 学会，协会；学院 同义词:found, construct, father, initiate, academy, college, union, school to institute a government建立政府
n. 制度；建立；（社会或宗教等）公共机构；习俗 同义词:system, convention Once more , the markets seem to be hanging on the fate of one big financial institution .各大金融市场的走向似乎再一次系于某家大型金融机构的命运。

n. 仪器；工具；乐器；手段；器械 同义词:facilities, vehicle, engine, tool, implement Using tax policy is a very blunt instrument .利用税收政策是一种非常生硬的工具。

adj. 不足的，不充足的 n. 不足 同义词:short, deficient, lacking, wanting, shortage, short of, lack, scarcity In his view differences in adaptation insufficient to create niches commensurate in number and kind .按照他的观点，适应的差异不足以在数量上和种类上形成同量的小生境。

n. 保险；保险费；保险契约；赔偿金 同义词:assurance, safety, premium, compensation Review and update your business insurance coverage .检查和更新公司的保险范围。
vt. 确保，保证；给…保险 vi. 确保；投保 同义词:undertake, assure, to ensure, snake stare to insure one's house against fire给房屋保火险
adj. 智力的；聪明的；理智的 n. 知识分子；凭理智做事者 同义词:wise, bright, clever, smart, understanding, clerisy Optimism is an intellectual choice .乐观是一种明智的选择。
n. 智力；情报工作；情报机关；理解力 同义词:brain, mind, mentality, understanding, head This is ( a ) high level conference intelligence challenges .这是一个关于挑战的高水平会议。
adj. 智能的；聪明的；理解力强的 同义词:wise, bright, clever, smart, understanding The intelligent boy can understand the classical physics clearly.这个聪明的男孩能弄明白经典物理。
vt. 打算；想要；意指 vi. 有打算 同义词:feel like, propose, wanna, think, desire to intend to do something想做某事

n. 强度；强烈；[电子] 亮度；紧张 同义词:stress, tension, brightness Light intensity is the most important environmental factor .光照强度是最重要的环境因素。
adj. 加强的；集中的；透彻的；加强语气的 n. 加强器 同义词:enhanced, reinforced, concentrated, searching, mass Pest control is one of the major areas of concern in intensive agriculture .病虫害防治是集约型农业所关心的主要方面之一。

n. 意图；目的；意向；愈合 同义词:goals, purpose, sake, meaning, will He may have no intention of disarming himself, only of provoking division among the other five across the table .他并没有接触核武装的意图，仅仅是采用分化谈判桌上的其他五个国家的策略。
adj. 故意的；蓄意的；策划的 同义词:studied, designed, conscious I am sorry I hit you ; it was not intentional .很抱歉我打中了你；我不是故意的。
n. 相互作用；[数] 交互作用 同义词:reciprocity, mutual effect Scientists call the interaction of light with phonons the Raman effect .科学家将光与声子的交互作用称为拉曼效应。
n. 兴趣，爱好；利息；趣味；同行 vt. 使……感兴趣；引起……的关心；使……参与 同义词:like, fond of It interests me enormously.这让我感兴趣。
adj. 有趣的；引起兴趣的，令人关注的 We can see lots of interesting things .我们能看见许多有趣的事情。
vi. 干涉；妨碍；打扰 vt. 冲突；介入 同义词:influence in, meddle in, impact, collide with interests interfering with each other互相冲突的利害关系
n. 干扰，冲突；干涉 同义词:conflict, disturbance, war, obstacle, collision In fact , depending on the geometry , wave interference can cause the signal to vanish altogether .事实上，在某些几何状况产生的波动干涉，也可能造成信号完全消失。
n. 内部；本质 adj. 内部的；国内的；本质的 同义词:essence, principle, texture, entity, inner, inner, domestic, essential, inside, home Some think he was an interior designer .有人说野口勇是室内设计师。

vi. 起媒介作用 adj. 中间的，中级的 n. [化学] 中间物；媒介 同义词:mid, medium, middle, secondary, medium, intermediary agent The reason is that parts and components from China are important intermediate inputs into US exports .原因是，中国的零部件和组件是美国出口重要的的中间投入。
adj. 内部的；内在的；国内的 同义词:inner, inherent, domestic, inside, home In cold weather , the body reacts by routing blood away from the skin toward the internal organs .在寒冷的天气里，身体的感觉会通过流动的血液从皮肤带到内在器官。
n. 国际比赛；国际性组织 adj. 国际的；世界的 同义词:mundane The World Poker Tour ( WPT ) also hosts a series of international tournaments each year .世界扑克巡回赛（WPT）每年同样主办一系列国际性的锦标赛。
vt. 说明；口译 vi. 解释；翻译 同义词:say, bring sb to do sth, account, translate to interpret a term解释一个词语
n. 解释；翻译；演出 同义词:explanation, translation, construction, account I see , thanks for your kind interpretation .我知道了，谢谢你热心的解释。
n. 解释者；口译者；注释器 同义词:expounder And an interpreter might work as a translator .一个口译人员也可做翻译的工作。
vt. 中断；打断；插嘴；妨碍 vi. 打断；打扰 n. 中断 同义词:let, violate, cut in on, to break in on, break, broken off Sorry to interrupt . Shouldn't we get back on topic ?抱歉打断一下，我们是不是该回到正题上？
n. 中断；干扰；中断之事 同义词:break, disturbance, obstacle Abortion refers to the interruption of pregnancy prior to the 7th month .流产是指在第7个月以前怀孕状态的中止。
n. 间隔；间距；幕间休息 同义词:separation, distance Continuation of play after the interval was ruled out by rain .原定茶点小憩后继续进行的比赛因下雨而取消了。
n. 接见，采访；面试，面谈 vt. 采访；接见；对…进行面谈；对某人进行面试 同义词:audience, cover, to receive to interview the president采访总统
adj. 亲密的；私人的；精通的；有性关系的 n. 知己；至交 vt. 暗示；通知；宣布 同义词:private, close, perfect, chamber, confidant, alter ego, bill, message He intimated to me his intention of leaving early.他向我暗示他要早些离开。
vt. 介绍；引进；提出；采用 同义词:present, recommend, prefer, file, advance Allow me to introduce a friend to you.让我给你介绍一个朋友。
n. 介绍；引进；采用；入门；传入 同义词:presentation, adoption The introduction of foreign species is a global phenomenon .引进外来物种是一种全球性的现象。
vt. 侵略；侵袭；侵扰；涌入 vi. 侵略；侵入；侵袭；侵犯 同义词:strike, make inroads into, make inroads into, intrude upon a country which has been ruthlessly invaded一个受到野蛮侵略的国家
n. 入侵，侵略；侵袭；侵犯 同义词:violence, aggression, infringement More recently the Arabs have been buffeted by the invasion of Iraq .最近，阿拉伯人又因为入侵伊拉克而受到打击。
vt. 发明；创造；虚构 同义词:father, coin to invent a space rocket发明宇宙火箭
n. 发明；发明物；虚构；发明才能 同义词:fiction, contrivance I think steam engine is the greatest invention .我认为最伟大的发明是蒸汽机。

n. 发明家；[专利] 发明人；创造者 同义词:creator, artificer At some point in Italy between 1268 and 1289 someone came up with the idea , but the actual inventor remains anonymous .在意大利1268年到1289年时，有人提出了这个设想，但实际的发明者仍然处于匿名状态。
vt. 投资；覆盖；耗费；授予；包围 vi. 投资，入股；花钱买 同义词:fund, award, give, house, sheet, invent money in, plow into to invest money in stocks投资股票

n. 调查；调查研究 同义词:research, probe I still insist that without investigation there cannot possibly be any right to speak .不但不悔，我仍然坚持没有调查是不可能有发言权的。
n. 投资；投入；封锁 同义词:input, introjection At home also he listened to considerable talk of financial investment and adventure .他在家里也曾听到许多金融投资和金融投机的谈话。
adj. 无形的，看不见的；无形的；不显眼的，暗藏的 同义词:intangible, discarnate, aeriform He questioned Adam Smith 's emphasis on the invisible hand .他对亚当·史密斯对“无形的手”的强调表示怀疑。
n. 邀请；引诱 同义词:calling, temptation Yes , I know . I appreciate your invitation .是的，我知道，感谢你的邀请。
vt. 包含；牵涉；使陷于；潜心于 同义词:contain, comprise to be involved in a scandal卷入丑闻

adj. 向内的；内部的；精神的；本质上的；熟悉的 adv. 向内；内心里 n. 内部；内脏；密友 同义词:internal, inner, mental, familiar, spiritual, inboard, interior, inner, inside, familiar The net effect is that the particle is pushed inward .最后的净效应就是粒子被向内推。
n. 熨斗；烙铁；坚强 vt. 熨；用铁铸成 adj. 铁的；残酷的；刚强的 vi. 熨衣；烫平 同义词:sadiron, flatiron, cruel, ferrous to iron a shirt flat将衬衫熨平整

vt. 使隔离；使孤立；使绝缘 n. [生物] 隔离种群 vi. 隔离；孤立 adj. 隔离的；孤立的 同义词:segregate, seclude, cordon off, to stand alone, shielded, insular The patient was immediately isolated.病人被立即隔离。
n. 问题；流出；期号；发行物 vt. 发行，发布；发给；放出，排出 vi. 发行；流出；造成…结果；传下 同义词:question, flux, discharge, exhaust, discharge, shed They issued out into the street.他们涌到街上。
adj. 意大利的；意大利文化的；意大利语的 n. 意大利人；意大利语 同义词:ginzo, dino Six Italian divers will try life under water for a while .六名意大利潜水员打算尝试上一阵水底生活。
n. 条款，项目；一则 同义词:event, provision, clause, article Trade is a top item on the agenda for the APEC summit in Sydney , along with climate change .商贸与气候改变一起是在悉尼举行的亚太经合组织峰会的头等议程项目。
n. 夹克；短上衣 vt. 给...穿夹克；给...装护套 同义词:jerkin, lammy Mr Berger pulls a collection of photos from jacket pocket to prove his point .伯杰先生先生从口袋中拿出一些收集的照片以证明他的观点。
n. 监狱；监牢；拘留所 vt. 监禁；下狱 同义词:prison, big house, prison, imprison One of the black suspects ( served ) nearly 10 months jail .其中一名黑人嫌疑犯被判10个月的监禁。
n. 果酱；拥挤；困境；[篮球]扣篮 vt. 使堵塞；挤进，使塞满；混杂；压碎 vi. 堵塞；轧住 He jammed his clothes into a black suitcase.他把衣服塞进了一只黑手提箱。
n. 一月 But January 's rise in the claimant count is a worrying portent .但是一月份申请人数的增加是一个令人担忧的预兆。

n. 罐；广口瓶；震动；刺耳声 vi. 冲突；不一致；震惊；发刺耳声 vt. 震动；刺激；使震动 同义词:pot, shock, collide with, conflict with, stimulate, fan, shock People still remembered the earthquake that had jarred this region last July.人们仍然记得去年七月发生的使该地区产生剧烈震动的那次地震。
n. 颌；下巴；狭窄入口；唠叨 vi. 教训；唠叨 vt. 教训；对…唠叨 同义词:chin, jowl, rabbit on, lesson The two women jawed together all day about their children.那两位妇女唠叨了一整天有关她们孩子的事。
n. 爵士乐，爵士舞；喧闹 vi. 奏爵士乐，跳爵士舞；游荡 vt. 奏爵士乐；使活泼 adj. 爵士乐的；喧吵的 同义词:Jass, rumpus, louse around, potter about, enliven, activate, loud They jazzed up after a round of beer.喝过一巡酒之后，他们更加兴高采烈了。
adj. 妒忌的；猜疑的；唯恐失去的；戒备的 同义词:leary, leery Like I really care . I am jealous .好像我真的介意似的。我是吃醋了。
n. 喷射，喷嘴；喷气式飞机；黑玉 adj. 墨黑的 vt. 射出 vi. 射出；[航] 乘喷气式飞机 同义词:emission, ejection nozzle, coal-black, jet-black, shoot out, send up, shoot out, send up Water was jetting profusely from the pipe.水从管子里汩汩喷出。
n. 宝石；珠宝 vt. 镶以宝石；饰以珠宝 同义词:gem, gemstone The jewel in her ring is a diamond .她戒指上的珠宝是颗钻石。
adj. 犹太人的；犹太族的 He also happened to be Jewish .而他恰好还是一名犹太人。
n. 工作；职业 vt. 承包；代客买卖 vi. 做零工 同义词:profession, employment, career, pursuit, work, contract with I once interviewed him for a job .我曾经为一份工作面试过他。

vt. 参加；结合；连接 vi. 加入；参加；结合 n. 结合；连接；接合点 同义词:participate in, become one, couple, take part in, go through, become one, couple, bond, participate in, combine, combination, connection, coupling, bond, wedding How do you join these broken pieces together?你是如何将这些碎片连接起来的?

n. 关节；接缝；接合处，接合点；（牛，羊等的腿）大块肉 adj. 共同的；连接的；联合的，合办的 vt. 连接，贴合；接合；使有接头 vi. 贴合；生节 同义词:seam, junction, mutual, corporate, common, linked, connected, cement, piece, couple Align mark on front joint , or CV joint , to the mark on the axle pinion yoke , or flange .将前万向节或cv万向节上的标志与车轴小齿轮轴轭或凸缘上的标志对准。
n. 玩笑，笑话；笑柄 vt. 开…的玩笑 vi. 开玩笑 同义词:fun, sport, make sport of, play trick on, fool, kid around I was only joking.我只不过是在开玩笑。

adj. 愉快的；欢乐的；宜人的 adv. 很；非常 vt. （口）用好话劝某人做…；（口）用好话使高兴 vi. （口）开玩笑 同义词:good, bright, grateful, fragrant, cheerful, greatly, quite, badly, extremely, too, highly, far, fool, kid around, to play a joke, to joke I know she's trying to jolly me along.我知道她在努力使我高兴。
n. 日报，杂志；日记；分类账 同义词:magazine, diary This is your " worry " journal .这是你的“担忧”日记。
n. 新闻工作者；报人；记日志者 同义词:newspaperman, jounalist Within a single semester , I decided to be a journalist .仅仅一个学期，我就决定要去作一名记者。
n. 旅行；行程 vi. 旅行 同义词:tour, trip, travel, have a trip, go on a trip, wayfare He journeyed on foot.他徒步旅行。

adj. 欢喜的；令人高兴的 同义词:glad, fulfilling He felt joyful to listen to jazz .他听到爵士音乐就高兴。
vt. 判断；审判 n. 法官；裁判员 vi. 审判；判决 同义词:estimate, pass upon, justice, bands, determine, sentence to The woman was finally judged guilty.那个女人最终被判有罪。
n. 意见；判断力；[法] 审判；评价 同义词:opinion, appraisal, evaluation, comment, view Each generation has its own standards of judgement .每一代都有它自己的判断标准。
n. （水果）汁，液；果汁 同义词:extract, syrup Mother is juicing some grapes.母亲正在榨葡萄汁。
n. 跳跃；暴涨；惊跳 vt. 跳跃；使跳跃；跳过；突升 vi. 跳跃；暴涨；猛增 同义词:spring, leaps and bounds, bound, clear, dance, dance, to leap He jumped with joy when he heard the good news.当他听到这一好消息时高兴得跳了起来。
n. 丛林，密林；危险地带 adj. 丛林的；蛮荒的 同义词:mott, chaparral, backwoods This jungle must be cleared .这片丛林必须清理。
adj. 年少的；后进的；下级的 n. 年少者，晚辈；地位较低者；大学三年级学生 同义词:inferior, lower Junior Achievement is an organization that teaches young people about finance and business .初级的成果是一个帮助年轻人关于财政和生意的组织。
n. [法] 陪审团；评判委员会 adj. 应急的 同义词:quick-fix, lash-up The verdict of jury sufficiently shows how the evidence preponderated in their minds .陪审员的裁决充分说明他们心里偏重于哪一方面的证据。

vi. 证明合法；整理版面 vt. 证明…是正当的；替…辩护 The act was barely justified by the circumstances.这些情况不足以证明这一行为是正当的。
adj. 敏锐的，敏捷的；渴望的；强烈的；热心的；锐利的 n. 痛哭，挽歌 同义词:acute, intense, eager, pointed, burning, elegy, dirge to keen a knife磨快刀子
n. 监护人；饲养员；看守人；管理人 同义词:supervisor, guardian, administrator An old poacher makes the best keeper .惯偷可做最佳看守人（以盗制盗）。
n. 壶；[化工] 釜；罐；鼓 同义词:pot, drum Keep the kettle at the boil .使水壶里的水保持沸腾。
n. 键盘 vt. 键入；用键盘式排字机排字 vi. 用键盘进行操作；作键盘式排字机排字 同义词:keyset, key panel, klavier, key in A computer has a keyboard .一台电脑配有一个键盘。
vt. 踢；反冲，朝后座 n. 踢；反冲，后座力 vi. 踢；反冲 同义词:boot, back flushing, backflushing, bounce-back, back flushing The little girl was crying and kicking.那个小女孩一边哭 一边乱踢着。
n. 公斤；千克 同义词:Kgs. In one day they eat about half a kilogram of leaves .它们在一天当中吃掉约半公斤的树叶。

n. [计量] 公里；[计量] 千米（等于kilometre） 同义词:klick, klik Extrapolating from the findings so far , we estimate that each has about 100 irregular moons larger than one kilometer in diameter .以目前的发现用外插法来推算，我们估计出每颗巨行星大约有100颗直径超过一公里的不规则卫星。

n. 王国；界；领域 同义词:domain, province, territory, world, universe The lush jungle paradise they created inevitably caught the attention of the neighboring kingdom of Siam now known as Thailand .他们创建的奢华的丛林天堂不可避免地引起了邻国暹罗王国（即现在的泰国）的注意。

n. 厨房；炊具；炊事人员 同义词:cookroom Yes , you have to clear up the kitchen afterwards .对，做完蛋糕后不得不收拾厨房。

vi. 跪下，跪 同义词:drop to one's knees, go down on one's knees to kneel down to pray跪下祈祷
n. 刀；匕首 vt. 用刀切；（口）伤害 vi. 劈开；划过 同义词:sword, chiv, injure, scar, to break open The victim was knifed in the chest.受害者胸部被刺了一刀。
vi. 编织；结合；皱眉 vt. 编织；结合 n. 编织衣物；编织法 同义词:couple, bond, become one, combine, become one, couple, link She's knitting herself a sweater.她正在给自己织毛线衫。
n. 把手；瘤；球形突出物 vi. 鼓起 vt. 使有球形突出物 同义词:handle, node, summon up, belly The stigma is the sticky knob at the top of the pistil .柱头是长在雌蕊最顶端的带有粘性的球。
vi. 敲；打；敲击 vt. 敲；打；敲击；批评 n. 敲；敲打；爆震声 同义词:strike, hit, strike, stroke, dong, beating to knock somebody on the head打某人的头
n. （绳等的）结；节瘤，疙瘩；海里/小时（航速单位） vt. 打结 vi. 打结 同义词:ties, nodus, tie off, tie off He's knotting a tie.他正在打领带。
n. 知识，学问；知道，认识；学科 同义词:information, awareness, science, learning, discipline Knowledge , truth , and information flow in networks and swarm systems .知识、真理和信息在网络和群体系统内流动。
vt. 标注；贴标签于 n. 标签；商标；签条 同义词:ticket, brand, logo, tag The steel can was labelled “flammable”.这个钢罐贴有“易燃品”的标签。
n. 实验室，研究室 同义词:lab That water tower stands behind our laboratory .那个水塔位于我们实验室后面。
n. 劳动力，人工；分娩 vi. 劳动；分娩；费力地前进 同义词:delivery, manpower, swink They labour assiduously for the benefit of future generations.他们为造福于后代而勤奋地劳动。
n. 花边；鞋带；饰带；少量烈酒 vt. 饰以花边；结带子 vi. 系带子 同义词:tie, gymp The parents began to tell the little child how to lace his shoes.父母开始告诉小孩如何系好鞋带。
vt. 缺乏；不足；没有；需要 vi. 缺乏；不足；没有 n. 缺乏；不足 同义词:ask, claim, fail, low in, shortage, short of, deficiency, need, drought The committee lacked a correct estimate of his ability.委员会对他的能力缺乏正确的评价。
n. 阶梯；途径；梯状物 vi. 成名；发迹 vt. 在……上装设梯子 同义词:mechanism, approach, pass, raise oneself, make his mark It is annoying when stockings ladder.长统袜抽丝时真叫人扫兴。

n. 落后；迟延；防护套；囚犯；桶板 vt. 落后于；押往监狱；加上外套 vi. 滞后；缓缓而行；蹒跚 adj. 最后的 同义词:backwardness, prisoner, trail, take the dust of, file over, titubate, finishing, last, eventual, rearmost, dernier If we lag behind other nations in economy, we will be thrown into a passive position.如果我们在经济上落后于其他国家，我们就会陷于被动。
n. 羔羊，小羊；羔羊肉 vt. 生小羊，产羔羊 vi. 生小羊，产羔羊 同义词:kidlet, yeanling Let me help the lamb .我去帮助那只小羊。
adj. 跛足的；僵痛的；不完全的；无说服力的 vi. 变跛 vt. 使跛；使成残废 同义词:incomplete, half, founder, cripple A bullet lamed the soldier for life.一粒子弹让这个士兵一生跛足。
n. 登陆；码头；楼梯平台 v. 登陆（land的ing形式） 同义词:pier, disembarkation, disembarking But there was a serious problem after the landing .但是，在溅落后发生了一个严重的问题。
n. 女房东；女地主；女店主 同义词:hostess landlady complains of his staying up late at night .女房东对他的熬夜表示不满。
n. 房东，老板；地主 同义词:boss, employer landlord put a new stove in my room .房东在我房间里放了一个新暖炉。
n. 小巷；航线；车道；[篮球]罚球区 同义词:vector, driveway Do you know the chicken man who lives across the lane ?你知道那个在小胡同的交叉口卖烤鸡的人吗？
n. 语言；语言文字；表达能力 同义词:tongue, parole Learning a new language is fun .学习一种新语言很有趣！
n. 灯笼；提灯；灯笼式天窗 同义词:scaldfish Colour the tiger lantern brown .把老虎灯笼涂成棕色。
n. 一圈；膝盖；下摆；山坳 vt. 使重叠；拍打；包围 vi. 重叠；轻拍；围住 同义词:circuit, knee, invest, case, wash, tap, close in on He used to lap the page where he stopped reading.他常把读到的那一页折起来。
adv. 主要地；大部分；大量地 同义词:mainly, basically, mostly, primarily, freely I use the Web largely to communicate information about the organization .我大量地使用网络技术来交流有关组织的信息。
n. 激光 By sweeping a laser along the pipe to change the local wave speed , physicists might be able to create a horizon .将雷射沿著管路扫过，可以改变局部的波速，运用这种方式，物理学家也许可以创造出视界来。

n. 末尾，最后；上个；鞋楦（做鞋的模型） adj. 最后的；最近的，最新的；仅剩的；最不可能…的 vi. 持续；维持，够用；持久 vt. 度过，拖过；使维持 adv. 最后地；上次，最近；最后一点 同义词:foot, tail-end, recent, finishing, latest, current, nearest, abide, persist, spend, weather through, recently, newly, of late The meeting lasted 7 hours.会议开了七个小时。
adv. 近来，不久前 同义词:of late, odd-come-shortly Have you seen any good shows lately ?你最近看过什么好的演出吗?。
adj. 拉丁语的；拉丁人的 n. 拉丁语；拉丁人 That is good news for Latin America , and especially for its poor .对拉丁美洲来说这是个好消息，尤其是对那里的穷人。
adj. 后者的；近来的；后面的；较后的 同义词:back, rear Martin makes a valiant effort on the latter score, but it rings hollow.马丁在这方面做出了勇敢的努力，但听起来有点空洞。
n. 笑；笑声 同义词:risus The first wealth is health . Laughter , the best medicine .健康是首要的财富。而大笑是最好的药品。

vt. 发射（导弹、火箭等）；发起，发动；使…下水 vi. 开始；下水；起飞 n. 发射；发行，投放市场；下水；汽艇 同义词:release, send, project, drive, let go, proceed, start in, emission, shot, sending, projection, loose In 1970,China successfully lauched a man-made satellite.1970年，中国成功地发射了一颗人造卫星。
n. 洗衣店，洗衣房；要洗的衣服；洗熨；洗好的衣服 同义词:cleaners, loundry Today was a good day for laundry .表示说，今天是洗衣服的好日子。
n. 厕所，盥洗室 同义词:john, convenience, bathroom, toilet The first is: does the coffee chain really smell like a lavatory ?第一，星巴克的咖啡连锁店里，是否的确有一股子厕所味？
n. 草地；草坪 同义词:grass, meadow The lawn is the archetypal enemy .草坪就是个典型的敌人。
vt. 躺下；产卵；搁放 adj. 世俗的；外行的 n. 位置；短诗；花纹方向 vi. 下蛋；打赌 v. 躺；位于（lie的过去式） 同义词:to lie down, strange, mundane, location, situation, site, slot, stake, make a bet a blow laid him in the dust他被一下打倒在地
n. 层，阶层；地层 vt. 用压条法培植；把...堆积成层 vi. 借助压条法生根繁殖 同义词:thickness, degree, stratum, tier Mists layered thick about them.层层雾气将他们笼罩。
n. 布局；设计；安排；陈列 同义词:programming, exposure, disposal, showing, design Now they want to discuss a layout .如今他们想要讨论杂志编排。

n. 领导；铅；导线；榜样 vt. 领导；致使；引导；指挥 vi. 领导；导致；用水砣测深 adj. 带头的；最重要的 同义词:guidance, mirror, example, aim, officer, captain, boss, account, result in, supreme, principal, main The schoolmaster met us and led us round the campus.校长接待了我们，带我们在校园里转了转。
n. 领导者；首领；指挥者 同义词:chief, Moses, captain, boss, conductor As a labor leader , he was jailed for organizing a series of strikes .作为工人领袖，他因为组织了一系列罢工而被监禁。
n. 领导能力；领导阶层 The first requirement is political leadership , especially from America and China .首先要求的是政治表率，尤其是美国和中国。
adj. 领导的；主要的 n. 领导；铅板；行距 v. 领导（lead的ing形式） 同义词:primary, major, central, great, ruling, guidance, linewidth The schoolmaster met us and led us round the campus.校长接待了我们，带我们在校园里转了转。

n. 联盟；社团；范畴 vt. 使…结盟；与…联合 vi. 团结；结盟 同义词:alliance, union, association, society, corporation, category, stand in with, rally, unite He also said that his Pakistan Muslim League ( Nawaz ) party would boycott the poll .他还说他领导的巴基斯坦穆斯林联盟党将抵制民意测验。
n. 泄漏；漏洞，裂缝 vt. 使渗漏，泄露 vi. 漏，渗；泄漏出去 同义词:crack, split, reveal, divulge, seep Our ship is leaking.我们的船漏了。
vi. 倾斜；倚靠；倾向；依赖 adj. 瘦的；贫乏的，歉收的 vt. 使倾斜 n. 瘦肉；倾斜；倾斜度 同义词:pitch, slope, tend, affect, poor, thin, spare, slope, tilt, slope, gradient The flagpole leans to the south.旗杆向南倾斜。
vi. 跳，跳跃 n. 飞跃；跳跃 vt. 跳跃，跳过；使跃过 同义词:jump, dance, jump, spring, bound, jump, clear He leapt into the river.他跳入河中。
adj. 博学的；有学问的；学术上的 同义词:knowing, wise, accomplished, read, scholarly Critics also say a long summer vacation causes students to forget much of what they learned .批评家们也说一个长的暑假会使学生忘记很多他们所学到的知识。
n. 学习；学问 v. 学习（learn的现在分词） 同义词:knowledge, study, letter, studying I loved learning .我喜欢学习。
adj. 最小的；最少的（little的最高级） adv. 最小；最少 n. 最小；最少 同义词:lowest, minimum, smallest He knows most who speaks least .知道最多的人说话最少。
n. 皮革；皮革制品 vt. 用皮革包盖；抽打 adj. 皮的；皮革制的 同义词:leder, whip, skinny He leathered the slave black and blue.他用皮鞭把奴隶抽打得浑身青一块紫一块。
n. 演讲；讲稿；教训 vt. 演讲；训诫 vi. 讲课；讲演 同义词:speech, lesson, address, talk, discourse upon, prelect, dissertate He was invited to lecture on American literature at our college.他被请到我们学院讲授美国文学。
adj. 法律的；合法的；法定的 同义词:legitimate, lawful LEGAL 】 Hunting is legal only in certain seasons .打猎只有在某些季节才是合法的。
n. 传奇；说明；图例；刻印文字 同义词:explanation, notes, romance, illustration Over the centuries the truth about the King has become blurred by his legend .几个世纪过去了，有关这位国王的真相已被其传奇所模糊。
n. 闲暇；空闲；安逸 adj. 空闲的；有闲的；业余的 同义词:ease, idlesse, available, off How do you usually spend your leisure time ?你的空闲时间通常是怎么度过的？
adj. 柠檬色的 n. 柠檬 同义词:citreous, citrus limon Here are the shrimp cocktail, lemon chicken , French fried potatoes , and vanilla ice cream .这是白灼虾、柠檬鸡、法式炸土豆和香草冰激凌。
n. 长度，长；时间的长短；（语）音长 同义词:extent, longness As genomes grew in length , internal selection began to rule the genome .随着基因组长度的增长，内部选择开始控制基因组。
n. [摄] 镜头；透镜；[解剖] 晶状体 vt. 给……摄影 同义词:cryst It gathers light and captures images from the lens , much like film in thea camera .它像照相机里的胶卷一样从晶状体里收集光线并捕捉图像。
adv. 较少地；较小地；更小地 adj. 较少的；较小的 prep. 减去 n. 较少；较小 同义词:fewer, minor, minus a month less 4 days一月差4天
vt. 使…变小；使…减轻；使…变少 vi. 减少；减轻；变小 同义词:to cut down, fall off to lessen production costs降低生产成本
n. 教训；课 vt. 教训；上课 同义词:lecture, indoctrinization, attend class, have a class The first lesson of fundraising is limit yourself to a single cause .筹款的入门课就是要将自身限定为一项单一事业。
conj. 唯恐，以免；担心 He got up early that morning lest he should miss the train.他那天早上起得很早，生怕误了火车。

n. 水平；标准；水平面 adj. 水平的；平坦的；同高的 vi. 瞄准；拉平；变得平坦 vt. 使同等；对准；弄平 同义词:criterion, standard, norms, prototype, horizontal, flat, even, aim for, take aim at, platten The builders level(l)ed the site and erected a new plant building on it.建筑者们将场地平整好，然后建造了一个新厂房。
n. 杠杆；控制杆 vt. 用杠杆撬动；把…作为杠杆 vi. 用杠杆撬 同义词:Control arm, heaver The child levered up the stone slab,but found nothing.小孩撬起了石板，但什么也没有发现。
adj. 有责任的，有义务的；应受罚的；有…倾向的；易…的 同义词:responsible, bound, accountable, prone I only want to know if you have anything liable for tax .我只是想知道你们有什么要上税的东西。
n. 说谎的人 A boaster and liar are all one .爱吹牛的人和骗子都是一丘之貉。

adj. 自由主义的；慷慨的；不拘泥的；宽大的 n. 自由主义者 同义词:generous, handsome, latitudinarian The liberal answer is to respect people as individuals, regardless of the genetic hand that they have been dealt.自由主义的答案是必须尊重个人的独立性，无论这个人具有什么样的遗传基因。
vt. 解放；放出；释放 同义词:deliver, issue, emancipate They liberated all war prisoners from the concentration camp.他们将所有战俘从集中营里解放出来。

n. 释放，解放 同义词:release, emancipation He has crushed , divided and co- opted opponents since he won power as a liberation hero in the election that heralded independence in 1980 .自1980年作为民族解放的英雄赢得宣布独立的选举后，他就一直采取打压，分化，拉拢对手的手段。
n. 自由；许可；冒失 同义词:freedom, permission, leave Do no through fear of poverty surrender liberty .不要因为畏惧贫穷而放弃自由。
n. 图书馆员；图书管理员 同义词:library technician Yes , I asked librarian to help me .找到了，我请图书管理员帮忙了。
n. 图书馆，藏书室；文库 同义词:athenaeum, bibliotheca Over there is our library .那边是我们的图书馆。
n. 执照，许可证；特许 vt. 许可；特许；发许可证给 同义词:permit, patent, permit, charter The restaurant is not licensed for the sale of spirits.这家餐馆未获准出售烈酒。
vt. 舔；卷过；鞭打 vt. （非正式）战胜 vi. 舔；轻轻拍打 n. 舔；打；少许 同义词:tongue, hide, hit, little, touch, beating Allan licked the postage stamp and stuck it on the envelope.阿伦舔了舔邮票，把它贴在信封上。
n. 盖子；眼睑；限制 vt. 给…盖盖子 同义词:limitation, qualification, restriction, cover They forgot to lid the garbage can.他们忘了盖垃圾桶了。
vi. 躺；说谎；位于；展现 vt. 谎骗 n. 谎言；位置 同义词:sit, tell a story, location, situation, site, fiction, leasing She is lying in bed with a severe cold.她因重感冒躺在床上。
n. 中尉；副官；助理人员 同义词:Lieutenant Junior Class, looie It will not fool any Germans above the rank of Lieutenant .不过骗不了那些少尉以上阶级的德国人。
vi. 减轻；发亮 vt. 使照亮；使轻松 同义词:lamp, to alleviate, rest Several candles lightened the darkness of the basement.几支蜡烛照亮了黑暗的地下室。
adv. 轻轻地；轻松地；容易地；不费力地 同义词:easily, gently, easy, readily He would spring onto the terrace , lift the steak lightly off the fire .他就纵身跳上地坪，轻轻地把牛排从火上取下来。
adj. 闪电的；快速的 n. 闪电 vi. 闪电 同义词:fast, sudden, levin, bolt It lightninged just as we walked out of the building.就在我们走出大楼时打起闪来了。

vt. 喜欢；想；愿意 vi. 喜欢；希望 prep. 像；如同 adj. 同样的；相似的 n. 爱好；同样的人或物 adv. 可能 conj. 好像 同义词:love, think, prefer, affect, as per, similar, alike, interest, bent, fond of, perhaps, maybe, supposedly, on the cards, forse Tom is like his father in looks.汤姆的相貌像他父亲。

adj. 很可能的；合适的；有希望的 adv. 很可能；或许 同义词:applicable, becoming, shaped, possible, promising, probably, belike Bolster core actions with those related to the future you deem most likely .以与你相信最为可能的未来相关的东西来支持核心行动。
adv. 同样地；也 同义词:equally, too, similarly, also, same The insurgency in Kashmir , likewise , is seen as a means of bogging down the old enemy , India .同理，克什米尔叛乱也是让印度这一老牌敌人陷入困境的手段。
n. 肢，臂；分支；枝干 vt. 切断…的手足；从…上截下树枝 同义词:extremitas, offshoot The tree was felled and limbed.树被伐倒并被砍去枝条。
n. 石灰；酸橙；绿黄色 vt. 撒石灰于；涂粘鸟胶于 adj. 绿黄色的 同义词:kalk, calcareousness to lime picket fences用石灰水涂刷栅栏
n. 限制；限度；界线 vt. 限制；限定 同义词:restriction, qualification, barrier, block, to bound The teacher limited her to 800 words for her composition.老师将她的作文限定在800字以内。
n. 限制；限度；极限；追诉时效；有效期限 同义词:restriction, threshold, qualification, terminal It is both her incomparable strength and her ultimate limitation .这既是她的无比的力量，又是她的最终局限性。
adj. 有限的 n. 高级快车 同义词:finite, narrow, Ld. Everyone knows that human life is limited .谁都知道，人的生命是有限的。
n. 亚麻布，亚麻线；亚麻制品 adj. 亚麻的；亚麻布制的 同义词:flax, flaxen I quite like the linen . How much is one piece ?我很喜欢亚麻的。多少钱一块儿？
n. 班轮，班机；衬垫；画线者 同义词:pad, airliner On the liner bound for New Amsterdam people are always filled with anticipation .在驶向新阿姆斯特丹的客 轮上，人们心里都满怀期 待。

n. [计] 链环，环节；联系，关系 vt. 连接，连结；联合，结合 vi. 连接起来；联系在一起；将人或物连接或联系起来 同义词:relationship, connection, bearing, contact, concern, couple, become one They planned to build a highway to link the two towns.他们打算修一条公路将两个城镇连接起来。
n. 嘴唇；边缘 vt. 以嘴唇碰 adj. 口头上的 vi. 用嘴唇 同义词:margin, suburb She lipped the cup.她用嘴唇接触杯子。
adj. 液体的；清澈的；明亮的；易变的 n. 液体，流体；流音 同义词:mobile, bright, variable, clear, crystal, fluid The liquid falls from the container drop by drop.该液体一滴一滴地从容器内掉下来。
n. 酒，含酒精饮料；溶液；液体；烈酒 vi. 喝酒，灌酒 vt. 使喝醉 同义词:solution, fluid, wine, knock over a drink, intoxicate He was liquored up by his colleagues.他被同事灌醉了。
n. [计] 列表；清单；目录 vi. 列于表上 vt. 列出；记入名单内 同义词:statement, directory, bill, content He listed all the members' names on the card.他把所有会员的名字都记在卡片上。
vi. 听，倾听；听从，听信 n. 听，倾听 同义词:hear, hark, ear She likes to listen to music in her spare time.她喜欢在余暇时间听音乐。
n. 听众 同义词:audience Let your listener answer one question at a time .让你的听众一次回答一个问题。
n. [计量] 公升（容量单位） 同义词:litre A metric unit of volume equal to one- tenth ( 10 - 1 ) of a liter .分升容量的公制单位之一，等于1／10（10-1）升。
adj. 文学的；书面的；精通文学的 同义词:written By sheer force of personality he managed to infiltrate literary society and had various bits and pieces published .全然凭借个人的彰显的风格，他成功跻身文学界，也有零星的作品得以发表。
n. 文学；文献；文艺；著作 同义词:writing, letter It was a period of great literature and art .这是一段伟大的文学和艺术繁荣的时期。
adj. 小的；很少的；短暂的；小巧可爱的 adv. 完全不 n. 少许；没有多少；短时间 同义词:tiny, few, small, brief, passing, far from, touch, trait A little girl . A little girl .一个小女孩。一个小女孩。
adj. 活泼的；生动的；真实的；生气勃勃的 同义词:alive, actual, sincere, telling, vivid All of the pretty emotion lively like an action .世间所有美丽的情感抵不过一次可爱的行动。
n. 肝脏；生活者，居民 同义词:resident, dweller Enteric diseases are diseases that affect the gut and other abdominal organs such as the liver .消化道疾病是发生在消化道或其他内脏器官，例如肝，中的疾病。
n. 起居室 同义词:keeping room, living room/lounge The three of them went silently into living-room .三个人静悄悄地走进起居室。

adj. 活的；现存的；活跃的；逼真的 n. 生活；生存；生计 v. 生活；居住（live的ing形式）；度过 同义词:realistic, existing, active, excited, going, life, existence, livelihood, keep, subsistence, spending, dwelling She outlived her son by many years.她比她儿子还多活了好几年。
n. 负载，负荷；工作量；装载量 vi. [力] 加载；装载；装货 vt. 使担负；装填 同义词:charge, working capacity, charge up, chamber a wagonload of coal一车煤
n. 条，一条面包；块；游荡 vt. 游荡；游手好闲；虚度光阴 vi. 游荡；游手好闲；虚度光阴 同义词:bar, piece, block, mass, louse around, potter about, louse around, potter about He likes to loaf about at weekends.周末他爱闲逛。
n. 贷款；借款 vi. 借出 vt. 借；借给 同义词:debt, credit, borrowing, borrow, lend to The teacher loaned her a dictionary.老师借给她一本词典。
n. [计] 局部；当地居民；本地新闻 adj. 当地的；局部的；地方性的；乡土的 同义词:native, partial, regional, provincial Sorghum is important to the local food supply .高粱对于本地粮食供应是重要的。
vt. 位于；查找…的地点 vi. 定位；定居 同义词:lie on, stand on, beach, make one's pitch They decided to locate a branch in Paris.他们决定在巴黎设一个分店。
vt. 锁，锁上；隐藏 vi. 锁；锁住；卡住 n. 锁；水闸；刹车 同义词:key, pocket, chain up, seize up, spoke, brake Don't forget to lock (up) the back door.别忘了锁后门。
adj. 火车头的；运动的；移动的 n. 机车；火车头 同义词:moving, sport, athletic, kinetic, engine, haulage motor A locomotive pounded dong the railway track .一辆机车沿铁道隆隆地前行。
n. 旅馆；门房；集会处；山林小屋 vt. 提出；寄存；借住；嵌入 vi. 寄宿；临时住宿 同义词:hotel, fonda, introduce, present, prefer, file, advance, board, guest He lodged the tourists for a night.他让游客们临时住了一晚。
vi. 伐木 vt. 切；伐木；航行 n. 记录；航行日志；园木 同义词:lumber, incise, page, register He logged the timber into 3 foot lengths.他将木材锯成3英尺的段木。
n. 逻辑；逻辑学；逻辑性 adj. 逻辑的 Even now , I still believe the logic is compelling .即使是现在，我仍认为其逻辑是有力的。
adj. 合逻辑的，合理的；逻辑学的 同义词:reasonable, rational, possible, just, legitimate Those who do not already have faith will not come away with a logical reason to believe .那些没有宗教信仰的人们不必找寻一种信仰的逻辑理由去追随上帝。
adj. 寂寞的；偏僻的 n. 孤独者 同义词:remote, doleful I am now a lonely being , disunited from society .我现在是一个孤独的人，与社会隔离了。
vi. 打环；翻筋斗 n. 环；圈；弯曲部分；翻筋斗 vt. 使成环；以环连结；使翻筋斗 同义词:somersault, annulus, anulus They looped a rope around the thief.他们用绳子把那个贼捆了起来。

adj. 宽松的；散漫的；不牢固的；不精确的 vt. 释放；开船；放枪 vi. 变松；开火 adv. 松散地 n. 放纵；放任；发射 同义词:weak, discursive, deliver, free, fire, fluff, emission, sending, shot, launch, projection to loose a tiger from a cage把老虎从笼子里放了出来
vt. 放松；松开 vi. 放松；松开 同义词:relax, lighten up, relax, lighten up to loosen a knot解结
n. 主；上帝 int. 主，天啊 vt. 使成贵族 vi. 作威作福，称王称霸 同义词:Creator, Providence, gosh, jiminy, come it over He lorded it over the committee.他对委员会指手画脚。
n. （英）卡车；[车辆] 货车；运料车 同义词:truck, wagon The house vibrates whenever a heavy lorry passes .每逢大汽车经过时，该屋就震动。
vt. 浪费；使沉溺于；使迷路；遗失；错过 vi. 失败；受损失 同义词:spend, waste on, founder, come to naught Many people lost their jobs because of the economic depression.由于经济萧条，许多人失业了。
n. 减少；亏损；失败；遗失 同义词:reduction, failure, decrease, losing, reverse Publishers are more worried about the loss of advertising revenue than readership .出版商更担心的是广告收入——而非读者群——的流失。

n. 命运；一块地；一堆；抽签；份额 vt. 划分 vi. 抽签；抓阄 adv. 非常；相当 同义词:fate, destiny, fortune, portion, crowd, plot, to divide, draw straws, draw cuts, extremely, badly, highly, greatly, too Yet , it can take lot of time just to choose the right one .然而，人们可能仅为选择一本合适的日历花费很多时间。
adj. 大声的，高声的；不断的；喧吵的 adv. 大声地，高声地，响亮地 同义词:ceaseless, unceasing, aloud, ringingly Why do you play the TV loud ?你为什么把电视声音开得这么大。
n. 喇叭，扬声器；扩音器 同义词:speaker, mike, horn, amplifier The voltage of the amplified signal at the loudspeaker is 2V .扬声器放大了的信号的电势为2伏。

n. 爱人，恋人；爱好者 同义词:fan, hon Love is a sweet tyranny , because the lover endures his torment willingly .爱情是甜蜜的专横，因为爱人乐意忍受这些折磨。
vt. 减弱，减少；放下，降下；贬低 vi. 降低；减弱；跌落 adj. 下游的；下级的；下等的 同义词:take the edge off, feather out, bring down, play down, junior, inferior Lower the window shade,please.请拉下遮光窗帘。
adj. 忠诚的，忠心的；忠贞的 n. 效忠的臣民；忠实信徒 同义词:loving, devoted, faithful Historians believe she was the daughter of a family loyal to Britain .历史学家认为，这个女人是一个亲英家庭的女儿。
n. 忠诚；忠心；忠实 同义词:faith, devotion They still show amazing loyalty to their parents .他们仍对父母表现出惊人的忠诚。
adj. 幸运的；侥幸的 同义词:fortunate, providential Now they would be lucky to reach a third .现在若是能达到三分之一都算幸运的。
n. 行李；皮箱 同义词:belonging, baggage Have my luggage take up , please .请帮我把行李拿上来吧。
vi. 伐木；喧闹地向前走；笨重地行动，缓慢地移动 vt. 砍伐木材；乱堆 n. 木材；废物，无用的杂物；隆隆声 同义词:log, wood, waste, timber, refuse, garbage The valley was lumbered hard 2 years ago.这个山谷两年前被大肆采伐过。

n. 块，块状；肿块；瘤；很多；笨人 vt. 混在一起；使成块状；忍耐；笨重地移动 vi. 结块 adj. 成团的；总共的 adv. 很；非常 同义词:piece, block, tumor, mass, node, tough, resist, gross, volumed, greatly, quite, badly, extremely, too, highly, far to lump dough把生面做成块状
n. 奢侈，奢华；奢侈品；享受 adj. 奢侈的 同义词:enjoyment, luxe, extravagant, Lucullian The business concept behind the Hoxton is described as " luxury budget".霍克顿背后的商业概念可以形容为“廉价豪华”。
n. 机械，机器；机构；机械般工作的人 vt. 用机器制造 同义词:organization, robot, house The material is easy to machine.这原料易于用机器加工。
adj. 疯狂的；发疯的；愚蠢的；着迷的 n. 狂怒 同义词:crazy, possessed, foolish, stupid, bugs, fury, agriothymia Do it hard . Look mad .做出非常生气的样子。
n. 夫人；女士；鸨母 同义词:Mrs, Miss, wife Dear Madam(书信用语)尊敬的女士(为Dear Sir之对)
n. 杂志；弹药库；胶卷盒 同义词:journal, mags This magazine will discontinue .这家杂志将停刊。

n. 磁铁；[电磁] 磁体；磁石 同义词:aimant, leading stone magnet has polarity .磁铁具有极性。
adj. 地磁的；有磁性的；有吸引力的 同义词:geomagnetic Similarly , a condensate moves along a magnetic matter waveguide as a beam of matter .同样地，凝聚态以物质波束的型态能顺著磁性物质波导移动。
adj. 高尚的；壮丽的；华丽的；宏伟的 同义词:grand, noble, brave It is magnificent . It compares with other great buildings here in Europe .真是宏伟壮丽，可以媲美欧洲其它伟大的建筑。

n. 大陆；本土 adj. 大陆的；本土的 同义词:continent, landmass, continental, indigenous People could also travel to the mainland by motorboat or water plane .人们也可以乘坐摩托艇或水上飞机去大陆旅游。
adv. 主要地，大体上 同义词:basically, mostly, largely, primarily, chief The insurgents are now aiming mainly at Iraqi military targets .叛乱分子现在主要针对伊拉克军事目标。
vt. 维持；继续；维修；主张；供养 同义词:pursue, submit, sustain, advocate, service He maintained his rights.他维护了自己的权利。
n. 维护，维修；保持；生活费用 同义词:conservation, keep Instead maintenance will be possible only in good weather .但天气好的条件下维修将成为可能。
adj. 主要的；重要的；主修的；较多的 n. [人类] 成年人；主修科目；陆军少校 vi. 主修 同义词:crucial, important, primary, considerable, central, adult My major was Economics and Trade .我主修的是经济与贸易。
n. 多数；成年 同义词:plurality, multitude The majority of his colleagues wished to utilize " our time " to rearm as rapidly as possible.他的多数同僚希望利用这个“我们的时代”来尽快地重新武装起来。
adj. 男性的；雄性的；有力的 n. 男人；雄性动物 同义词:vigorous, energetic, boy, tom, guy, he, man We know that AIDS is transmissible from male to female .大家都知道，艾滋病可以由男性传给女性。

n. 管理；管理人员；管理部门；操纵；经营手段 同义词:governance, supervision, regulation, control, conservancy The next great development in risk management was the swap .接下来的风险管理的大发展是掉期合同。
n. 经理；管理人员 同义词:executive, gerente Could you introduce me to the manager ?能请您把我介绍给经理吗?。
n. 人类；男性 同义词:humanity, people Only human who can save mankind from the machines .惟一能够拯救机器世界中的人类的人。
adj. 男子气概的；强壮的；适于男人的 adv. 雄赳赳地 同义词:strong, tough I am a manly man, with smart head and perfect body , as you see , perfect as the landscape !毕加索一般健壮的男子气概，聪敏的头脑，完美的身体，完美得象那风景，如你所见。
n. 方式；习惯；种类；规矩；风俗 同义词:way of, mode, category, variety, nature They styled their house in the Portuguese manner .他们以葡萄牙的风格设计他们的房子。
adj. 手工的；体力的 n. 手册，指南 同义词:handmade, mechanic, guide, handbook, notebook They look at the computer manual .他们查看电脑说明书。
