pron. 许多；许多人 adj. 许多的 同义词:numerous, multiple, hundred, lotsa, plentiful It also suggests that many voters want change .这样意味着许多选民也希望改革。

n. 大理石；大理石制品；弹珠 adj. 大理石的；冷酷无情的 同义词:mable, sarcophagus, hard, coldhearted A white marble cinerary casket sells at about 3000 yuan , said an employee at the Babaoshan Funeral Home .八宝山殡仪馆的工作人员说，一个白色大理石骨灰盒售价为3000元左右。
n. 边缘；利润，余裕；页边的空白 vt. 加边于；加旁注于 同义词:profit, gain, brink, suburb They said they had margined up.他们说他们已付保证金了。
adj. 船舶的；海生的；海产的；航海的，海运的 n. 海运业；舰队；水兵；（海军）士兵或军官 同义词:nautical, sea-born, shipping industry, bluejacket European scientists are trying to find ways of farming more marine fish .欧洲科学家正在尝试找到养殖更多的海洋鱼群的方法。

adj. 已婚的，有配偶的；婚姻的，夫妇的；密切结合的 n. 已婚者 v. 结婚，与…结婚（marry的过去式） 同义词:marital, matrimonial He married a beautiful girl.他娶了一个漂亮的姑娘。

adj. 了不起的；非凡的；令人惊异的；不平常的 同义词:remarkable, extraordinary, unusual, amazing, wonder Its color and design are marvelous ; its drawing contemptible .它的颜色和图案是惊人的，它的图画却很无聊。
n. 马克思主义者 adj. 马克思主义的 Marxist philosophy holds that the law of the unity of opposites is the fundamental law of the universe .马克思主义的哲学认为，对立统一规律是宇宙的根本规律。

n. 块，团；群众，民众；大量，众多 adj. 群众的，民众的；大规模的，集中的 vi. 聚集起来，聚集 vt. 使集合 同义词:piece, block, lots of, wealth, ocean, sea, concentrated, intensive, wholesale, concentrate, collect, crowd Crowds massed along the road where the film star would pass.人群聚集在电影明星要经过的街道旁。

vt. 控制；精通；征服 n. 硕士；主人；大师；教师 adj. 主人的；主要的；熟练的 同义词:possess, contain, regulate, bit, bottle, teacher, professor, artist, host, great, experienced, primary, major, skilled, central She has never mastered the art of public speaking.她从没掌握演讲的艺术。
n. 杰作；绝无仅有的人 同义词:chef-d'oeuvre, magnum opus The artistic zealot devoted his life to the completion of a great masterpiece .这位艺术热心者奉献他一生来完成一幅伟大的作品。

vt. 使比赛；使相配；敌得过，比得上；相配；与…竞争 vi. 比赛；匹配；相配，相称；相比 n. 比赛，竞赛；匹配；对手；火柴 同义词:equal, rival, suit, balance, competition, game, tournament, play, contest The duke matched his daughter with the king's son.公爵把女儿嫁给了王子。

n. 助手，大副；配偶；同事；配对物 vt. 使配对；使一致；结伴 vi. 交配；成配偶；紧密配合 同义词:friend, assistant, brother, aid, fellow, accord, unify, copulate, close fit This result raises the problem , though , of what happens to the parasite when infected females fail to find a mate .不过这个结论引起了问题：要是感染的雌性无法找到伴侣，那麽寄生菌的命运会怎样？
adj. 重要的；物质的，实质性的；肉体的 n. 材料，原料；物资；布料 同义词:crucial, important, considerable, big, major, stuff, ingredient The fuel might be wood , charcoal or any other burnable material .燃料也许是木材、木炭或者其它任何可燃的物质。
n. 唯物主义；唯物论；物质主义 As for capitalism 's wasteful materialism , even Adam Smith had a problem with it .就资本主义浪费的物质主义来说，即使亚当。斯密也颇有微辞。
adj. 数学的，数学上的；精确的 同义词:accurate, precise, strict, rigid, refined Exact mathematical explanations of this diversity are some way off , but people are working on them .目前关于这种多样性仍没有精确的解释，不过人们仍在研究它们。
n. 数学；数学运算 同义词:arith A contact with a lightning calculator inspired him to study mathematics .同快速计算器的一次接触，激励他去研究数学。
n. 数学（等于mathematics） 同义词:arith He is Mr. Wang , our Maths teacher .他是王先生，我们的数学老师。

adj. 成熟的；充分考虑的；到期的；成年人的 vi. 成熟；到期 vt. 使…成熟；使…长成；慎重作出 同义词:developed, adult, due, age, flower She matured earlier than him.她比他成熟得早。
n. [数] 极大，最大限度；最大量 adj. 最高的；最多的；最大极限的 同义词:ceiling amount, highest, supreme, peak, top, most The pursuit of maximum profit seems destined to prevail .追逐利润最大化似乎注定将会盛行。
n. 市长 同义词:burgomaster, demarch " We can only make achievements with scale , " says the mayor , a former tractor factory engineer .曾经是拖拉机厂工程师的赵市长说，“我们只能通过规模来取得成就。”
n. 草地；牧场 同义词:grass, field, lawn Far away in the meadow gleams the silver Charles .远处的草地上，银色的查尔斯河闪闪发光。
adj. 平均的；卑鄙的；低劣的 vt. 意味；想要；意欲 n. 平均值 vi. 用意 同义词:poor, average, base, dirty, feel like, wanna, desire, imply, intend, general average, medium value She never meant anything of the sort.她决没有那种意思。
n. 意义；含义；意图 adj. 意味深长的 v. 意味；意思是（mean的ing形式） 同义词:significance, intention, will, import, offer, significant, eloquent She never meant anything of the sort.她决没有那种意思。
n. 手段；方法；财产（mean的复数） v. 意思是；打算（mean的第三人称单数） 同义词:ways, methods, techniques, modes, assets, purposes The thin atmosphere means Mars gets very cold .大气层稀薄意味着火星十分寒冷。
n. 其时，其间 adv. 同时；其间 同义词:together, simul meantime you know who to blame .同时，你也会知道谁是罪魁祸首。
adv. 同时，其间 n. 其间，其时 同义词:together, simul Meanwhile , people with face blindness must find ways to cope .同时，脸盲者必须找到方法来对付这种情况。
adj. 可测量的；重要的；重大的 同义词:important, crucial, considerable, material, big to measure the cliff测量悬崖的高度
n. 测量；措施；程度；尺寸 vt. 测量；估量；权衡 vi. 测量；估量 同义词:extent, degree, survey, dimension, size, sound, scale, estimate, take stock of, weigh up to measure the cliff测量悬崖的高度
n. 测量；[计量] 度量；尺寸；量度制 同义词:survey, dimension, size Displacement is measurement of the actual changing location of the ground due to shaking .地震位移是用来表示由于震动所产生的地壳实际位置变化。
n. 技工，机修工 adj. 手工的 同义词:servicemen, technical worker, manual, handmade I took it to mechanic yesterday .我昨天把它拿到修理工那里去了。
adj. 机械的；力学的；呆板的；无意识的；手工操作的 同义词:wooden, automatic, dead A soul has to be found in a mechanical act , the soulless labor of operating a camera.我们必须在机械的行为和没有灵魂的照相机操作过程中找到灵魂。
adv. 机械地；呆板地；物理上地 同义词:automatically, woodenly Even cars that were mechanically sound started rusting .甚至机械性能方面并无问题的车子也开始生锈。

n. 勋章，奖章；纪念章 同义词:decoration, gong He received a medal for his heroism .他由于英勇而获得一枚奖章。

n. 地中海 adj. 地中海的 Eels are fast vanishing from Mediterranean , swordfish from the Indian Ocean .鳗鲡正从地中海快速消失，剑鱼正从印度洋消失。
adj. 中间的，中等的；半生熟的 n. 方法；媒体；媒介；中间物 同义词:mid, intermediary, middle, secondary, moderate, method, approach, way, system, how A medium coffee of the day , please .请给我一杯中杯的本日咖啡。
n. 会议；会见；集会；汇合点 v. 会面；会合（meet的ing形式） 同义词:session, congress, assembly, gathering, rendezvousing I met an old school friend today.今天我遇到了一位老校友。
n. 瓜；甜瓜；大肚子；圆鼓鼓像瓜似的东西 同义词:muskmelon Mornings , before daylight , I slipped into cornfields and borrowed a water- melon .早晨天亮以前，我常常摸到玉米地里去，借上一个西瓜。
vi. 熔化，溶解；渐混 vt. 使融化；使熔化；使软化；使感动 n. 熔化；熔化物 同义词:flux, fuse, oil, soften up, fusion, burnoff Great heat melts iron.高温使铁熔化。
n. 成员；会员；议员 同义词:fellow, insider One member of the surgical team administers the checklist .外科小组的一名成员负责管理清单。
n. 纪念碑，纪念馆；纪念仪式；纪念物 adj. 记忆的；纪念的，追悼的 同义词:monument, cenotaph, recordative, mnemonic In front of the memorial .在纪念碑的前面。
n. 记忆，记忆力；内存，[计] 存储器；回忆 同义词:mind, retention They will strike a medal in memory of the great victory .他们将冲制一枚纪念章纪念这场伟大的胜利。
vt. 修理，修补；改善；修改 vi. 改善，好转 n. 好转，改进；修补处 同义词:improve, repair, doctor, modify, change for the better, polish up, reforming, improvement in Can you mend this broken chair?你能修理这把破椅子吗?
adj. 精神的；脑力的；疯的 n. 精神病患者 同义词:spiritual, inner, psychopath, madman Many mental patients can not memorize much .很多精神病人不能记住很多。
vt. 提到，谈到；提及，论及；说起 n. 提及，说起 同义词:indicate to, make reference to, reference, allusion He mentioned that he might be leaving.他说起过他也许要离开。
n. 菜单 同义词:carte, memu Let me menu the travel schedule for next week.让我来编下周的旅行安排。
n. 商人，批发商；店主 adj. 商业的，商人的 同义词:trader, dealer, commercial, shoppy That merchant stacked up considerable profits in a few months .那个商人在几个月内就积聚起大量利润。
n. 水银；水银柱；精神 同义词:energy, spirit, soul, mind, genius Parachutes lowered the Mercury spacecraft to the ocean surface .降落伞将“水星”号航天器降落到海面。

n. 仁慈，宽容；怜悯；幸运；善行 同义词:humanity, tolerance, kindness, charity, good As a small mercy to foreigners , the PBOC posted an English version of its announcement on its website .央行也向外国人发了小小的慈悲，在其网站上公布了这份公告的英文版本。
adv. 仅仅，只不过；只是 同义词:simply, just, only, but, barely I merely a pawn in his cunning stratagem.我只不过是他那狡猾计谋中的一件工具。
n. 优点，价值；功绩；功过 vt. 值得 vi. 应受报答 同义词:asset, importance, virtue, price, value, to be worth, be deserving of He merited all the praises they give him.他们给他的所有表扬他都受之无愧。
adj. 愉快的；微醉的；嬉戏作乐的 n. 甜樱桃 同义词:good, bright, fragrant, cheerful, sweet cherry Now let us sing and dance and merry .现在让我们高高兴兴地唱歌跳舞吧。

n. 混乱；食堂，伙食团；困境；脏乱的东西 vt. 弄乱，弄脏；毁坏；使就餐 vi. 把事情弄糟；制造脏乱；玩弄 同义词:difficulty, disorder, chaos, confusion, corner, destroy, soil, mud, spot, damage, play fast and loose, toy with See how your cat has messed up my ball of wool.瞧你的猫把我的绒线球弄乱了。
n. 消息；差使；启示；预言；广告词 vi. 报信，报告；[通信] 报文 vt. 通知 同义词:news, prediction, word, inform of, report to, give notice, instruct, advise of The myth is the message .而神话，也就是寓言。
n. 报信者，送信者；先驱 同义词:precursor, forerunner And tell messenger that he or she must be explicit .另外还要告诉那位代言人，必须直截了当。
n. 金属；合金 vt. 以金属覆盖 adj. 金属制的 同义词:alloy The chassis is metal , instead of plastic .其底座为金属材质，而非塑料；

n. 米；仪表；[计量] 公尺；韵律 vt. 用仪表测量 vi. 用表计量 同义词:rhythm, metre The presenter can use an additional set of tools such as Meeting Minder, Speaker Notes , Slide Navigator , and Slide Meter .演示者可以使用许多附加工具，例如会议记录、演讲者备注、幻灯片漫游，或幻灯片计时器。
n. 方法；条理；类函数 adj. 使用体验派表演方法的 同义词:approach, way, system, medium, how It was a feudal method .这是一种封建的方法。
adj. 公制的；米制的；公尺的 n. 度量标准 But his own views were more moderately right-wing , extending to a liking for law and order and a horror of the metric system .但是他自己却属于更温和的右翼，并进而发展为喜欢法律与秩序，厌恶公制体系。
n. 微电脑；[计] 微型计算机 A commonly used microcomputer algorithm for multiplication .微型计算机一种常用的乘法算法。
n. 扩音器，麦克风 同义词:mike, amplifier My voice is weak . I need a microphone .我的声音小，我需要一个麦克风。
n. 显微镜 Much greater magnification can be obtained with the electron microscope .用电子显微镜能获得大得多的放大倍数。
n. 中午；正午 adj. 正午的 同义词:midnoon, noon sharp, noonday I'm afraid not before midday .恐怕在中午之前不行。
n. 午夜，半夜12点钟 adj. 半夜的；漆黑的 同义词:pitch-dark, inky It is weird how crowded convenience store is even midnight .午夜都过了，便利商店还这般拥挤，真是奇怪。
n. 当中，中间 prep. 在…中间（等于amidst） 同义词:middle, among, in the middle of Fortunately , we are not starting this process of reflection and reform in the midst of crisis .幸运的是，我们不是在危机之中开始这个反省和改革的过程。

n. 力量；威力；势力 v. 可以；或许（may的过去式）；应该 aux. 可能；也许 同义词:strength, force, muscle, power, influence, should You might think you're clever, but that doesn't give you the right to order her about!你也许认为自己很聪明，但你没有权力向她发号施令!
adj. 温和的；轻微的；淡味的；文雅的；不含有害物质的的 n. （英国的一种）淡味麦芽啤酒 同义词:pacific, gentle, moderate, soft, slight " Mild indifference " probably sums up best her colleagues ' attitudes to Louise .“适度的冷淡”大概最能概括她同事对路易斯的态度。
adj. 军事的；军人的；适于战争的 n. 军队；军人 同义词:martial, soldierly, force, soldier, battalion Military factors still take an important position in state security .军事因素在国家安全中仍占有重要地位。
n. 牛奶；乳状物 vt. 榨取；挤…的奶 vi. 挤奶 同义词:lait, creamery, extract, ream The farmer milks the cows twice a day.那农夫一天挤两次母牛的奶。
vi. 乱转；被碾磨 n. 工厂；磨坊；磨粉机；制造厂；压榨机 vt. 搅拌；碾磨；磨细；使乱转 同义词:factory, plant, work, mix round, churn up to mill grain碾碎谷物
n. 毫米；公厘 同义词:strich, milimetre One second of arc movement is one thirtieth of a millimetre .一弧秒的移动是一毫米的三十分之一。
n. 百万；无数 adj. 百万的；无数的 num. 百万 同义词:mega, innumerability, thousand, countless, infinite Its permit allows it to take in million tonnes of waste a year .该垃圾场的营业许可证准许其一年的垃圾处理量为一百万公吨。
n. 理智，精神；意见；智力；记忆力 vt. 介意；专心于；照料 vi. 介意；注意 同义词:opinion, intelligence, energy, memory, spirit, devote one's attention to, concentrate upon, take care of, take notice Mind their words !记住他们的话!
n. 矿，矿藏；矿山，矿井；地雷，水雷 vt. 开采，采掘；在…布雷 vi. 开矿，采矿；埋设地雷 pron. 我的 同义词:ore, pit, exploit to mine for copper采铜
n. 矿工；开矿机 同义词:collier, pitman Then a miner came by carrying a load of coal .然后一个煤矿工人扛着一袋煤经过。

n. 最小值；最低限度；最小化；最小量 adj. 最小的；最低的 同义词:lowest, least, smallest No , not if you maintain a minimum balance of 500 dollars .如果你保持最少500美元的话就不收手续费。

n. （政府的）部门 同义词:division, department, sector Education activists say the Ministry of Education rarely inspects their teaching quality , lesson notes or examination records .教育积极分子称，教育部门很少检查他们的教学质量、课程教案或考试记录。
adj. 未成年的；次要的；较小的；小调的；二流的 n. 未成年人；小调；副修科目 vi. 副修 同义词:secondary, supporting, peripheral, less, infant, pupil (in) to minor in Chinese副修汉语
n. 少数民族；少数派；未成年 adj. 少数的；属于少数派的 同义词:ethnic minorities, nonage The first is whether innovation will spread beyond minority of firms .第一件事是创新是否能在一小撮公司以外扩展开来。

prep. 减，减去 n. 负号，减号；不足；负数 adj. 减的；负的 同义词:less, shortage, short of, lack, insufficient, negative, nonpositive There are some distinctively South African accessories at this World Cup , makarapa hats , essentially or nakedly decorated minus helmets being one.此次南非世界杯有许多南非特色的球迷装备，比如说大部分或完全油漆过的小头盔马卡拉帕帽。
n. 分，分钟；片刻，一会儿；备忘录，笔记；会议记录 vt. 将…记录下来 adj. 微小的，详细的 同义词:cent, moments, note, while, penny, tiny, strict, micro, detailed, particular I want my disagreement to be minuted,我要求把我的不同意见记录下来。

adj. 悲惨的；痛苦的；卑鄙的 同义词:poor, painful, mean, base, dirty The whole world will become such a miserable place .整个世界将变成一个如此悲惨的地方。

adj. 失踪的；缺少的 v. 错过（miss的ing形式）；想念；漏掉 同义词:absent, losing, sighing Missing out on the first wave of European integration was another " never again " moment .错过了第一波的欧洲联合是另一个“再也不会有”的时刻。
n. 使命，任务；代表团；布道 vt. 派遣；向……传教 同义词:role, assignment, task, delegation, send along, dispatch But this was his mission .但是，这就是他的使命。
n. 薄雾；视线模糊不清；模糊不清之物 vi. 下雾；变模糊 vt. 使模糊；使蒙上薄雾 同义词:gauze, fog, fog, obfuscate The hills misted over.小山笼罩在薄雾中。
n. 错误；误会；过失 vt. 弄错；误解 vi. 弄错；误解 同义词:error, fault, sin, blame, misunderstanding, err in, go wrong, fault, err in You must have mistaken my intentions.你一定是误会了我的意图了。
n. 情妇；女主人；主妇；女教师；女能人 同义词:other woman, moll Let him leave the house, if he imagines he will not harmonize with its young mistress .如果他认为他不能与府第的年轻女主人和睦相处，让他离开府第好了。
vt. 误解；误会 同义词:misconstrue, misread They pretended to misunderstand me.他们假装听错了我的话。
n. 混合；混合物；混合剂 同义词:mix, hybrid, compound On the face of it, life was mixture of the quaint and the archaic .从表面上看来，生活是离奇有趣的事物和古老事物的混合体。
vi. 抱怨，悲叹；呻吟 n. 呻吟声；悲叹 vt. 抱怨；呻吟着说 同义词:beef about, repine, regret, lamentation, beef about, rail against The sick girl moaned a while, and then fell asleep.那个生病的女孩呻吟了一会就睡着了。
adj. 机动的；易变的，；非固定的 n. 运动物体 同义词:variable, liquid, motor, unstable In some trains you can't even use your mobile phones !在一些火车上你甚至都不能用你的移动电话！
n. 模式；方式；风格；时尚 同义词:way of, manner, pattern, fashion, style Integer indicating whether the monitor operates in interlaced ( value = 5 ) or non- interlaced ( 4 ) mode .整数表示监视器处于交替（值=5）还是非交替（4）模式。
n. 模型；典型；模范；模特儿；样式 vt. 模拟；塑造；模仿 vi. 做模型；做模特儿 adj. 模范的；作模型用的 同义词:matrix, former, shape, fashion, type, mold, simulate, pattern, form, imitate to model a little horse out of clay用黏土做小马模型
adj. 稳健的，温和的；适度的，中等的；有节制的 vi. 变缓和，变弱 vt. 节制；减轻 同义词:pacific, medium, secondary, soft, middle, weaken, deny oneself, allay She should moderate her language when children are present.在孩子面前，她说话应该节制。
adj. 现代的，近代的；时髦的 n. 现代人；有思想的人 同义词:recent, fashionable, in, tony, Homo sapiens sapiens WHO was the first modern artist ?谁是第一个现代艺术家？
adj. 谦虚的，谦逊的；适度的；端庄的；羞怯的 同义词:odest, inobtrusive These measures are a modest step in the right direction .这些措施只不过是正确方向上有限的一小步。
vt. 修改，修饰；更改 vi. 修改 同义词:alter, dizen, alter, touch up The industrial revolution modified the whole structure of English society.工业革命改变了英国社会的整体结构。
adj. 潮湿的；多雨的；含泪的 n. 潮湿 同义词:wet, humid, dampness, humidification It was moisting when we were in the street.我们在街上时正下着毛毛雨。
n. 水分；湿度；潮湿；降雨量 同义词:rainfall, humidity content They sense soil moisture in the immediate vicinity of the cup.他们能对直接接近林子的土壤水分作出感应。
n. [化学] 分子；微小颗粒，微粒 同义词:numerator of a fraction, microne How does he explain their almost magical convergence in a single elongated molecule of carbon ?他该如何解释这些功能神奇地集中在一条拉长的碳分子管中？
n. 监视器；监听器；监控器；班长 vt. 监控 同义词:detectophone, invigilator You must monitor the old man's illness.你一定要监察这位老人的病情。
adj. 每月的，每月一次的；有效期为一个月的 n. 月刊 adv. 每月，每月一次 同义词:menstrual, mensual, mensual Others get monthly allowance .有些每月得到零用钱。
n. 纪念碑；历史遗迹；不朽的作品 vt. 为…树碑 同义词:memorial, cenotaph monument helps all of us remember George Washington , the first President of the United States .这座纪念碑使我们所有人都怀念美国的第一位总统乔治·华盛顿。
n. 情绪，语气；心境；气氛 同义词:emotion, atmosphere, tone, spirit, feeling The mood is grief , purpose , unity , and anger under control .悲痛的心情、决心、团结、愤怒都在控制当中。
adj. 道德的；精神上的；品性端正的 n. 道德；寓意 同义词:psychological, ethical, overtone A still larger question is over moral hazard .一个更大的问题在于道德风险。
adv. 而且；此外 同义词:besides, again, also, then, additionally Moreover , it is in the nature of innovation to feed upon itself .更值得一提的是，创新的本质便是由创新激发创新。
adj. 凡人的；致死的；终有一死的；不共戴天的 n. 人类，凡人 同义词:kill, laical, mankind, humanity, people Wandering from all mortal reason , man comes at last to that celestial thought .人一失去了所有的性命悠关的理性，就不免要有升天的念头。
n. 蚊子 同义词:skeeter Malaria is caused by a parasite which is passed to humans though mosquito bites .疟疾是通过蚊虫叮咬后传入人体内的寄生虫引发的一种疾病。
adv. 主要地；通常；多半地 同义词:mainly, basically, largely, usually, generally, primarily But people are mostly living on borrowed time as well as borrowed money .但大多数人还是依靠着“借来的钱”活在“借来的时间”里。
n. 动作；移动；手势；请求；意向 vi. 运动；打手势 vt. 运动；向…打手势 同义词:removal, intention, move, shift, asking, do sport, do morning exercise, do sport, do morning exercise She motioned to the waiter.她向侍者招手。
vt. 刺激；使有动机；激发…的积极性 同义词:stimulate, fan, needle, activate Kindness motivated the action.仁慈是这一行动的动机。
n. 动机，目的；主题 adj. 发动的；成为动机的 vt. 使产生动机，激起 同义词:incentive, goals, intention, topic, purpose, prompt, stir up He had some motive in telling this fable .他讲这寓言故事是有用意的。
n. 发动机，马达；汽车 adj. 汽车的；机动的 vi. 乘汽车 vt. 以汽车载运 同义词:engine, automobile, car, automotive, mobile, auto We motored over to Cambridge to see some friends.我们开汽车去剑桥看一些朋友。
vi. 发霉 vt. 浇铸；用泥土覆盖 n. 模具；霉 同义词:go moldy, cast, typecast, mildew These huge presses mould the car bodies.这些巨大的压床模压出汽车车身。
vt. 增加；爬上；使骑上马 vi. 爬；上升 n. 山峰；底座；乘骑用马 同义词:enhance, boost, jack, hot, gain, climb, arise, raise, go up, peak, foundation plate to mount the mountain登上山
n. 山；山脉 同义词:range, cordillera More than 600 such tombs are hidden in mountain near Kunming .在昆明的一座山上，隐藏着600多冢这样的坟墓。
v. 哀悼；忧伤；服丧 同义词:grieve over, grieve for The manager announced his resignation and everybody mourned.经理宣布了他的辞职，大家都感到惋惜。
n. 鼠标；老鼠；胆小羞怯的人 vt. 探出 vi. 捕鼠；窥探 同义词:ratton, rat, pry about to mouse out a neighborhood scandal窥探出邻居的丑行
n. 口，嘴；河口 vt. 做作地说，装腔作势地说；喃喃地说出 vi. 装腔作势说话 同义词:jaws, ostium, grumble She mouthed the words as the record played.她一边放录音，一边读出这些词语。
n. 一口，满口 同义词:morsel, gobbet He drank another mouthful of gin .他又喝了一口杜松子酒。
n. 运动；活动；运转；乐章 同义词:activity, exercise, sport, campaign, running The shareholder - value movement started to reward managers for profits .股东价值运动开始因为利润而奖赏管理者。
vt. 弄脏；用泥涂 vi. 钻入泥中 n. 泥；诽谤的话；无价值的东西 同义词:soil, spot, dirty, muld, vanity She mudded herself when running in the rain.她在雨中奔跑时溅了自己一身泥。
adj. 泥泞的；模糊的；混乱的 vt. 使污浊；使沾上泥；把…弄糊涂 vi. 变得泥泞；沾满烂泥 同义词:fuzzy, dark, chaotic, troubled, vague, bedrabble Don't muddy your new shoes.别弄脏了你的新鞋。
n. 杯子；脸；苦读者 vi. 扮鬼脸，做怪相；行凶抢劫 vt. 给……拍照 同义词:cup, face, make faces, pull faces He was mugged from behind and forced into a dark room.他从背后被勒住脖子，被迫进入一间黑屋。
adj. 多重的；多样的；许多的 n. 倍数；[电] 并联 同义词:numerous, many, hundred, time, paralleling With multiple animals , that 's a very large effect . It cuts the risk almost in half .如果动物种类多，那么效果会很明显，几乎会降低将近一半的风险。
vt. 乘；使增加；使繁殖；使相乘 vi. 乘；繁殖；增加 adv. 多样地；复合地 adj. 多层的；多样的 同义词:ride, breed, improve, accelerate, gain, diversiform, variant to multiply 9 by 4 .以4乘9。
vt. 谋杀，凶杀 n. 谋杀，凶杀 vi. 杀人，犯杀人罪 同义词:murther, killing, rubout He murdered her in cold blood.他残忍地杀害了她。
n. 凶手；谋杀犯 同义词:Cain, slayer And yet this is the face of a convicted murderer .这，就是已被定罪为杀人凶手的面孔。
n. 肌肉；力量 vt. 加强；使劲搬动；使劲挤出 vi. 使劲行进 同义词:strength, force, might, power, beef, enhance, cement, build up We muscled our way out.我们使劲挤了出去。
n. 博物馆 Every country will have its own poverty museum .各国都将拥有自己的贫困博物馆。
n. 蘑菇，伞菌；蘑菇形物体；暴发户 adj. 蘑菇的；蘑菇形的；迅速生长的 vi. 迅速增加；采蘑菇；迅速生长 同义词:agaric, toadstool, rocket We go mushrooming every morning.我们每天早上去采蘑菇。
adj. 音乐的；悦耳的 n. 音乐片 同义词:harmonious, sweet Guitar Hero is as musical as I get now .吉他英雄是我得到了非常悦耳的东西。
n. 音乐家 同义词:eisteddfod He is a natural musician .他是天生的音乐家。
aux. 必须，一定；可以，应当；很可能 n. 绝对必要的事物；未发酵葡萄汁 同义词:may, shall, ought One must eat to live.人必须吃饭才能活。
adj. 哑的；沉默的；无声的 vt. 减弱……的声音；使……柔和 n. 哑巴；弱音器；闭锁音 同义词:silent, dumb, sordino, sourdine to play the violin with muted strings演奏加了弱音器的小提琴
vi. 咕哝；喃喃自语 vt. 咕哝；抱怨地说；低声含糊地说 n. 咕哝；喃喃低语 同义词:chunter, grunt The old man muttered to himself.老人喃喃自语。
n. 羊肉；绵羊 同义词:sheep, hotpot He dines on a chicken or a scrap of mutton .一只小鸡，或一小块羊肉，就算他一顿正餐了。
adj. 共同的；相互的，彼此的 同义词:corporate, common, collective, joint The hottest mutual funds !最热的共同基金！
adj. 神秘的；不可思议的；难解的 同义词:magic, fantastic Birds are even more mysterious , because here we do not even see an outer ear .鸟类甚至更为神秘，因为我们甚至看不到它们有一个外耳。
n. 神秘，秘密；奥秘；神秘的事物 同义词:secret, privacy, confidence SEX is a mystery —and not just to those who indulge in it.性是一个谜——这里的迷并不仅仅是对那些沉迷其中者而言。
vt. 钉；使固定；揭露 n. [解剖] 指甲；钉子 同义词:reveal, fix, disclose, clou He nailed a sign to the wall.他把招牌钉在了墙上。
adj. 裸体的；无装饰的；无证据的；直率的 同义词:explicit, frank The strong struck down the weak , the ragged spat on the naked .强壮的击倒了体弱的；衣衫褴褛的唾骂一丝不挂的。

adv. 也就是；即是；换句话说 同义词:viz., i.e. Keynes 's essay explored something his modern disciples often ignore , namely what would happen when "the economic problem " was solved .凯恩斯的信徒们常常会忽视他在短文中探究的问题：即“经济问题”解决后，会发生些什么？
n. 小睡，打盹儿；细毛；孤注一掷 vt. 使拉毛 vi. 小睡；疏忽 同义词:beauty sleep, lie-down, caulk off, neglect of He always napped after lunch.他过去午饭后总要小睡一会儿。
adj. 狭窄的，有限的；勉强的；精密的；度量小的 n. 海峡；狭窄部分，隘路 vt. 使变狭窄 vi. 变窄 同义词:nice, limited, finite, exact, precision, neck, channel, sound, straiten Do you know why the river narrows here?你知道为什么河道在这儿会变窄吗?
adj. 下流的；肮脏的；脾气不好的；险恶的 n. 令人不快的事物 性的吸引力 同义词:blue, dirty Unfortunately for you, it might stain your shirt and leave behind a nasty smell .不幸的是这些汗水会弄脏你的衣服，也会留下难闻的气味。
n. 国家；民族；国民 同义词:country, state, folk, people, soil We must be now , as we were in the beginning, a new nation .我们建国时是一个新国家，现在也必须是一个新国家。
adj. 国家的；国民的；民族的；国立的 n. 国民 同义词:state, natl, subject It has national franchise in a country where people are always on the move .它在一个人们老是搬家的国家里拥有全国性的经销权。
n. 国籍，国家；民族；部落 同义词:state, folk, people, soil Science has no nationality ; knowledge belongs to everyone .科学没有国界，知识属于每一个人。
adj. 本国的；土著的；天然的；与生俱来的；天赋的 n. 本地人；土产；当地居民 同义词:crude, inherent, indigen, local product He told his family and friends he would study and paint Native Americans .他告诉家人和朋友自己将研究和绘画美洲土著人。

adj. 自然的；物质的；天生的；不做作的 n. 自然的事情；白痴；本位音 同义词:material, physical, born, spontaneous, idiot, baichi Language , after all , appears only to be returning to its natural and healthy state of flux.毕竟，语言的呈现方式归根结蒂都应回归到其本质健康的流通状态。
adv. 自然地 同义词:spontaneously, unaffectedly Naturally , the reds see it differently .“红衫军”的看法自然不同。
n. 自然；性质；本性；种类 同义词:property, category, variety, manner, kind It uses animals to explore human nature .它们用动物来探究人类的本性。
adj. 顽皮的，淘气的；不听话的；没规矩的；不适当的；下流的 同义词:blue, dirty, unhappy, inadequate, wrong " You naughty children , " says their stepmother .“你们两个顽皮的孩子，”后母说。
adj. 海军的；军舰的 Would you like to go there for a spell as a naval observer ?你愿不愿意以海军观察员的身份到那里呆上一个时期？
n. 航行；航海 同义词:salling, siling Naval officers must understand both the theory and the practice of navigation .海军军官必须了解航海术的理论与实践。
n. 海军 同义词:seapower He enjoyed a counter- Carter moment when navy commandos rescued an American hostage , leaving three kidnappers dead.海军突击队营救一名美国人质并击毙三名绑匪，奥巴马享受着反卡特时刻。
adj. 灵巧的；整洁的；优雅的；齐整的；未搀水的；平滑的 同义词:elegant, flowing, graceful That may be too neat an explanation .那样的解释可能过于理想化。
adv. 必要地；必定地，必然地 同义词:inevitably, consequentially Among the lessons to be learned at this exhibition is that not all attributions are necessarily for ever .此次展览会教给我们的其中一课是，并非所有的作品归属都必然会永久不变。
adj. 必要的；必需的；必然的 n. 必需品 同义词:inevitable, required, essential, certain, automatic, requirement, want I believe that is necessary .我认为这是必要的。
n. 需要；必然性；必需品 同义词:need, want, demand, requirement for They have to do this test necessity .他们出于需要不得不做这项试验。
n. 脖子；衣领；海峡 vi. 搂著脖子亲吻；变狭窄 vt. 使变细；与…搂著脖子亲吻 同义词:narrow, channel, sound, collar The road suddenly necks down the bridge.下了桥之后，道路突然变得狭窄了。
n. 项链 I want to buy necklace .我想买一条项链。
n. 针；指针；刺激；针状物 vi. 缝纫；做针线 vt. 刺激；用针缝 同义词:stimulus, incentive, index, finger, excitement, sew, stimulate, fan, motivate, activate to needle a patch缝补钉
adj. 不必要的，不需要的；多余的，无用的 同义词:unnecessary, spare, useless, waste The only thing he could regret was his needless dread .他唯一觉得遗憾的，是自己不必要的恐惧。
adj. [数] 负的；消极的；否定的；阴性的 n. 否定；负数；[摄] 底片 vt. 否定；拒绝 同义词:passive, destructive, infirmation, disaffirmation, deny, refuse He negatived it was true.他否认这件事是真的。
vt. 疏忽，忽视；忽略 n. 疏忽，忽视；怠慢 同义词:ignore, be forgetful of, omission, oversight His genius was neglected for several years.他的创造能力被忽视了好几年。
n. 黑人 adj. 黑人的 Music has always been important in Negro life .音乐在黑人生活中一直占有重要地位。
n. 邻居；仁慈的人 vt. 邻接 vi. 住在邻近；毗邻；友善 adj. 邻居的；邻近的 同义词:joneses, vicinage, abut upon, abut against, abut, adjacent, nearby to neighbour Tom与汤姆是邻居
n. 邻近；周围；邻居关系；附近一带 同义词:contiguity, all around A stable neighbourhood may be one in which people refuse to move in search of jobs .一个稳定的地区也许是居住其间的居民拒绝为找工作而搬家。
n. 侄子；外甥 My nephew is naive and naughty .我的侄子既天真又顽皮。
n. 神经；勇气；[植] 叶脉 vt. 鼓起勇气 同义词:courage, heart, take courage, get up the courage She was finally nerved to tell him that she was already a wife.她终于鼓起勇气告诉他，她已经为人之妻了。
adj. 神经的；紧张不安的；强健有力的 同义词:neural, jittery More than disquiet about the present , voters nervous about the future .选民们不只是对现状感到不安，更对未来感到焦虑。
n. 巢，窝；安乐窝；温床 vt. 筑巢；嵌套 vi. 筑巢；找鸟巢 同义词:soil, eyrie, nidificate He nested himself near his field.他在地边搭了个窝篷。
n. 网络；广播网；网状物 同义词:net, meshwork His business lunches were taken up with networking.他的交际午餐被用来建立与客户的交流。
adj. 中立的，中性的；中立国的；非彩色的 n. 中立国；中立者；非彩色；齿轮的空档 同义词:indifferent, litmusless, fence-sitter, mugwump The first transition , from ionized to neutral , is the best understood .第一次从游离到中性的转变，是了解得最透彻的。
adv. 从未；决不 同义词:none, nothing Borrowed garments never fit well .借来的衣服不会合身。
adv. 然而，不过；虽然如此 conj. 然而，不过 同义词:though, natheless, whereas, however, while, but, yet The cop told them to clear out,nevertheless they seemed not to hear.警察让他们离开，可他们就好像没听见一样动也不动。
adv. 最近；重新；以新的方式 同义词:recently, of late, last He says they need to discuss the newly revealed document with their supporters .他说，他们需要同他们的支持者讨论新透露出来的文件。
n. 外甥女，侄女 I did so and sent my niece a gift card to replace the "unwanted" present .我收回了我的礼物，送了张礼品卡以替代那个不受欢迎的礼物。
n. 夜晚，晚上；黑暗，黑夜 adj. 夜晚的，夜间的 同义词:evening, nocte, vesperal A bad day never has a good night .糟糕的一天也不会有美好的夜晚。
num. 十九 Until the early nineteen nineties , most potatoes were grown in Europe , North America and the former Soviet republics .直到十九世纪九十年代早期，大多数土豆都是种在欧洲，北美，和前苏联。
n. 九十 adj. 九十的；九十岁的 num. 九十 Ninety per cent of inspiration is perspiration .百分之九十的灵感是汗水。
num. 第九 adj. 第九的；九分之一的 n. 九分之一 As this article was going to press , he and his team were undertaking their ninth field season at Blombos.本文付梓之际，他与团队成员正在布隆伯斯洞从事第九个田野季的发掘工作。
n. [化学] 氮 同义词:azote Two other low- input ways to improve the soil involve using manure or nitrogen and phosphorus as fertilizer .另外两个改善土质的低投入方法包括使用有机粪肥或氮、磷化肥。
adj. 高尚的；贵族的；惰性的；宏伟的 n. 贵族 vt. 抓住；逮捕 同义词:magnificent, grand, prince, nobility, aristocrat, grasp, collar The police nobled 6 criminal suspects.警方抓住了六名犯罪嫌疑人。
adj. 嘈杂的；喧闹的；聒噪的 n. 响声；嘈杂声 同义词:furious, boisterous, klang, babelism The key is that the vibrations must be random —or, put another way , noisy .重点是振动刺激必须是随机产生，换言之，也就是杂乱无章。
pron. 没有人；一个也没有；没有任何东西 adj. 没有的，一点没有的 adv. 决不，一点也不 同义词:lacking, void of, nothing, noway None of us was going to the party.我们之中没人想去参加那个聚会。

n. 胡说；废话 adj. 荒谬的 int. 胡说！ 同义词:bullshit, kibosh, ridiculous, preposterous Nonsense , Master Winde ! With Grievous still alive , their ability to wage war has never been stronger .胡说，云度大师！格里菲斯还活着，而他们发动战争的能力从来没有增强。
adj. 正常的；正规的，标准的 n. 正常；标准；常态 同义词:standard, arm's-length, criterion, standard, level, prototype But these are not normal times .但现在可不是正常时期。
adv. 正常地；通常地，一般地 同义词:commonly, currently, generally These precursor cells normally go on to produce red cells , white cells or platelets .这些前体细胞正常情况下可生成红细胞、白细胞或血小板。
adj. 东北的；向东北的；来自东北的 n. 东北 adv. 向东北；来自东北 The northeast just had its first big snow of the season .美国东北部刚刚度过了这个冬天的首场大雪。
adj. 西北的；向西北的；来自西北的 n. 西北 adv. 在西北；向西北；来自西北 Northwest Airline counter is over there . You just follow this line please .西北航空公司的柜台就在那边。请您排这个队就行了。
adj. 显而易见的，显著的；值得注意的 同义词:obvious, prominent, remarkable, marked, noted Size and shape vary . It becomes less noticeable or disappears with age .大小形态不等，随年龄增长，变得较不明显或消失不见。
n. 名词 Noun phrase is abbreviated as NP .名词片语缩写成NP…
n. 十一月 For me , Christmas always began in the middle of the cold , windy month of November .在我的记忆中，圣诞节总是从寒冷多风的十一月中旬就开始了。

adj. 原子能的；[细胞] 细胞核的；中心的；原子核的 同义词:central, atomic The problem is not the great powers with nuclear stockpiles , they say , but rogue regimes such as North Korea and Iran .他们说，问题不在于那些拥有核储备的大国，而在像朝鲜和伊朗这样的流氓政权身上。
n. 核，核心；原子核 同义词:core, quick These young people formed the nucleus of the club .这些年轻人形成了俱乐部的核心。
n. 讨厌的人；损害；麻烦事；讨厌的东西 同义词:injury, harm, damage Other drugs can also be a nuisance to remember .其他的药物也会是不耐烦的去牢记。
adj. 许多的，很多的 同义词:many, multiple, hundred, plenty There are numerous contests for haiku , some sponsored by the about societies .还有很多俳句竞赛，有的是由上面这些会社举办的。
vt. 看护，护理；照顾；培养；给…喂奶 vi. 照料，护理；喂奶；当保姆 n. 护士；奶妈，保姆 同义词:cultivate, plant, rear, fend for, attend on, sister, amah Mother nursed me back to health.我在妈妈的护理下恢复了健康。
n. 苗圃；托儿所；温床 同义词:soil, nest A lover's hope resembles the bean in the nursery tale , -let it once take root , and it will grow so rapidly .情人的希望宛如童话中讲的那颗豆子--一旦它生了根，就会飞速地成长。
n. 螺母，螺帽；坚果；难对付的人，难解的问题 vi. 采坚果 同义词:nutsert, female screw He 's surely a hard nut , nobody likes approaching him .他确实是一个难对付的人，没有人喜欢接近他。
n. 尼龙，[纺] 聚酰胺纤维；尼龙袜 同义词:polymide, polyamide fiber Nylon differs from silk in origin and cost .在来源和成本上尼龙和丝不同。
n. 目标；物体；客体；宾语 vt. 提出…作为反对的理由 vi. 反对；拒绝 同义词:target, goal, end, cause, aim, refuse, sit down on I will not wear this dress if you object to it.如果你不喜欢这件衣服，那我就不再穿它了。
n. 异议，反对；缺陷，缺点；妨碍；拒绝的理由 同义词:opposition, exception, intervention, prevention, deficiency The defense attorney 's objection was overruled by the judge .被告辩护律师提出的反对意见被法官驳回。

adj. 客观的；目标的；宾格的 n. 目的；目标；[光] 物镜；宾格 同义词:impersonal, accusatival, intention, purpose, sake, target, goal Objective To study the relationship between bronchial asthma and tuberculin reaction .目的研究支气管哮喘与结核菌素反应之间的关系。
vt. 迫使；强制；赐，施恩惠；责成 vi. 帮忙；施恩惠 同义词:pressure, enforce The principal shall be obliged to pay the wages to the employees.必须责成雇主向雇员支付薪金。
n. 观察；监视；观察报告 同义词:view, monitoring, surveillance, watch The careful observation and inference was his daily work .他的日常工作便是仔细的观察和诊断。
vt. 观察；遵守；说；注意到；评论 vi. 观察；说；注意到；评论 同义词:watch, quo, tell, talk, respect, look into, take stock of It was observed by none.没有人看见这件事。
n. 观察者；[天] 观测者；遵守者 同义词:viewer, watcher An observer would only see light that shone directly at him .一个观察者只能看到直接射向他的光线。
n. 障碍，干扰；妨害物 同义词:interference, let, bar, disturbance, dam Another obstacle is inertia .另一个阻碍是惰性。
vi. 获得；流行 vt. 获得 同义词:pick up, get access to, acquire, earn, score, buy, find You can also obtain knowledge through practice.你还可以从实践经验中获得知识。
adj. 明显的；显著的；平淡无奇的 同义词:distinct, visible, prominent, marked, evident Some of the factors in culture shock are obvious .造成文化冲击的有些因素是显而易见的。

n. 时机，机会；场合；理由 vt. 引起，惹起 同义词:opportunity, chance, opening, sake, reason, attract, cause, produce, operate, induce Yet on the most commonplace occasion I can never know your thoughts .然而即便在最普通的场合我也琢摸不透你的思想。
adj. 偶然的；临时的；特殊场合的 同义词:extraordinary, temporary, odd Fossil teeth , and the occasional skeleton , show that small mammals were common at this time .化石牙齿和偶尔发现的骨架显示小型哺乳动物在当时很普遍。
adv. 偶而，间或 同义词:sometimes, betweenwhiles He makes mistakes occasionally , but not often .他间或出错，但不是时常出错。

n. 职业；占有；消遣；占有期 同义词:profession, employment, career, calling, pursuit, entertainment The happiness and satisfaction we can get from occupation and work are much more than most of us expect .职业和工作在使人得到幸福与满足方面所起的作用比我们大多数意识到的要多得多。
vt. 占据，占领；居住；使忙碌 同义词:bag, exercise He occupied his whole afternoon reading documents.他用了一下午的时间阅读文件。
vi. 发生；出现；存在 同义词:happen, exist, proceed, figure, offer I don't want such a thing to occur again.我不希望再发生这样的事情。

n. 发生；出现；事件；发现 同义词:emergence, going on, event, discovery, appearance, circumstance, scene The question of virus occurrence and survival in sediments was addressed only after improved detection methods were at hand.淤泥中病毒发生和存活的问题只有在改进了检测方法以后，才能够得以了解。
n. 海洋；大量；广阔 同义词:sea, lots of, wealth, body, billion These fossils sparked her curiosity about the ocean .这些化石激发了她对海洋的好奇心。
n. 大洋洲 Oceania was at war with Eurasia : therefore Oceania had always been at war with Eurasia .大洋国在跟欧亚国打仗，由此推之，它也便一直在跟欧亚国打仗。
n. [天] 十月 October days begin to cool .十月天气开始凉爽。
adj. 奇数的；古怪的；剩余的；临时的；零散的 n. 奇数；怪人；奇特的事物 同义词:remaining, extraordinary, temporary, surplus, residual, put, wack The model is an odd - looking structure of balls and rods .这个模型是由球和杆组成的结构，样子很奇特。
n. 气味；声誉 同义词:smell, wind, odor, prestige At meal times the odour of sauerkraut vies with that of garlic .吃饭的时候，德国泡菜的气味和大蒜的气味互相竟争着。
vt. 冒犯；使…不愉快 vi. 违反；进攻；引起不舒服 同义词:give offense, gross out, vary, be in breach of He was offended by her unreasonable quarrel.他被她的无理取闹激怒了。
vt. 提供；出价；试图 n. 提议；出价；意图；录取通知书 vi. 提议；出现；献祭；求婚 同义词:afford, undertake, try, tender, lend, proposal, intention, meaning, will, bid, occur, figure, come out He offered me a glass of wine.他给了我一杯葡萄酒。
n. 办公室；政府机关；官职；营业处 同义词:bureaux, government agency My firm was officed in the city.我的公司在市里设有办公室。
n. 军官，警官；公务员，政府官员；船长 vt. 指挥 同义词:wardroom, Irvine, captain, boss, lead, to command An officer must know how to handle men .一个军官必须知道如何统帅士兵。
adj. 官方的；正式的；公务的 n. 官员；公务员 同义词:formal, state, nazir, office holder The minister 's confession implicate numerous official in the bribery scandal .那部长的供词把很多官员牵连到受贿丑闻中。
vt. 省略；遗漏；删除；疏忽 同义词:understand, elide Some passages were omitted from the book.本书中的某些段落被删除了。
n. 洋葱；洋葱头 One medium beef steak with onion and shrimps salad .一客煎得适中的洋葱牛排加虾色拉。

n. 开始；机会；通路；空缺的职位 adj. 开始的 v. 开放（open的ing形式）；打开；公开 同义词:beginning, opportunity, threshold, conception, chance, preliminary, inauguratory, cracking, unwrapping His team defeated the defending champions from Argentina in their opening game .他的球队在揭幕比赛上打败了卫冕冠军阿根廷队。
n. 歌剧；歌剧院；歌剧团 Mike : Yuck ! I hate romance . That show sounds like a opera to me .迈克：讨厌！我不喜欢浪漫。那个节目给我的感觉象是肥皂剧。
vi. 运转；动手术；起作用 vt. 操作；经营；引起；对…开刀 同义词:run, act, attract, keep, produce, work, handle The machine is operating continuously.那台机器一直在不停地运转。
n. 操作；经营；[外科] 手术；[数][计] 运算 同义词:work, manipulation After working with Operation Smile for a while .在“微笑行动”工作了一段时间后。
adj. 操作的；运作的 同义词:handling, working What I think they were looking for was a balance of growth and operational experience in running a big company .我认为，他们所寻找的，是大公司管理者实现增长的能力与运营经验之间的平衡点。
n. 经营者；操作员；话务员；行家 同义词:expert, proprietor Hello . This is operator .喂，这里是接线员。
n. 意见；主张 同义词:comment, view, judgement, mind, thinking Sometimes , I wish I could phone him and ask for his opinion !有时我真希望能给他打个电话问问他的意见。
n. 对手；反对者；敌手 adj. 对立的；敌对的 同义词:equal, anti, comparative, rival, match, contrary, adverse, against He sat glowering at his opponent .他坐在那里怒视着对手。
n. 时机，机会 同义词:occasion, chance, opening, room The first - generation Americans viewed the country as a land opportunity .第一代美国人把美国看成是一块充满机会的土地。
vt. 反对；对抗，抗争 vi. 反对 同义词:combat, sit down on, object, sit down on His motion was opposed by most members.他的提议遭到大多数成员的反对。
adj. 相反的；对面的；对立的 n. 对立面；反义词 prep. 在…的对面 adv. 在对面 同义词:contrary, adverse, counter, against, cross, antithesis, antonym, across opposite the church在教堂的对面
vt. 压迫，压抑；使……烦恼；使……感到沉重 同义词:lie on to oppress opinions压制舆论

adj. 光学的；眼睛的，视觉的 同义词:visual, ocular But at each end of the fibre , optical signals must be converted to and from the electrical signals that computers use to process information .但在纤维的各端，必须将光信号转换成电信号或者将电信号转换成光信号，计算机用电信号处理信息。
adj. 乐观的；乐观主义的 同义词:rose-colored, rosy It is because that I always enjoy my life and I have an optimistic heart .因为我总是在享受我的生活，而且我有一颗乐观的心。
n. [计] 选项；选择权；买卖的特权 同义词:election, choice Pick an option , any option .挑一个选择，任何一个。
adj. 可选择的，随意的 n. 选修科目 同义词:selectable, hit-or-miss, elective subjects This optional property contains the name of the adapter that received this message .此可选属性包含已接收该消息的适配器的名称。
adj. 橙色的；橘色的 n. 橙；橙色；桔子 同义词:aurantia, aurantium I would never choose orange clothes , but to each his own .我决不会选择桔黄色，不过，个人有个人的眼光。
n. 轨道；眼眶；势力范围；生活常规 vi. 盘旋；绕轨道运行 vt. 绕…轨道而行 同义词:path, track, railway, trajectory, serpentuate, circle round We are orbiting the moon.我们正在环绕月球运行。
n. 管弦乐队；乐队演奏处 Bill can play the piano , sing and lead his orchestra all at once.比尔能够同时弹钢琴、唱歌和领导他的管弦乐队。
n. 命令；顺序；规则；[贸易] 定单 vt. 命令；整理；定购 vi. 命令；定货 同义词:instruction, bidding, telling, regulation, word, require, command, arrange, command I have ordered for you.我已为你点好菜了。
adj. 有秩序的；整齐的；值班的 n. 勤务兵；传令兵；护理员 adv. 顺序地；依次地 同义词:regular, straight, batman, lashkar, seriatim Also of concern is how the recent falls have been relatively orderly .同样令人担忧的是，近期的股市下跌相对很有条理。
adj. 普通的；平凡的；平常的 n. 普通；平常的人（或事） 同义词:usual, general, average, regulation, stock, common But to the eye of the ordinary , unimaginative traveler , they are invisible .但在普通的，无想象力的游客眼里，它们是看不见的。
n. 矿；矿石 同义词:mine The limestone absorbs impurities from the ore .石灰石从矿石中吸收杂质。
n. [生物] 器官；机构；风琴；管风琴；嗓音 同义词:machinery, apparatus, voice, house The morning after my fourth trip to her house, Miss Caroline played the organ again in church .我第四次给她送花后的第二天早晨，卡洛琳小姐又到教堂里弹管风琴了。

adj. [有化] 有机的；组织的；器官的；根本的 同义词:fundamental, ultimate, radical, underlying An industry imitating this and other organic principles would be more compatible with the organic domain around it.工业效法这条以及其他的自然原理，就更能与其周边的有机领域相兼容。
n. 有机体；生物体；微生物 同义词:living being, biosome My boss is a single-celled organism .我的老板是一位单细胞生物。
n. 组织；机构；体制；团体 同义词:fabric, machinery, system, community, body Next Monday is World Health Day, observed by the World Health Organization .下个星期一是由世界卫生组织发起的世界健康日。
vt. 组织；使有系统化；给予生机；组织成立工会等 vi. 组织起来；成立组织 同义词:structure, form They will organize a Bridge Club.他们将组建一个桥牌俱乐部。
adj. 东方的；东方人的 n. 东方人 同义词:eastern, eastern Lisbon outshone Venice as a mart for oriental spices .里斯本作为东方香料市场胜过威尼斯。
n. 起源；原点；出身；开端 同义词:birth, extraction, dawn But naturally , the Origin of Species was seen as a book written against religion .但是，“物种起源”这本书很自然地被看作是一本反对宗教的书。
n. 原件；原作；原物；原型 adj. 原始的；最初的；独创的；新颖的 同义词:archetype, antitype, initial, premier, primitive I have the bicycle now but my sister was the original owner .我现在占有这辆自行车，但是这车原先的所有者是我姐姐。
n. 装饰；[建][服装] 装饰物；教堂用品 vt. 装饰，修饰 同义词:decoration, adornment, paint, hang, modify, bedeck to ornament the house with flowers and colour lights用鲜花和彩灯装饰房屋
adj. 孤儿的；无双亲的 n. 孤儿 vt. 使成孤儿 When she was orphaned,her uncle sent her to orphanage.她的父母刚一去世，她的叔叔便把她送进了孤儿院。
adv. 否则；另外；在其他方面 adj. 另外的；其他方面的 同义词:else, extra, another, elsewise Otherwise , she might be in her tomb today !否则，她今天就会在坟墓里了！
aux. 应该，应当；大概 vi. 应该，应当；大概 同义词:should, must, would have, be supposed to All of us ought to go.我们大家都应该去。
n. 盎司；少量；雪豹 同义词:bit, tad List the price ounce instead of price per unit .将价格单位列为每盎司而不是单元单位。
n. 结果，结局；成果 同义词:product, result, conclusion, event, feedback Outcome differences .结果不同。
adj. 户外的；露天的；野外的（等于out-of-door） 同义词:weather, out of door It was, in effect , an outdoor shopping mall .它，确切地说，是一个户外购物商场。

adv. 在户外 n. 户外 adj. 户外的（等于outdoor） 同义词:alfresco, out-of-doors, open air, out of door, hypaethral A house furnace prevents the interior of the house from reaching the temperature outdoors .家用的取暖炉可用来防止室内温度降为室外温度。
n. 出口，排放孔；[电] 电源插座；销路；发泄的方法；批发商店 同义词:exit, market, way out But that discontent has yet to find an outlet .但是这种不满尚未找到一条发泄途径。
n. 轮廓；大纲；概要；略图 vt. 概述；略述；描画…轮廓 同义词:profile, program, brief, contour, summarize, sum up Yet a group of historians soon drafted an outline .然而一个历史团体不久就起草了一个大纲。
n. 展望；观点；景色 vt. 比……好看；用目光压倒 vi. 朝外看 同义词:viewpoint, scenery, perspective, picture, eye She outlooks all her friends.她比她所有的女友都漂亮。
n. 输出，输出量；产量；出产 vt. 输出 同义词:export, crop, harvest, yield, export, bulk out Output is falling in Britain , France , Germany and Japan .英国、法国、德国和日本的生产在下降。
n. 开始；开端 同义词:beginning, threshold, opening, conception, origin That would certainly be preferable to a competitive situation at the outset .这样做当然比一开始就处于竞争情况更为可取。
adj. 外面的，外部的；外来的 n. 外部；外观 adv. 在外面，向外面；在室外 prep. 在…范围之外 同义词:outer, external, out, without, surface, face, garment, without, ectad, beyond the pale to run outside the house跑向屋外
n. 郊区，市郊 同义词:suburban district, banlieue One day they went to a trip out of the city , into the outskirt .一天他们出了城，去了郊区，希望能解决问题，或至少来一次暂时的逃避。
adj. 杰出的；显著的；未解决的；未偿付的 n. 未偿贷款 同义词:prominent, excellent, obvious, brilliant, marked to outstand the hour呆得时间太久了

adj. 向外的；外面的；公开的；外服的；肉体的 adv. 向外（等于outwards）；在外；显而易见地 n. 外表；外面；物质世界 同义词:outer, outside, external, material, open, forth, out, person, external, garment, without As it's released , they expel air from their lungs to blow the outward .正因为是释放出的，它们从肺中排出了空气从而向外吹出了毒液。
adv. 向外地 Does this door outwards ?这扇门通向花园。
n. 炉，灶；烤炉，烤箱 同义词:furance, kiln We need an oven to roast meat and potatoes .我们需要一个炉子来烤肉和马铃薯。
adj. 全部的；全体的；一切在内的 adv. 全部地；总的说来 n. 工装裤；罩衫 同义词:entire, all, corporate, total, universal, outright, jeans, jea Overall , however , it makes the most money .但总体看来，它赚了最多的钱。
n. 大衣，外套 同义词:outerwear, outer coat He stepped back a few paces and unbuttoned his overcoat .他后退了几步，解开了他的大衣。
vt. 克服；胜过 vi. 克服；得胜 同义词:exceed, cap, surmount, rise above, get over sth to overcome one's competitor战胜对手
adv. 在头顶上；在空中；在高处 adj. 高架的；在头上的；在头顶上的 n. 天花板；[会计] 经常费用 同义词:aerially, ceiling boarding, current expenses Debits to Factory Overhead come from various sources .制造费用借方数据有几种来源。
vt. 忽略；俯瞰；远眺；检查；高耸于…之上 n. 忽视；眺望 同义词:forget, examine, survey, review, inspect, inobservancy, negligence The important details were overlooked by them,很重要的细节都被他们忽略掉了。
adv. 通宵；突然；昨晚 adj. 晚上的；通宵的；前夜的 n. 头天晚上；一夜的逗留 vt. 连夜快递 vi. 过一夜 同义词:short, pop, all-night We planned to overnight in Paris and then go to London by air.我们打算在巴黎过一夜，然后坐飞机去伦敦。
adv. 在海外，海外 adj. 海外的，国外的 同义词:beyond the sea, transmarine, off-shore For overseas markets , the process may call for a modified product .在海外市场，这一过程有时要求对产品进行改进。
vt. 赶上；压倒；突然来袭 vi. 超车 同义词:catch up with, to catch up, cut in We managed to overtake the last train.我们设法赶上了末班火车。
n. 加班时间；延长时间；[体]加时赛 adj. 超时的；加班的 vt. 使超过时间 adv. 加班地 同义词:extension of time to overtime a night shift夜班后加时工作
vt. 欠；感激；应给予；应该把……归功于 vi. 欠钱 同义词:appreciate, be grateful to to owe money to the bank欠银行钱
n. 猫头鹰；枭；惯于晚上活动的人 同义词:howlet, mopoke My brother is a owl .我哥哥是个标准的夜猫子。
n. 所有权；物主身份 同义词:property, droit Stock represents shares of ownership in a company .股票代表一个公司所有权的股份。
n. 牛；公牛 同义词:cattle, bull You've made a fire fit to roast ox .你生的火足以烤熟一头牛。
adj. 和平的；温和的；平静的 同义词:peaceful, soft, calm, moderate, gentle But the Americans were very touchy about the Pacific .但是美国人对太平洋问题是很敏感的。
n. 包装；一群；背包；包裹；一副 vt. 包装；压紧；捆扎；挑选；塞满 vi. 挤；包装货物；被包装；群集 同义词:pair, casing, impact, select, stuff, pile, crowd, host Have you packed all these books?你所存的书都捆好了吗?
n. 包，包裹；套装软件，[计] 程序包 adj. 一揽子的 vt. 打包；将…包装 同义词:envelopment, fardel, parcel He packaged up the books and put them under his bed after examination.考完试他就把书捆起来，放到床铺底下去了。
n. 数据包，信息包；小包，小捆 vt. 包装，打包 同义词:parcel, encase, sheathe Thus , the destination plus the DSAP define the recipient of a packet .所以，目标地址和DSAP一起定义了数据包的容器。
n. 衬垫；护具；便笺簿；填补 vi. 步行；放轻脚步走 vt. 填补；走 同义词:liner, interleaver, foot, hoof it, step, fill up We padded the seat of the chair with camel hair to make it soft.我们把驼毛絮在椅垫里，使之更加软和。
n. 桶，提桶 同义词:barrel, bucket She carried her milk in a pail on her head .她将她的牛奶装在桶里并举在头顶上。
adj. 痛苦的；疼痛的；令人不快的 同义词:hurt, bitter, miserable Writing a book is a horrible , exhausting struggle , like a long bout of painful illness .写书是一场可怕的劳心伤神的斗争，有如一场恶病的长时间发作。
n. 画家；油漆匠 同义词:limner, penman Let 's hire a painter to paint this room .让我们请一个油漆匠来粉刷这个房间。
n. 绘画；油画；着色 v. 绘画（paint的ing形式）；涂色于 同义词:brushwork, coloration, drawing Sweden , for painting your house .瑞典有房屋粉刷网。
n. 手掌；棕榈树；掌状物 vt. 将…藏于掌中 同义词:vola The magician palmed the coin and suddenly produced it from a boy's mouth.魔术师把硬币藏在掌中，然后突然从一个男孩的嘴里把它变出来。
n. 平锅，盘子；摇镜头 vi. （镜头）被摇动 vt. 淘金；摇镜头 同义词:holloware prospector panning for gold淘金的人
n. 熊猫；猫熊 同义词:bearcat China Panda Protection and Research Center .中国大熊猫保护研究中心。
n. 窗格；边；面；窗格玻璃；嵌板 vt. 装窗玻璃于；镶嵌板于 同义词:rim, planum a four paned window四块玻璃的窗户
n. 仪表板；嵌板；座谈小组，全体陪审员 vt. 嵌镶板 同义词:fascia board, instrument board The wall was paneled with pine.四周的墙都镶(或贴)上松木板。
vi. 喘息；渴望；气喘吁吁地说出某事 vt. 气喘 n. 气喘；喘息；喷气声 同义词:rare, aspire, asthma, wheeziness The dog was panting because of the hot weather.因为天热这只狗不停地喘气。
n. 游行；阅兵；炫耀；行进；阅兵场 vt. 游行；炫耀；列队行进 vi. 游行；炫耀；列队行进 同义词:display, pageant, show off, brag about, file, show off The brass band paraded the main street.军乐队游行通过大街。
n. 天堂 同义词:heaven, Olympus Beijing is a paradise for shopping .北京是一个购物的天堂。
n. 段落；短评；段落符号 vt. 将…分段 The teacher taught the students how to paragraph an essay.老师教学生如何把一篇文章分段。
n. 平行线；对比 vt. 使…与…平行 adj. 平行的；类似的，相同的 同义词:contrast, same, uniform The stream parallels the road for several miles.这条小河和公路平行数英里
n. 包裹，小包 vt. 打包；捆扎 同义词:package, bindle, package, enlace The experimental plot was parceled out to the students.实验田已分给学生们耕种了。
n. 议会，国会 同义词:congress, house IT WAS formally one election to a single body , the European Parliament .形式上讲，这只是欧洲议会这一个部门的一次选举。
adj. 局部的；偏爱的；不公平的 同义词:regional, local, unfair, topical But once again science gives at least partial credence to something that was once considered only a myth .但是科学至少再一次给了那些曾经被认为只是神话的东西一部分的信任。

adv. 部分地；偏袒地 同义词:half This is likely to be only partially offset by a pickup in businesses tied more closely to economic growth , such as advising on mergers and acquisitions .同经济增长更加休戚相关的业务好转可能只是在一定程度上予以抵消，比如合并和收购咨询业务。
vi. 参与，参加；分享 vt. 分享；分担 同义词:mix, take part in, share in, partake in Did you participate in this discussion?你参加这次讨论了吗?
n. 颗粒；[物] 质点；极小量；小品词 同义词:grain, granule Coconut powder , Milk , Coconut plant particle , Cane sugar , Sea salt , Soya bean .椰子粉，牛奶，椰子植物颗粒，甘蔗糖，海盐，大豆油。

adj. 特别的；详细的；独有的；挑剔的 n. 详细说明；个别项目 同义词:extraordinary, strict, detailed, special, exclusive, detailed specification, detailed description Deep drilling poses particular problems of high pressure and temperature .深海钻探带来高压力和温度的特殊问题。
adv. 特别地，独特地；详细地，具体地；明确地，细致地 同义词:specifically, extra, definitely, positively It protects economic resources — particularly oil and the shipping lanes through which it moves.它保护着经济资源——尤其是石油与运输石油所需的航道。
adv. 部分地；在一定程度上 同义词:half Refraction makes a straight stick look bent if it is partly in water .折射使一根部分浸在水中的直棍子看起来是弯的。
n. 伙伴；合伙人；配偶 vi. 合伙；合股；成为搭档 vt. 使合作；与…合伙 同义词:comrade, associate, joint stock, tie up, team Bob partnered his father well at the tournament.在比赛中鲍勃与他父亲结为很好的一对。
n. 一段（文章）；走廊；通路 同义词:hall, opening, access, corridor passage to U.S.A.航行到美国
n. 旅客；乘客；过路人；碍手碍脚的人 同义词:traveler, viator The passenger retrieved his lost package .旅客找回了他丢失的包裹。
n. 激情；热情；酷爱；盛怒 同义词:flame, love, fire, warmth As a result , she created a new career and a new passion for herself .结果，她干出了一个新事业，为自己创造了一个新的激情。
adj. 被动的，消极的；被动语态的 n. 被动语态 同义词:driven, negative Much of the problem is that we live in a passive age .问题主要在于我们是生活在一个被动的年代。
n. 护照，通行证；手段 同义词:protection, instrument, shift, road, tool Please show your ticket and passport .请出示您的机票和护照。
vt. 张贴，裱糊；用浆糊粘 n. 面团，膏；糊状物，[胶粘] 浆糊 同义词:post, mash Please paste these coloured sheets of paper together.请把这几张彩纸粘在一起。
n. 娱乐，消遣 同义词:entertainment, recreation, pleasure, sport, occupation Playing cards is our favorite pastime when travel by train .打牌是我们乘火车旅行时最喜欢的娱乐消遣。

adj. 恰好的；熟练的；合适的 adv. 恰好；熟记地 n. 轻拍；小块；轻拍声 vt. 轻拍 vi. 轻拍 同义词:experienced, applicable, skilled, becoming, shaped, just, spot, tablet, nubble, chuck, tap The old man patted the dog with his hand.老人用手轻轻地拍了拍那条狗。
n. 眼罩；斑点；碎片；小块土地 vt. 修补；解决；掩饰 vi. 打补丁 同义词:spot, chip, debris, decide, settle patches of blue sky(天空的)蓝天部分
n. 道路；小路；轨道 同义词:way, railway, track, road, course Failure is the path to success .失败是通往成功的道路。
n. 耐性，耐心；忍耐，容忍 同义词:tolerance, endurance Nature , time , and patience are the three great physicians .自然，时间和耐心是三个伟大的医生。
adj. 有耐性的，能容忍的 n. 病人；患者 同义词:indefatigable, sick, sufferer The effect of the treatment upon the patient was magical .这种治疗对于病人的效果是意想不到的。
n. 模式；图案；样品 vt. 模仿；以图案装饰 vi. 形成图案 同义词:mode, device, design, schema, specimen, simulate, imitate He has patterned himself after the example of his father.他一举一动都模仿他父亲的样子。
n. 暂停；间歇 vi. 暂停，停顿，中止；踌躇 同义词:hang, moratorium, stop, time out “Why did you pause?”“Go on.”“你为什么停顿下来了?”“继续下去。”
vt. 铺设；安排；作铺设之用 同义词:schedule, budget, settle, place in The path is paved with concrete slabs.这条路是用混凝土板铺成的。
n. 人行道 同义词:sidewalk, footpath Be alert when driving . Roads may become blocked or closed due to collapsed pavement or debris .驾驶时保持警觉。由于路面坍塌或碎片，道路可能被封锁或截断。
vt. 抓，扒；亲昵地抚摸 vi. 用爪子抓；翻找 n. 爪子；手 同义词:hent, scratch, hunt throw, hand, danny He barely escaped being pawed by the dog.他侥幸没有被狗抓着。
n. 付款，支付；报酬，报答；偿还；惩罚，报应 同义词:compensation, punishment, consideration, rod, discipline I see . And what are your terms of payment ?我明白了，你们的付款条件是什么？
n. 豌豆 同义词:pease He came every day to feed the baby horse we named Pea and to clean her stall .我们给小马驹取名“甜豆”，马丁每天来喂它，还打扫马厩。
n. 桃子；桃树；桃红色；受人喜欢的人（或物） adj. 桃色的；用桃子制成的 vi. 告密 vt. 告发 同义词:fushia, cherry red, inform, rat, tell on, blow the whistle Have you heard the news? Brown has peached against us.你可听到消息?布朗出卖了我们。

n. 山峰；最高点；顶点；帽舌 vt. 使达到最高点；使竖起 vi. 消瘦；到达最高点；变憔悴 adj. 最高的；最大值的 同义词:height, sky, summit, mount, crown, cock, slim down, highest, supreme, maximum, top, tallest She pursed her pretty lips and peaked her eyebrows.她紧闭美丽的双唇，竖起眉毛。
n. [园艺] 梨树；梨子 Miss Cat 's pear is green .猫小姐的梨是绿色的。
n. 珍珠；珍珠色；杰出者；珍品 adj. 镶珍珠的；珍珠状的 vi. 采珍珠；成珍珠状 vt. 使成珠状；用珍珠装饰；使呈珍珠色 同义词:treasure, perla, perlitic, impearl Sweat pearled his forehead.他额上满是汗珠。

n. 农民；乡下人 同义词:farmer, provincial Eggs were often wrapped in gold leaf or , if you were a peasant , colored brightly by boiling them with the leaves or petals of certain flowers .人们常常用金色的叶子包裹复活蛋，或是农民的做法：将复活蛋画得色彩斑斓，并把它和叶子或是真花瓣一起煮沸。
n. 卵石；水晶透镜 vt. 用卵石铺 同义词:boulder, ratchel Cookies are spread with white sugar pebbling the surface.饼干表面撒满着粒粒白糖。

adj. 特殊的；独特的；奇怪的；罕见的 n. 特权；特有财产 同义词:specific, distinct, unique, strange, individual, franchise, special privilege The reason is the discovery , in 2004 , of some peculiar seashells of that age in Blombos, a seaside cave in South Africa .原因就是在2004年，在南非海边的一个洞穴，布隆伯斯洞中发现了一些罕见的海贝。
v. 剥，剥落；削 n. 皮 同义词:flake off, shell off, fur, tegument Please peel an apple for me.请给我削个苹果。
n. 偷看；隐约看见，瞥见 vi. 窥视；慢慢露出，出现；吱吱叫 vt. 使出现 同义词:peek, occur, figure, offer The birds peeped exactly as we refilled the feeder.当我们再加饲料的时候，小鸟就唧唧喳喳叫个不停。
vt. 渗透；穿透；洞察 vi. 渗透；刺入；看透 同义词:filter, permeate, sink, osmose The nail easily penetrated the soft wood.钉子很容易地就穿透了软木材。

n. 半岛 同义词:byland, chersonese Beijing should explicitly sanction the possibility of a reunified peninsula even if that means accepting a strong US ally pressing against its border .对朝鲜半岛可能重新统一，中国应当明确支持，即使这意味着接受边境上出现一个强大的美国盟友。
n. （美）分；便士 同义词:cent, minute Sam : Is that bag heavy , Penny ?萨姆：那个提包重吗，彭妮？
n. 退休金，抚恤金；津贴；膳宿费 vt. 发给养老金或抚恤金 同义词:retirement pay, subsidy John is pensioned by the employer and has departed from the company.雇主给约翰养老金让其退休，他已离开了公司。
n. 胡椒；辣椒；胡椒粉 vt. 加胡椒粉于；使布满 同义词:peper, capsicum, besprinkle You don't have to pepper the soup.你不一定要在汤里撒胡椒面。
vt. 察觉，感觉；理解；认知 vi. 感到，感知；认识到 同义词:detect, feel, absorb, see, read, to feel, come to realize The students perceived that his behavior had changed.同学们发觉他的行为有些变化。
n. 百分比；百分率，百分数 同义词:centage The horizontal analysis is the study on percentage changes in financial statement items .水平分析是对财务报表项目的百分比变化的研究。
adv. 完美地；完全地；无瑕疵地 同义词:totally, entirely, completely, absolutely, thoroughly, strictly, fully The area was perfectly round .那区域完全是圆形的。
vt. 执行；完成；演奏 vi. 执行，机器运转；表演 同义词:accomplish, implement, achieve, complete, fulfil, put into effect, to carry out The doctor performed the operation yesterday.昨天大夫进行了一例手术。
n. 性能；绩效；表演；执行 同义词:property, capability, enforcement, execution, implementing Our music teacher will give us extra credit if we write a report on the performance .如果我们写一个表演的报告的话英语老师将会给我们额外的学分。
n. 香水；香味 vt. 洒香水于…；使…带香味 vi. 散发香气 同义词:fragrance, parfum The air is perfumed with the rose flowers.空气中充满着玫瑰香味。
adj. 永久的，永恒的；不变的 n. 烫发（等于permanent wave） 同义词:eternal, constant, steady, lasting, perpetual He has no permanent employment .他没有永久性的工作。
adv. 永久地，长期不变地 同义词:perennially, timelessly What would you say to having them permanently erased from your brain ?你说怎么才能将它们永久地从你的记忆中抹去?。
n. 允许，许可 同义词:allows, liberty, leave South Carolina will soon do so , if it can get permission from the feds .如果能获得联邦许可的话，南卡罗来纳州也将很快依此实行。
vi. 许可；允许 vt. 许可；允许 n. 许可证，执照 同义词:to allow, make a promise, license, let, have, grant, license, patent Smoking is not permitted.不许吸烟。
vi. 存留，坚持；持续，固执 vt. 坚持说，反复说 同义词:stay, abide, iterate He persisted in denying his knowledge of the matter.他始终否认知道这事。
adj. 个人的；身体的；亲自的 n. 人事消息栏；人称代名词 同义词:individual, subjective, physical His achievement was to be a personal bridge .他的成就是成为了一座个人桥梁。
n. 人事部门；全体人员 adj. 人员的；有关人事的 同义词:crew, Personnel Department Football teams would have more autonomy as to personnel , finances and facilities .足球队在人员，财政和设施上都有更大自主权。
n. 观点；远景；透视图 adj. 透视的 同义词:viewpoint, outlook, eye, sentiment, standpoint, clairvoyant So from the global perspective , it is very important .所以从全局的角度来看，这是很重要的。
vt. 说服，劝说；使某人相信；劝某人做（不做）某事 vi. 说服；被说服 adj. 空闲的，有闲的 同义词:satisfy, convince, argue, talk around, win over, available, leisure, off I am trying to persuade him to give up the attempt.我正力图劝他放弃这种尝试。
adj. 悲观的，厌世的；悲观主义的 同义词:world-weary, futilitarian That may be too pessimistic , but all agree that the number will rise further .这一比例实在过于悲观，但是所有人都同意将继续上升。
n. （英）汽油 同义词:gasoline, gas The overall labour market is tight , wages are up and petrol prices have fallen .总体的劳动力市场依然是紧缺的，工资在上升，油价在下跌。
n. 石油 同义词:fossil oil, geoline Crude oil , or unprocessed petroleum , is called sour when it contains a lot of sulfur , and an impurity .原油，或称为“未被加工的石油”，当其含有大量硫磺这一杂质时，被叫做“高硫原油”。
n. 相；阶段；[天] 位相 vt. 使定相；逐步执行 vi. 逐步前进 同义词:stage, age, grade The army is making a well-phrased withdrawal from the occupied country.军队正从占领区按计划分期撤出。
n. 现象；奇迹；杰出的人才 同义词:wonder, miracle This is a more complex phenomenon than the " quiet coup " Prof Johnson describes .这种现象比约翰逊教授所描述的“无声的政变”更为复杂。
n. 哲学家；哲人 同义词:wise man, rishi Shakespeare was a dreamer , and some say he was a philosopher too.莎士比亚是个梦想家，也有人说他是哲学家。
n. 哲学；哲理；人生观 同义词:Weltbild, Anschauung Most people have a philosophy on life .大多数人都有自己的生命哲学。
n. 电话；耳机，听筒 vt. 打电话 vi. 打电话 同义词:telephone, call, call up sb, ring up, telephone, call up sb If I don't phone the office,she would close up at 5 p.m.要不是我给办事处打了电话，她会在下午5点钟关门的。
vt. 为…拍照；使深深印入 vi. 拍照；在照片上显得 n. 照片，相片 同义词:take a photo, to take a picture, picture, pix We should be glad to photograph the house and its grounds.我们很乐意为这所房子及其庭院拍照。
adj. 摄影的；逼真的；（尤指记忆）详细准确的 同义词:realistic, living In the absence of photographic evidence , Sri Lankans had begun to dread that he had escaped .由于没有照片证据，政府曾一度担忧普拉巴卡兰已经逃出生天。
n. 短语, 习语, 措辞, [音]乐句 vt. 措词, 将(乐曲)分成乐句 同义词:idiom, diction He phrased his criticisms in careful terms.他的批评用词十分谨慎。

adj. [物] 物理的；身体的；物质的 n. 体格检查 同义词:personal, material, natural, medical examination, check-up The World Health Organization says , there are 3 major causes : tobacco use , physical inactivity and an unhealthy diet .世界卫生组织说，有3个主要原因：烟草使用，身体不活动和一个不健康的节食。
n. [医] 医师；内科医师 同义词:medical doctor, medico He 's the best physician that know the worthlessness of the most medicine .凡是知道大部分的药物均属毫无价值者时为最好的医师。
n. 物理学家；唯物论者 同义词:physical scientist Statics , the physicist knows , is only an abstraction from dynamics .物理学家知道，静力学只是动力学的一种抽象。
n. 物理学；物理现象 This reflects the dynamic growth of the physics discipline during this century .这反映出物理学这个学科在本世纪的茁壮成长。
vi. 挑选；采摘；挖 vt. 拾取；精选；采摘；掘 n. 选择；鹤嘴锄；挖；[篮球]掩护 同义词:select, choose from, dig, handpick, chose, selection, choice He is picking the surface of a millstone.他正在凿磨石面。
n. 野餐 vi. 去野餐 同义词:junket The students often picnic at the park.同学们常去公园野餐。
n. 馅饼；饼图；爱说话的人 vt. 使杂乱 同义词:pastie, talkee-talkee, clutter up We eat turkeys , corn and pumpkin pie .我们吃火鸡，玉米和南瓜派。
n. 块；件；篇；硬币 vt. 修补；接合；凑合 同义词:block, mass, cement, joint to piece a dress给衣服打补丁
vt. 刺穿；洞察；响彻；深深地打动 vi. 进入；透入 同义词:cut through, transpierce, come into, go into, get into, enter into He pierced the rubber ball with a needle.他用针刺穿橡皮球。
n. 鸽子 同义词:La paloma, dove Many journalists here choose to pigeon all but the most innocuous of stories.除了平淡乏味的报道，这儿的新闻记者将一切通过鸽子传递出去。

n. 柱子，柱形物；栋梁；墩 vt. 用柱支持 同义词:column, ridgepole Indeed , for centuries , people believed the pagoda got its resilience from its central pillar , known as a shinbashira.的确，数世纪来，人们认为宝塔从被广泛称作“心柱”的中心柱那里得到了回弹力。
n. 枕头 vt. 垫；枕于…；使…靠在 vi. 枕着头；靠在枕上 同义词:weeping willow The child pillowed his head on his mother's shoulder.这孩子把头枕在母亲的肩上。
n. 飞行员；领航员 adj. 试点的 v. 驾驶；领航；试用 同义词:aviator, amn, to navigate, experiment with It's hard to pilot a boat in rough waters.在汹涌的海面驾驶船只不容易。
n. 大头针，针；栓；琐碎物 vt. 钉住；压住；将……用针别住 同义词:needle, plug, nail up, transfix She pinned the material together.她把材料别在一起。
vt. 捏；勒索；使苦恼；掐掉某物，修剪 n. 匮乏；少量；夹痛 vi. 夹痛；节省 同义词:harry, shear, crop, bit, ounce, save, economize on He pinched his fingers in the door.他的手指被门夹住了。
vi. 渴望，痛苦；憔悴 n. [林] 松树；凤梨，菠萝 vt. 为…悲哀；哀悼 adj. 松木的；似松的 同义词:rare, aspire, ananas, regret, grieve over Then he scraped away the dirt , and exposed a pine shingle .接着他刨去泥土，下面露出一块松木瓦块。
n. 粉红色；化身，典范；石竹花；头面人物 vt. 扎，刺，戳；使…变粉红色；使…面红耳赤 vi. 变粉红色 adj. 粉红的；比较激进的；石竹科的；脸色发红的 同义词:picture, ideal, stick, string She had a bow of pink ribbon in her hair .她的头发上有一个粉红色绸带的蝴蝶结。
n. 品脱；一品脱的量；一品脱牛奶或啤酒 pint -sized robot can " learn " its way around homes and be dispatched on command to different spots .这个小型的机器人能“认识”家里的环境，并能根据指令被分派到不同地点。
n. 先锋；拓荒者 vt. 开辟；倡导；提倡 vi. 作先驱 同义词:vanguard, avant-courier, advocate, inaugurate The scientists of the country pioneer in cleaning up harbour water.这个国家的科学工作者开创净化港口水域的工作。
n. 管；烟斗；笛 vi. 吹笛；尖叫 vt. 用管道输送；尖声唱；用管乐器演奏 同义词:tube, cigarette holder, scream He piped so that we could dance.他吹笛子好让我们跳舞。

n. 管道；输油管；传递途径 同义词:canal, ducting If Americans do not want their oil , then Alberta will build a pipeline to the west coast and sell it to China , they say .他们说，如果美国人不想要这里生产的石油，艾伯塔省将修建一条通向西海岸的石油管线，将石油销售给中国。
n. 手枪；信号枪 vt. 用手枪射击 同义词:handgun, betsy The pistol looked so blamed dangerous .这支手枪看起来非常危险。
n. 矿井；深坑；陷阱；（物体或人体表面上的）凹陷；（英国剧场的）正厅后排；正厅后排的观众 vt. 使竞争；窖藏；使凹下；去…之核；使留疤痕 vi. 凹陷；起凹点 同义词:mine, trap, cache, cave, sink marks pitted crabapple去核的山楂
vi. 倾斜；投掷；搭帐篷；坠落 vt. 投；掷；定位于；用沥青涂；扎营；向前倾跌 n. 沥青；音高；程度；树脂；倾斜；投掷 同义词:slope, throw, lean, throw, cast, camp, extent, degree, resin, putting, measure pitched paper柏油纸
adj. 平的；简单的；朴素的；清晰的 n. 平原；无格式；朴实无华的东西 adv. 清楚地；平易地 同义词:simple, defined, plane, flatland, puszta, definitely, fair, expressly The pavement thus laid is to be plained and polished.这样铺的路面需要弄平弄光滑。
n. 栽植；殖民；大农场 adj. 适用于种植园或热带、亚热带国家的 同义词:settlement, colonization A survey in 2007 found a third of plantation employees live in poverty .2007年的一项调查发现，三分之一种植业园工人生活在贫困之中。
n. 石膏；灰泥；膏药 vt. 减轻；粘贴；涂以灰泥；敷以膏药；使平服 同义词:plaister, gypse, stick, moderate His coat was plastered with thick yellow mud.他的上衣上沾着厚厚的黄泥。
adj. 塑料的；（外科）造型的；可塑的 n. 塑料制品；整形；可塑体 同义词:mouldable, malleable, restricting, true-up Plastic traveling bags are sold out today .塑料旅行袋今天已经卖完了。
n. 平台；月台，站台；坛；讲台 同义词:flatform, hathpace The reconfigurable software development platform technique is researched .研究了可重构软件开发平台技术。
n. 运动员，比赛者；游戏者，做游戏的人；演奏者，表演者；演员 同义词:athlete, sportsman I hope you are a player by then !我希望到那时你是一名运动员。
adj. 令人愉快的，舒适的；讨人喜欢的，和蔼可亲的 同义词:lovely, favorable, comfortable, grateful, easy The climate in Australia is generally pleasant .一般来说，澳大利亚气候宜人。
n. 快乐；希望；娱乐；令人高兴的事 vt. 使高兴；使满意 vi. 高兴；寻欢作乐 同义词:entertainment, wish, hope, joy, promise, glad, satisfy, be pleased, rejoice He will do angthing to pleasure her.他将尽力使她高兴。
adj. 丰富的；许多的；丰饶的 同义词:abundant, numerous, multiple, many, full They are happy to park children in crèches, which remain more plentiful than in the west .把孩子寄放到托儿所她们感到很高兴，东部比西部保留了更多的托儿所。
n. 情节；图；阴谋 vt. 密谋；绘图；划分；标绘 vi. 密谋；策划；绘制 同义词:action, designing, scenario, lot, to divide, be up to something, to plan The prisoners plotted an escape route.囚犯画出了逃跑路线。
vt. 犁；耕 vi. 用犁耕田；开路 n. 犁；耕地（等于plow） 同义词:till, plow, open circuit, clear the way for, cultivated land, arable land They ought to finish ploughing the south field by tomorrow.到明天他们应该犁完南边的一块地。
n. 勇气；内脏；快而猛的拉 vt. 摘；拔；扯 vi. 拉；拽；扯 同义词:courage, nerve, heart, inside, pull, draw, pull Did you pluck your eyebrows?你拔眉毛吗?
n. 插头；塞子；栓 vi. 塞住；用插头将与电源接通 vt. 插入；塞住；接插头 同义词:male connector, tampion, stop up, build in, add on The soldiers used their bodies to plug up a hole in the dyke.战士们用身体堵住大堤的裂口。
n. 投入；跳进 vi. 投入；陷入；跳进 vt. 使陷入；使投入；使插入 同义词:investment, input, plough into, throw one's self into, let sb in for, let in for to plunge an oar into the water使桨划入水中
adj. 复数的 n. 复数 同义词:complex numbers, complexor Words importing the singular only also include the plural and vice versa where the context requires .仅表明单数形式的词也包括复数含义，视合同上下文需要而定，反之亦然。
n. 诗；诗意，诗情；诗歌艺术 同义词:poem, verse He knows how to appreciate poetry .他知道如何来欣赏诗歌。

n. 要点；得分；标点；[机] 尖端 vt. 指向；弄尖；加标点于 vi. 表明；指向 同义词:core, main, heart, kernel, essential, direct to, fall on, make known, speak of sth. To divide by 100 is done by only pointing off two figures for decimals.除以100只要在最后两位数前打个小数点。
vt. 污染；使中毒，放毒于；败坏；阻碍 vi. 放毒，下毒 n. 毒药，毒物；酒；有毒害的事物；[助剂] 抑制剂 adj. 有毒的 同义词:slow, pollute, wine, liquor, drink, toxic, virous, venenous His wife poisoned him with arsenic.他妻子用砒霜把他毒死了。
adj. 有毒的；恶毒的；讨厌的 同义词:toxic, evil, rank, vicious, venomous Many people believe that poinsettias are poisonous .许多人相信猩猩木是有毒的。
n. 杆；极点；电极 vt. 用竿支撑 同义词:electrode, climax Never pole a boat from the bow.绝不要站在船头撑船。
n. 警察，警方；治安 vt. 监督；管辖；维持治安；为…配备警察 adj. 警察的；有关警察的 同义词:pig, copper, bobby, finest, oversee, to monitor, constabulary to police the streets维持街上的治安
n. 警察，警员；[分化] 淀帚（橡皮头玻璃搅棒） 同义词:pig, copper, bobby, finest policeman let the driver off with a caution .警察向司机提出警告后就让他走了。
n. 政策，方针；保险单 同义词:deal, programm The most common complaint centres on foreign policy .最常见的抱怨集中在外交政策上。
n. 磨光，擦亮；上光剂，擦亮剂；优雅，精良 vi. 擦亮，变光滑 vt. 磨光，使发亮 adj. 波兰的 同义词:grace, buffing, furbish, Polak Polish your shoes with a brush.用刷子把你的鞋子擦亮。
adj. 有礼貌的，客气的；文雅的；上流的；优雅的 同义词:civil, elegant, gentle, mild, courteous Is it polite to hug and kiss people in Thailand ?在泰国拥抱和亲吻别人是礼貌的吗？
adj. 政治的；党派的 同义词:governmental, clannish Others feared it would be too political .其他人担心这会过于政治化。
n. 政治家，政客 同义词:statesman A clever politician knows how to manipulate public opinion .一个聪明的政治家知道如何利用舆论。
n. 政治，政治学；政治活动；政纲 同义词:department of political science Politics will add to the policy complications .政治也将加大政策的复杂性。
vt. 污染；玷污；败坏 同义词:cloud, poison The river has been polluted by waste products from the factory.这条河已经受到工厂排放的废料所污染。
n. 污染 同义词:contamination, impureness Air pollution can also cause the disease .空气污染同样会引起该疾病。
vt. 筑成池塘 vi. 筑成池塘 n. 池塘 同义词:tank, mere The mass of ice choked up the mouth of the stream and ponded back the water.冰块壅堵溪口，截断了溪流。

n. 流行音乐；汽水；砰然声；枪击 vi. 突然出现；爆开；射击；瞪大；发出爆裂声 vt. 取出；开枪打；抛出；突然伸出；突然行动 adj. 流行的；通俗的；热门的 adv. 突然；砰地 abbr. 邮局协议（post office protocol） 同义词:world music, fizzwater, crop up, break out in, extract, take of, popular, fashionable, going, ruling, epidemic, short, amain The champagne cork popped when he pulled it out.他拔香槟酒的瓶塞时它砰的一声开了。
adj. 流行的，通俗的；受欢迎的；大众的；普及的 同义词:democratic, fashionable, going, welcome, pop Basketball is a popular sport in China .篮球在中国是一项大众运动。
n. 人口；[生物] 种群，[生物] 群体；全体居民 同义词:syngen, species group But population growth is raising demand .但是人口增加提高了需求。

n. 门廊；走廊 同义词:passage, corridor Five spacewalks are planned to help attach the new porch to the Japanese lab , give the space station some new batteries and perform other maintenance .计划进行五次太空行走将新的平台安装在日本实验室上；给太空站加一些新电池；及进行其它方面的维护。
n. 猪肉 vt. 与女子性交 同义词:pig, pigmeat His partisans have introduced piles of pork that smack of the Suharto era .他的党羽已经引进大量的猪肉，有点苏哈托时代的味道。
n. 粥，糊；麦片粥 vt. 服刑 同义词:parridge, conjee Yecch ! I like sugar on porridge .哟！我要在粥里加糖。
n. 港口，口岸；（计算机的）端口；左舷；舱门 vi. 转向左舷 vt. 持（枪）；左转舵 同义词:haven, bunder Port arms!(口令)持枪!
adj. 手提的，便携式的；轻便的 n. 手提式打字机 同义词:luggable, hand-held The problem is that existing apparatus for measuring density tend to be either precise or portable .问题是现有的测量仪器精确的不方便方便的却又不够精确。
n. 门房；服务员；行李搬运工；守门人 同义词:waiter, concierge " A 15 -year-old could do porter 's job , " says one .有人说道：“一个15岁的孩子都能胜任搬运工的工作”。
n. 部分；一份；命运 vt. 分配；给…嫁妆 同义词:part, proportion, fate, percent, lot, part, to allocate The conquered territories were portioned out among the victors.被征服的领土在胜利者之间被均分了。
n. 肖像；描写；半身雕塑像 同义词:description, image, icon The portrait depicts her face , neck and hand in soft color and delicate technique .肖像以柔和的色调，细腻的手法刻画了少女的脸部、颈部和手部。
adj. 葡萄牙的；葡萄牙人的；葡萄牙语的 n. 葡萄牙语；葡萄牙人 One inside a Portuguese shopping mall is larger than four tennis courts , and there's one in Kuwait that 's almost as big.单一个隐藏在葡萄牙大型购物中心的花园就比四个网球场大，科威特还有一个，大小也差不多。
n. 位置，方位；职位，工作；姿态；站位 vt. 安置；把……放在适当位置 She positioned herself just by the window so she could see what was going on outside.她在紧靠窗户的地方找了个位置，以便能看见外面的情况。
adj. 积极的；[数] 正的，[化学][医] 阳性的；确定的，肯定的；实际的，真实的；绝对的 n. 正数；[摄] 正片 同义词:active, established, practical, actual, fixed, effective, sincere I choose the positive side of life .我选择了指出生活积极的一面。
vt. 控制；使掌握；持有；迷住 同义词:contain, regulate, bit, bottle, manage He decided to give away everything he possessed and become a monk.他决定放弃他所有的一切，出家为僧。
n. 拥有；财产；领地；自制；着迷 同义词:estate, property, treasure, worth The sense of triumph and renewed possession swelled within him .胜利和重新占有的感觉又在他心里涌起了。
n. 可能性；可能发生的事物 同义词:probability, feasibility, potential, maybe, chance They exclude the possibility of murder .他们排除了谋杀的可能性。

adj. 可能的；合理的；合适的 n. 可能性；合适的人；可能的事物 同义词:reasonable, feasible, applicable, logical, rational, probability, feasibility, potential, maybe, chance We think every day about how to ensure that our staff can operate under the best possible conditions .我们每天都在思考怎样确保我们的工作人员在尽可能最佳的条件下工作。
adv. 可能地；也许；大概 同义词:probably, maybe, perhaps, potentially He possibly from Jack hears there .他可能从杰克那里听说的。
n. 岗位；邮件；标杆 vt. 张贴；公布；邮递；布置 vi. 快速行进 同义词:mail, dak, paste, publish The wall is posted over with notices.墙上贴满了通知。
n. 邮资，邮费 同义词:taxe, franking Two yuan plus regular postage .普通邮资再加两元。
n. 邮递员；邮差 同义词:letter carrier, mailman postman brought a small packet .邮递员送来了一个小包裹。
vt. 使…延期；把…放在次要地位；把…放在后面 vi. 延缓，延迟；延缓发作 同义词:adjourn, stave off, time delay The match was postponed to the next day because of bad weather.比赛因天气不好而延期到第二天进行。
n. 壶；盆；罐 vt. 把…装罐；射击；节略 vi. 随手射击 同义词:basin, kettle, flight, take a shot at potted meat罐头肉
n. [作物] 土豆，[作物] 马铃薯 同义词:murphy, tater He ate one potato right away .他马上就吃了一个马铃薯。

n. 潜能；可能性；[电] 电势 adj. 潜在的；可能的；势的 同义词:possibility, probability, feasibility, maybe, chance, feasible, possible, underlying, latent The greatest potential , however , is tied up in the housing market .然而最大的潜力，是房地产市场的不动用资金。
n. 英镑；重击，重击声；兽栏；拘留所 vt. 捣烂；敲打；监禁，拘留 vi. 连续重击，猛击 同义词:prison, devel, hold, prison, drive, belt The farmers pound rice in a mortar.农民们在臼中舂米。
n. 倾泻；流出；骤雨 vt. 灌，注；倒；倾泻；倾吐 vi. 倾泻；涌流；斟茶 同义词:issue, flux, dumping, shed, flow Mother poured sugar out of a bag into a pot.母亲把糖从袋中倒入罐内。
n. 贫困；困难；缺少；低劣 同义词:difficulty, shortage, hardness, want Every country will have its own poverty museum .各国都将拥有自己的贫困博物馆。
n. 粉；粉末；[化工][军] 火药；尘土 vt. 使成粉末；撒粉；搽粉于 vi. 搽粉；变成粉末 同义词:dust, dirt, pulverize He powdered the cookies with confectioners' sugar.他往小饼上撒糖粉。

n. 功率；力量；能力；政权；势力；[数] 幂 vt. 激励；供以动力；使…有力量 vi. 快速前进 adj. 借影响有权势人物以操纵权力的 同义词:strength, ability, competence, regime, force, stimulate, bestir, make good time The aircraft is powered by three jet engines.这架飞机由三台喷气发动机驱动。

adj. 强大的；强有力的 adv. 很；非常 同义词:formidable, cogent, greatly, quite, badly, extremely, too, highly, far Galileo used this powerful telescope to study the sky four days after a new moon .伽利略在新月出现四天以后用这种强大的望远镜观察天空。
adj. 实际的；实用性的 同义词:actual, effective, real, pragmatic, positive Planning for the period while advanced AGI emerges is more practical .更切实际的是去计划好”高等“AGI出现后的时期。
adv. 实际地；几乎；事实上 同义词:almost, nearly, actually, really, most He is practically a dictator .他实际上是个独裁者。

n. 实践；练习；惯例 vi. 练习；实习；实行 vt. 练习；实习；实行 同义词:tradition, convention, usage, exercise, exercise, bring to pass, execute, exercise Knowledge is a treasure , but practice is the key to it.知识就是财富，儿练习是通往财富大门的钥匙。
vi. 练习，实践；实施，实行；从事 vt. 练习，实践；实施，实行 同义词:exercise, wage, execute, exercise, fulfil, enforce Our income has decreased and now we must practise strict economy.我们的收入减少了，现在我们必须厉行节约。
n. 赞扬；称赞；荣耀；崇拜 vt. 赞美，歌颂；表扬 vi. 赞美；赞扬 同义词:worship, favoring and praising, celebrate, bless, admire, speak highly of, talk up He praised her for her courage.他赞扬她很勇敢。
vt. 祈祷；恳求；央求 vi. 祈祷；请；恳求 同义词:beseech, obsecrate, cry on, appeal to sb for sth We pray you to show mercy.我们恳求你发发慈悲。
n. 祈祷，祷告；恳求；祈祷文 同义词:suit, blessing He joined his hands and began a prayer , which excited my laughter from its odd phraseology .他交叉双手，开始祈祷了。他那古怪的措词把我引得大笑起来了。

n. 预防，警惕；预防措施 vt. 警惕；预先警告 同义词:prevention, prophylaxis, keep one's eye on the ball, keep one's eyes peeled It can be compared to a car seatbelt — a precaution , but no substitute for safe driving .这可以同轿车安全带相类比——是一项预防，但它并不能取代安全驾驶。
adj. 在前的；前述的 v. 在...之前（precede的ing形式） 同义词:prior, prius M precedes N in the alphabet.在字母表上M在N的前面。
adj. 宝贵的；珍贵的；矫揉造作的 同义词:golden, valued PRECIOUS 】 Time is precious , do not waste it on worthless deeds .时间是宝贵的，不要把它浪费在无价值的行动上。
adj. 精确的；明确的；严格的 同义词:accurate, strict, mathematical, rigid, decided Recognition of the interesting targets is the key technology of precise guide weapon system .典型目标的检测识别是精确制导武器的关键技术之一。
n. 精度，[数] 精密度；精确 adj. 精密的，精确的 同义词:fidelity, rigor, nice, accurate, mathematical, strict, rigid And the precision of the new technology is remarkable .而且这项新技术的准确性是显著的。
vt. 预报，预言；预知 vi. 作出预言；作预料，作预报 同义词:forecast, advance information The earthquake had been predicted several days before.这次地震早在几天前就已预报到了。
n. 前言；引语 vt. 为…加序言；以…开始 vi. 作序 同义词:prolegomena, perface, begin with, open with He prefaced the diaries with a short account of how they were discovered.他给这本日记写了序言，简述日记发现的经过。
adj. 更好的，更可取的；更合意的 同义词:Mair But any is preferable to the implosion of the euro zone.但是，采纳任何一种措施都比欧元区崩溃要强。
n. 偏爱，倾向；优先权 同义词:tendency, liability, priority, trend, favour Indifference analysis relies merely on the ability to rank goods in order of preference .无差异分析只限于个人对各种商品排列一个爱好的程序。
n. 偏见；侵害 vt. 损害；使有偏见 同义词:violation, bias, hurt, blast Your bad spelling may prejudice your chances of getting the job.拼写拙劣会影响你获得这个职位。

n. 准备；预赛；初步措施 adj. 初步的；开始的；预备的 同义词:preparation, arrangement, provision, opening, rudimentary The preliminary results were revealing : the average atrophy was greater in those with lower back pain than was normal .初步结果可是发人深省：遭受下背疼痛之苦的人，大脑平均萎缩程度要比正常人还多。
adj. 第一的；最初的 n. 总理，首相 同义词:initial, first, original, chancellor, Taoiseach The premier said that China would keep the renminbi at a " reasonable and balanced level ".温家宝表示，中国将把人民币汇率维持在一个“合理和平稳的水平上”。
n. 预备；准备 同义词:arrangement, preliminary, provision The report also calls for strengthening the math preparation of elementary and middle school teachers .报告也要求加强初级学校、初级中学教师在数学这课上的预修。
vt. 准备；使适合；装备；起草 vi. 预备；做好思想准备 同义词:provide, make, fix to prepare land for summer crops平整土地准备夏季作物
n. 介词；前置词 The word is compounded of a preposition and a verb .这个词是由一个介词和一个动词复合而成的。
vi. 规定；开药方 vt. 规定；开处方 同义词:to stipulate, to formulate, define, regulate, state, rule The supervisor prescribed the steps in which orders must be filled out.主管规定了完成订货的步骤。
n. 存在；出席；参加；风度；仪态 同义词:existence, being, entity, is This is true even in the presence of water treatment systems , they say .他们还说现在水资源的处理方法更加使其成为真的。

vt. 提出；介绍；呈现；赠送 vi. 举枪瞄准 adj. 现在的；出席的 n. 现在；礼物；瞄准 同义词:prefer, file, advance, recommend, assume, current, now, gift, giving, aiming, training, tribute He had the honour of being presented to the king.他有幸觐见国王。
adv. （美）目前；不久 同义词:soon, erelong That discrepancy does not presently exist .这种差异目前并不存在。
vt. 保存；保护；维持；腌；禁猎 n. 保护区；禁猎地；加工成的食品 同义词:maintain, save, secure, corn, sustain, conservation area, conservation district Wax polish preserves wood and leather.上光蜡可以保护木材和皮革。
n. 总统；董事长；校长 同义词:principal, prez We know how strongly president feels that he is right .我们知道总统多么坚定地认为自己是正确的。
vt. 压；按；逼迫；紧抱 vi. 压；逼；重压 n. 压；按；新闻；出版社；[印刷] 印刷机 同义词:push, hug, clic, news bulletin Press this button to start the engine.要开动发动机就按这个按钮。
n. 压力；压迫，[物] 压强 vt. 迫使；密封；使……增压 同义词:heat, compression force, reduce to, compel to pressure someone into doing something迫使某人做某事
vt. 假装；假扮；伪称 vi. 假装；伪称 adj. 假装的 同义词:simulate, come, act, fox, affected, assumed, simulate to pretend ignorance of the law假装不知法
adj. 漂亮的；可爱的；优美的 adv. 相当地；颇 n. 漂亮的人 同义词:lovely, taking, smart, cute, tony, relatively, fairly, comparatively, reasonably, considerably curtains to pretty up the room用来美化房间的窗帘
vi. 盛行，流行；战胜，获胜 同义词:obtain, win Justice has prevailed,the guilty man has been punished.正义已经获胜，有罪的人受到了惩罚。
vt. 预防，防止；阻止 vi. 妨碍，阻止 同义词:dispute, stem, block, stem, hinder from These rules are intended to prevent accidents.这些规则旨在防止事故发生。
adj. 以前的；早先的；过早的 adv. 在先；在…以前 同义词:ago, fore, antecedently Immigrant advocates counter that the current fee hike is far greater than previous increases .移民倡导者反驳说现在的收费上涨程度远远大于以前的增长。
adv. 以前；预先；仓促地 同义词:in advance, ago, formerly, ahead, back It also allows the teams to distribute food in areas previously off limits.协议还允许这些人前往过去不得进入的地区分发食品。
n. 牧师；神父；教士 vt. 使成为神职人员；任命…为祭司 同义词:minister, father, preacher Slote and priest went out together into a freezing windy starlit night.斯鲁特和神父一起走进寒风料峭，星光灿烂的夜空之中。
adv. 首先；主要地，根本上 同义词:firstly, basically, mainly, mostly, largely There are also annuals , primarily impatiens , that bloom in the shade .一年生植物也是，凤仙花主要在荫凉处里开花。
adj. 主要的；初级的；基本的 n. 原色；最主要者 同义词:elementary, major, central, main, leading, original color, fundamental colour The primary goal that any system seeks is survival .任何系统寻求的首要目标都是生存。

adj. 主要的；最好的；基本的 adv. 极好地 n. 初期；青年；精华；全盛时期 vt. 使准备好；填装 vi. 作准备 同义词:greatest, major, elementary, central, main, excellently, famously, youth, morning, essence, elite, flower, ready, provide to prime an explosive device使爆炸装置准备起爆
adj. 原始的，远古的；简单的，粗糙的 n. 原始人 同义词:original, simple, crude, plain, rough, Euroman This epic extolled the founder of this primitive tribe .这部史诗歌颂了这个原始部落的创始人。
n. 王子，国君；亲王；贵族 同义词:noble, infante In fact , prince called himself a bullet magnet .事实上，哈里王子自称是一块子弹磁铁。
n. 公主；王妃；女巨头 同义词:infanta, rani princess watches her ball .公主看着她的球。
n. 校长；委托人，当事人；资本；主犯 adj. 首要的；最重要的 同义词:president, client, party, headmaster, supreme, main, lead A school is only as good as its principal and teachers .一个学校实际上就是她的校长和老师。

n. 原理，原则；主义，道义；本质，本义；根源，源泉 同义词:theory, mechanism, element, essence, parent Nor should it be the principle of bonuses , since a link between performance and reward is desirable .问题也不应出在“发奖金”这一原则上，因为把奖金与业绩挂钩是可取的。
n. 印刷业；印花布；印刷字体；印章；印记 vt. 印刷；打印；刊载；用印刷体写；在…印花样 vi. 印刷；出版；用印刷体写 同义词:impression, seal, strike off, bring out, get out The mark of a man's shoe was clearly printed in the mud.一个男人的鞋印清楚地印在湿地上。

adj. 优先的；在先的，在前的 adv. 在前，居先 同义词:preferred, underlying, before, antecedently The downside to such a policy is that it reinforces the structure of the economy that prevailed prior to the recession .而这样的政策也有负面发展的可能性，那就是它进一步强化了经济衰退之前的经济结构。
n. 囚犯，犯人；俘虏；刑事被告 同义词:capture, galley slave She was like a prisoner so long immured that freedom dazes him .她象一个长年累月被关闭的囚犯，自由使她迷乱茫然。
adj. 私人的；私有的；私下的 n. 列兵；二等兵 同义词:chamber, cabinet, seaman second class Before marriage , she insisted that he sign a private contract .在结婚前，她坚持他签署了一个私人的婚约。
n. 特权；优待；基本权利 vt. 给与…特权；特免 同义词:franchise, peculiar the privileged class特权阶级
n. 可能性；机率；[数] 或然率 同义词:possibility, feasibility, potential, maybe, chance This fact lends probability to the story .此事给予这个故事些可能性。
adj. 很可能的；可信的 n. 很可能的事；大有希望的候选者 同义词:likely, trusted, authentic Our universe should emerge as one of the most probable .我们的宇宙应该就是以机率最高的姿态出现。
n. 难题；引起麻烦的人 adj. 成问题的；难处理的 同义词:conundrum, puzzler, debatable, stubborn The problem , however , was correlation .然而，问题就是相关性。
n. 程序，手续；步骤 同义词:routine, program, move, step The simplest procedure is to immerse the stoppered bottle to the required depth .最简单的方法是将带塞的瓶子浸没在需要的深度。
vi. 开始；继续进行；发生；行进 同义词:occur, happen, travel, pursue Work is proceeding slowly.工作正在慢慢地继续进行着。
vt. 处理；加工 n. 过程，进行；方法，步骤；作用；程序；推移 vi. 列队前进 adj. 经过特殊加工（或处理）的 同义词:manufacture, cope with, going on, course, system, method, approach to process leather to make it softer鞣制皮革使其变得柔软
n. 队伍，行列；一列，一排；列队行进 vi. 列队行进 vt. 沿著……行进 同义词:train, cavalcade, file He made little effort to hide from his wife this procession of young women .他毫不介意不对自己的妻子隐瞒这一大堆身边的年轻女人。
vt. 宣告，公布；声明；表明；赞扬 同义词:indicate, sound, post, state, publish The ringing bells proclaimed the birth of the prince.鸣响的钟声宣布王子诞生了。
n. 产品；结果；[数] 乘积；作品 同义词:outcome, event, result, manufacture, writing Only in respect of my own product .只是和我的产品有关的那些事。
n. 成果；产品；生产；作品 同义词:feedback, outcome, writing, manufacture, work It could also disrupt production networks .它还可能扰乱生产网络。
adj. 能生产的；生产的，生产性的；多产的；富有成效的 同义词:fruitful, procreative It might also be one of the most productive .这也可能成为最有生产力的会议。
n. 职业，专业；声明，宣布，表白 同义词:employment, career, calling, pursuit, statement, occupation Choose an organization that's related to your profession , if possible .可能的话，尽量选择和你的专业有关的志愿组织。

adj. 专业的；职业的；职业性的 n. 专业人员；职业运动员 同义词:vocational, specialized, occupational, career man You can , of course , get professional help , but I am not sure if I recommend it .当然，你还可以寻求专业帮助，但我拿不准自己是否该建议你这么做。
n. 教授；教师；公开表示信仰的人 同义词:teacher, master My father is a professor .我爸爸是一名教授。
n. 利润；利益 vi. 获利；有益 vt. 有益于 同义词:behalf, margin, benefit, gain, sake, advantage, gain, benefit, be good for It will profit you nothing to do that.你做那件事没有什么好处。
n. 程序；计划；大纲 vt. 用程序指令；为…制订计划；为…安排节目 vi. 编程序；安排节目；设计电脑程式 同义词:procedure, routine, plan, scheme, project The UN world food program says potatoes can grow in almost any climate .联合国世界粮食计划表示土豆几乎可以在任何气候生长。
n. 进步，发展；前进 vi. 前进，进步；进行 同义词:development, growth, making, advancement, wage, do, go ahead We are progressing fairly with the work.我们正在顺利地进行工作。
adj. 进步的；先进的 n. 改革论者；进步分子 同义词:advanced, ascensive The country 's constitution , adopted in 1996 , is one of the most progressive in the world .南非在1996年颁布实施的国家宪法是世界上最进步的宪法之一。
vt. 阻止，禁止 同义词:stem, block, dispute, bar, discourage We are prohibited from drinking alcohol during working hours.工作时间内我们不得喝酒。

vi. 设计；计划；表达；投射 vt. 设计；计划；发射；放映 n. 工程；计划；事业 同义词:design, engineer, design, schedule, engineer, style, frame, engineering, career, enterprise, plan, scheme Our projected visit had to be cancelled.我们计划中的访问不得不取消。

adj. 突出的，显著的；杰出的；卓越的 同义词:obvious, excellent, remarkable, brilliant, marked A few weeks ago a prominent white rancher near the border was killed , possibly by a smuggler or illegal immigrant .几周前，一位著名的白人大农场主在边境附近被杀害，可能是走私者或非法移民所为。
n. 许诺，允诺；希望 vt. 允诺，许诺；给人以…的指望或希望 vi. 许诺；有指望，有前途 同义词:wish, hope, pleasure, pledge, vouchsafe They promised that the work would all be finished by next week.他们保证到下星期完成全部工作。
adj. 有希望的，有前途的 v. 许诺，答应（promise的现在分词形式） 同义词:likely, hopeful, undertaking They promised that the work would all be finished by next week.他们保证到下星期完成全部工作。
vt. 促进；提升；推销；发扬 vi. 成为王后或其他大于卒的子 同义词:facilitate, boost, prefer, upgrade, further He worked hard and was soon promoted.他工作努力，很快就获得提升。

adj. 敏捷的，迅速的；立刻的 vt. 提示；促进；激起；（给演员）提白 n. 提示；付款期限；DOS命令：改变DOS系统提示符的风格 adv. 准时地 同义词:rapid, fast, fly, forward, ready, facilitate, boost, further, cue, noting, punctually What prompted her to be so generous?是什么原因使得她如此大方呢?
n. 代词 Overworking the pronoun so that every sentence features the word " I ".滥用人称代词。以至在每个句子中都用“我”这个字。
vt. 发音；宣判；断言 vi. 发音；作出判断 同义词:declare, pass sentence, articulate The priest said, “I now pronounce you man and wife.”神父说：“我现在宣布你们两人结为夫妻。”
n. 发音；读法 同义词:sonation, vocalization Learning a language is a lot more than learning a bunch of pronunciation rules.学习语言当然比学习一些发音方法更复杂更繁琐。
n. 证明；证据；校样；考验；验证；试验 adj. 防…的；不能透入的；证明用的；耐…的 vt. 试验；校对；使不被穿透 同义词:authentication, certification, demonstration, confirmation, witness, try out, put to test to proof a negative测试负极

adj. 适当的；本身的；特有的；正派的 adv. 完全地 同义词:suitable, appropriate, adequate, typical, becoming, totally, entirely, completely, absolutely, thoroughly, strictly, fully Proper weight alone doesn't show whether a diet is lacking in vitamins and minerals .仅仅适当的体重并不能说明饮食中是否缺乏维生素和矿物质。

adv. 适当地；正确地；恰当地 同义词:correctly, exactly, well, appropriately, adequately With the axis properly aligned, the tug would push the spinning asteroid along its orbit like a pinwheel.旋转轴调整适当后，拖曳船就能将旋转著的小行星像个串齿轮一样沿著其轨道推动。
n. 性质，性能；财产；所有权 同义词:performance, nature, ownership, estate, capability By appreciation , we make excellence in others our own property .欣赏能使别人的卓越成为我们自己的财富。
n. 比例；部分；面积；均衡 vt. 使成比例；使均衡；分摊 同义词:ratio, area, equilibrium, scale, part, apportion to proportion the width of a building to its height使建筑物的宽和高比例匀称

adj. 比例的，成比例的；相称的，均衡的 n. [数] 比例项 同义词:relative, matching, uniform, worthy Labour offered to enact AV and conduct a referendum on a much more proportional system , the single transferable vote ( STV ).工党建议通过选择投票制，并实行一种更多比例制的公投制度——单一可转移票制（STV）。
n. 提议，建议；求婚 同义词:suggestion, advice, offer, instance, recommendation The entire committee will talk over proposal .全体委员会将要讨论这项建议。
vt. 建议；打算，计划；求婚 vi. 建议；求婚；打算 同义词:schedule, design, map, think, purpose, aim, offer What do you propose we do?你建议我们做什么?
n. 前途；预期；景色 vi. 勘探，找矿 vt. 勘探，勘察 同义词:scenery, future, picture, expectation, landscape, reconnoitre, make a survey to prospect a mine勘探矿藏
