n. 浴盆；桶 vt. 把…装入桶；为…洗盆浴 vi. 洗盆浴；（衣服等）被放在桶里洗 同义词:bath, barrel And yet it is a harmoniser , not tub -thumper, the UN most needs .话又说回来，现在联合国的确更需要一位调和者而非演说家。
n. 管；电子管；隧道；电视机 vt. 使成管状；把…装管；用管输送 vi. 乘地铁；不及格 同义词:pipe, tunnel, fail, take the subway Jane tubed mathematics.简数学不及格。
vt. 卷起；挤进；用某物舒适地裹住；使有褶裥；收拢；大口吃；使隐藏 n. 食物；船尾突出部；缝摺；抱膝式跳水；活力；鼓声 vi. 缝褶裥；缩拢；舒服地裹在里面；大口吃 同义词:curl up, roll up, food, energy, diet, vitality, eating, pucker to tuck up one's skirt for wading撩起裙子蹚过河
n. 星期二 Tuesday I go to the playground .星期二的时候我去了运动场。
n. 学费；讲授 同义词:schooling The college refused to refund her tuition .学校拒绝退还她的学费。
vi. 摔倒；倒塌；滚动；打滚；仓惶地行动 vt. 使摔倒；使滚翻；弄乱 n. 跌倒；翻斤斗；跌跤 同义词:collapse, founder, founder, mess, falling down, circumgyration She tumbled off her bicycle.她从自行车上摔了下来。
n. 曲调；和谐；心情 vt. 调整；使一致；为…调音 vi. [电子][通信] 调谐；协调 同义词:accordance, breast, air, concert, adjust, coordinate, accord, restructure, sort, concert The violinist tuned the violin.小提琴手给小提琴调弦。
n. 隧道；坑道；洞穴通道 vt. 挖；在…打开通道；在…挖掘隧道 vi. 挖掘隧道；打开通道 同义词:tube, cuniculus, dig They tunnelled into solid rock.他们在坚硬的岩石中凿隧道。
n. [动力] 涡轮；[动力] 涡轮机 So why not attach the magnets directly to the external , rotating parts of the turbine ?那为什么不把磁体直接放置在涡轮机外部旋转的部件上呢？
adj. 骚乱的，混乱的；狂暴的；吵闹的 同义词:angry, chaotic, troubled, confused IT HAS been another turbulent week for the euro .对于欧元而言，这又是充满骚乱的一周。
n. 火鸡；笨蛋；失败之作 同义词:simple, put They ate turkey and pumpkin pie .他们吃了火鸡和南瓜馅饼。
vt. 转动，使旋转；转弯；翻过来；兑换 vi. 转向；转变；转动 n. 转弯；变化 同义词:wheel, roll, shift, roll, screw, variation, shift, change, diversification, mutation Is it electricity that turns the wheel?是电使轮子转动的吗?

n. 转向；旋转；回转；转弯处 v. 旋转（turn的ing形式） 同义词:revolution, rotation, rolling, rotating, swimming, spinning The trouble with frozen conflicts is that they have a nasty habit of turning hot .冷冲突的麻烦是，他们有一个坏习惯是会把冲突升级至白热化。
n. 萝卜；芜菁甘蓝，大头菜 同义词:daikon, neep Wow ! The turnip is so big . Is this a root , Mr. Li ?哇！好大的萝卜。这是根吗，李老师？
vt. 辅导；约束 n. 导师；家庭教师；助教 vi. 当家庭教师；（美）在家庭教师指导下学习 同义词:restrict, hold oneself in, mentors, teacher counselor He tutored the girl in English.他教女孩英语。
adj. 第十二的，第十二个的；十二分之一的 n. 第十二；月的第十二日 同义词:dozenth December is the twelfth month of the year .十二月是一年中的第十二个月。
n. 二十分之一 adj. 第二十的；二十分之一的 num. 第二十 同义词:vigesimal Only four months after he became President , the twentieth man to hold that office was shot .在加菲尔德成为总统后仅四个月，这位第二十个入主白宫的人遭到暗杀。
n. 二十；二十年代 num. 二十 adj. 二十的 同义词:score TWENTY years ago a British politician suggested there should be a " cricket test " for immigrants .二十年前，一位英国政客提议应该对移民进行“板球测试（即忠诚测试）”。
adv. 两次；两倍 This substance reacts twice faster than that one .这种化学物质比那种反应快两倍。
vt. 使成对 n. 双胞胎中一人 adj. 双胞胎的 vi. 成对；生双胞胎 同义词:conjugate His name will always be twinned with that of our school.他的名字将和我们学校的名字永远联系在一起。
vi. 闪烁；发亮 vt. 使闪耀；闪耀 n. 闪烁 同义词:lamp, spark, flare, shine on, scintillation, lambency Stars twinkled in the night sky.星星在夜空闪烁。
vt. 捻；拧；扭伤；编织；使苦恼 n. 扭曲；拧；扭伤 vi. 扭动；弯曲 同义词:screw, harry, distortion, strain, bend, double up She twisted many threads to make this rope.她用许多条线搓成这条绳子。
n. [气象] 台风 But after the typhoon , the island was always its most beautiful , with totally clean air and not a speck of pollution .但台风之后，岛上的风光是最美丽的，空气绝对纯净，没有一丝的污染，原来空气中的污浊都被吹走了。
adj. 典型的；特有的；象征性的 同义词:characteristic, representative, proper, very, own All this is what happens in a typical crisis .所有这一切发生在典型的银行危机中。
n. 打字员，打字者 同义词:typer The typist miscopied the letter .那打字员把这封信打错了。
vt. 装轮胎于 n. [橡胶] 轮胎；轮箍 同义词:tire But cars and trucks had been using a makeshift crossing to get from Tyre to Beirut and back.不过小车和大卡车都通过一条凑合用的公路往返于提尔和贝鲁特之间。
adj. 丑陋的；邪恶的；令人厌恶的 同义词:evil, ill, black, wicked I would never wear that ugly shirt .我永远不会穿那件难看的衬衫。

adj. 最终的；极限的；根本的 n. 终极；根本；基本原则 同义词:final, organic, fundamental, radical, underlying, telos, fundamental principle Indeed , many college students do not select their ultimate career path until after they graduate .当然，很多大学生直到他们毕业才会选择他们的最终职业道路。
adv. 最后；根本；基本上 同义词:eventually, finally, basically, lastly, either What makes it a community is ultimately in- person meetings .正是亲身的会面最终形成了一个社区。
n. 雨伞；保护伞；庇护；伞形结构 同义词:shadow, bumbershoot These are a London 2012 branded umbrella and a bag .这是一把印有“伦敦2012”字样的雨伞和包。
adj. 难以忍受的；承受不住的 同义词:impossible, insufferable Without art the crudeness of reality would make the world unbearable .如果没有艺术，现实的粗俗将使世界无法忍受。
adj. 无常的；含糊的；靠不住的；迟疑不决的 同义词:changeable, vague Because of this , it is still uncertain who invented TV .正因为此，至今还未能确定是谁发明了电视。
adj. 不舒服的；不安的 同义词:troubled, uneasy The princess would be uncomfortable here .公主在这里会住得舒服吗？
adj. 无意识的；失去知觉的；不省人事的；未发觉的 同义词:mechanical, automatic, cold, spontaneous A person has collapsed and unconscious .一个人除了事故，并且不省人事。
vt. 发现；揭开；揭露 vi. 发现；揭示；揭去盖子 同义词:detect, reveal, to discover, sniff out The police have uncovered a plot.警方破获了一项阴谋。
vt. 经历，经受；忍受 [过去式underwent 过去分词undergone 现在分词undergoing ] 同义词:experience, stand, stomach, tough, abide The city has undergone many changes during the last ten years.这个城市在过去十年中经历了很多变化。
n. 大学生；大学肄业生 adj. 大学生的 同义词:academic, college student, university student, collegiate For example , Harvard College is the undergraduate part of Harvard University .例如，哈佛学院就是哈佛大学的本科部分。
adv. 在地下；秘密地 adj. 地下的；秘密的；先锋派的 n. 地下；地铁；地道；地下组织；秘密活动；先锋派团体 同义词:quietly, privately, secretly, secret, chamber, inside, cabinet, sub, metro, subway They were undergrounding power lines.他们正铺设地下电力线。
vt. 强调；在…下面划线；预告 n. 下划线；下期节目预告 同义词:emphasize, stress, highlight to underline a sentence在一个句子的下面画线
prep. 在…的下面；在…的形式下；在…的支配下 adv. 在下面；在底下 n. 下面；底部 adj. 下面的；底层的 同义词:hereunder, down below, basis, bottom, base, following, nether A cat was sleeping underneath the table.一只猫在桌子下面睡觉。
vt. 理解；懂；获悉；推断；省略 vi. 理解；懂得；熟悉 同义词:see, absorb, read, seize, conclude, know, cotton on He did not understand the importance of this question.他不理解这个问题的重要性。

n. 谅解，理解；理解力；协议 adj. 了解的；聪明的；有理解力的 v. 理解；明白（understand的ing形式） 同义词:agreement, intelligence, grasp, protocol, head, intelligent, comprehensive, wise, bright, clever, grasping, comprehending He did not understand the importance of this question.他不理解这个问题的重要性。
vt. 承担，保证；从事；同意；试图 同义词:accept, pursue, address, try, offer We could undertake the work for the time being.我们可以暂时从事这项工作。

n. 事业；企业；保证；殡仪业 v. 同意；担任；许诺（undertake的ing形式） 同义词:career, enterprise, assurance, certification, commitment, holding, promising, agreeing, granting We could undertake the work for the time being.我们可以暂时从事这项工作。
vt. 取消；解开；破坏；扰乱 vi. 撤消 同义词:destroy, recall, disorder, repeal rescission, take back He undid his belt because it was too tight.他解开了他的腰带，因为它太紧了。
adv. 确实地，无庸置疑地 同义词:strictly, real These breakthroughs will undoubtedly lead to further advancements in the near future .毫无疑问，这些突破将导致未来的进一步发展。

adj. 不舒服的；心神不安的；不稳定的 同义词:uncomfortable, unstable Good manners is the art of making those people easy with whom we converse . Whoever makes the fewest persons uneasy is the best bred in the company .让与我们交谈的人感到舒适，这种艺术叫做礼貌。在群体中最优秀的人就是让最少的人感到不舒适的人。
adj. 意外的，想不到的 同义词:sudden, surprising Little by little , reading in Edward 's mind , Bertha discovered to her delight an unexpected purity .逐渐地，由于对爱德华内心的观察，伯莎高兴的发现了一种意外的纯洁。
adj. 不公平的，不公正的 同义词:partial, unjust, inequitable, unequitable This is unfair .这是不公平的。
adj. 不幸的；令人遗憾的；不成功的 同义词:evil, failed, unlucky, tragic He is unfortunate who cannot bear misfortune .不能忍受不幸的人是可怜的人。
adv. 不幸地 同义词:unhappily, unluckily Unfortunately , fixing the slipstream drive is proving to be difficult , as usual .不幸的是，像平常一样修理滑流装置被证明是困难的。
adj. 统一的；一致的；相同的；均衡的；始终如一的 n. 制服 vt. 使穿制服；使成一样 同义词:united, consistent, corresponding, matching, same, monkey suit, livery to uniform salesclerks in flannel给售货员发法兰绒制服
n. 联盟，协会；工会；联合 同义词:alliance, league, unity, combination, combined with In Union , he learned to talk politics .在工会组织里，他学会了谈论政治。
adj. 独特的，稀罕的；[数] 唯一的，独一无二的 n. 独一无二的人或物 同义词:distinct, individual, one, sole, picturesque Sometimes you can be unique for your own good .有时候为了自己的利益，你可以与众不同。
n. 单位，单元；装置；[军] 部队；部件 同义词:device, apparatus, installation, components, parts Today was the first day of our unit on genetics .今天是我们学习遗传学单元的第一天。
vt. 使…混合；使…联合；使…团结 vi. 团结；联合；混合 同义词:intermix, league, band, combine, connect, rally Several firms were united to form one company.把几家商行合并成一个公司。
n. 团结；一致；联合；个体 同义词:accordance, agreement, alliance, identity, combination, union, association The mood is grief , purpose , unity , and anger under control .悲痛的心情、决心、团结、愤怒都在控制当中。
adj. 普遍的；通用的；宇宙的；全世界的；全体的 n. 一般概念；普通性 同义词:widespread, entire, corporate, worldwide, current, general concept Use the bamboo very universal in China .在中国使用竹子非常普遍。
n. 宇宙；世界；领域 同义词:world, domain, province, territory, kingdom Hydrogen atoms are the smallest and lightest in the universe .氢原子是宇宙当中最小和最轻的原子。
n. 大学；综合性大学；大学校舍 同义词:college, campus Are you studying at this university ?你正在这所大学读书吗？
adj. 不公平的，不公正的；非正义的 同义词:partial, unfair, inequitable If you believe that life unjust , you are declaring yourself to be a victim .如果你相信生活不公平，你就在宣称自己是一位受害人。
adj. 无情的；不仁慈的，不厚道的 同义词:relentless, ruthless She was very unkind to Snow White .她对白雪公主很无情。
adj. 未知的；陌生的，默默无闻的 n. 未知数；未知的事物，默默无闻的人 同义词:strange, sealed, XYZ, pronumeral The rest of the cause unknown , though reduced sperm quality in men may be a factor .其余的原因还并不知晓，尽管男人精子质量的下降可能也是一个因素。
adj. 不同的，不相似的 prep. 和…不同，不像 同义词:different, diverse, varying, another, dissimilar This book is quite unlike anything I’ve ever read before.这本书与我以前读过的书大不一样。
adj. 不太可能的；没希望的 adv. 未必 同义词:not necessarily More generally, however, Japanese house prices unlikely to crumble .更寻常的情况是，日本的房价不太可能崩溃。
vt. 卸；摆脱…之负担；倾销 vi. 卸货；退子弹 同义词:debark, discharge of goods, load off They unloaded the books from the truck.他们把书从卡车上卸下来。
adj. 不幸的；倒霉的；不吉利的 同义词:evil, ill, unfortunate, tragic Friday is believed to be unlucky day .星期五被认为是不吉祥的日子。
adj. 不必要的；多余的，无用的 同义词:spare, useless, waste, needless, redundant It is also the cause for unnecessary arguments .这也是许多夫妻无谓争吵的原因。
adj. 讨厌的；使人不愉快的 同义词:evil, rank, poisonous Extreme anger , like in road rage , can only lead to unpleasant outcomes .像公路暴怒这样的极度愤怒只会导致不愉快的结果。
adj. 不令人满意的；不满足的；不符合要求的 同义词:ungratified It 's very difficult to rationalize unsatisfactory results .对于不满意的结果，为其辩护是困难的。

adj. 不稳定的；动荡的；易变的 同义词:mobile, variable, liquid, volatile That is the level above which , the UN says , the Earth 's climate system would become dangerously unstable .联合国表示，超过这个水平的话，地球气候系统就会处于险境、变得很不稳定。
adj. 不适合的；不适宜的；不相称的 同义词:inappropriate, inadaptable She has to let go of the unsuitable approach .他得放弃这种不适宜的方法。
adj. 不寻常的；与众不同的；不平常的 同义词:different, distinctive, apart That is very unusual in modern American history.这在美国的现代史上是很罕见的。
adv. 非常；异乎寻常地；显著地 同义词:extremely, badly, highly, greatly, too She has an unusually life of philosophy .她有着不同寻常的人生观。
adj. 不愿意的；不情愿的；勉强的 同义词:narrow, reluctant To judge by the paper , the administration is unwilling even to think about this .根据这份报告判断，本届政府对这个问题连想都不愿意想。
adj. 最新的，最近的；现代的，新式的 同义词:recent, latest, modern, current, last The news program gave up-to - date account of the nuclear accident .那个新闻节目针对这次的核能意外做了最新的分析报导。

adj. 正直的，诚实的；垂直的，直立的；笔直的；合乎正道的 n. 垂直；竖立 同义词:honest, vertical, straight, standing, square, verticalness, perpendicularity Hold a finger upright at arm 's length , then close an eye as if you were winking .竖直伸出一个指头，大约是胳膊的距离，然后就像眨眼一样闭上一个眼睛。

vt. 使心烦；颠覆；扰乱 vi. 翻倒 adj. 心烦的；混乱的；弄翻的 n. 混乱；翻倒 同义词:disorder, subvert, tip, keel over, chaotic, troubled, confused, disorder, chaos, confusion, turmoil, involvement I've upset a cup of coffee on my shirt.我打翻了一杯咖啡，洒在我的衬衫上了。

adj. 颠倒的；乱七八糟的 同义词:reverse, perversive It starts out as an ordinary day for the mayor of - ville , but soon his whole world is turned upside -down … literally .对W市市长来说这又是平常一天的开始，但毫不夸张的说，不久他的整个世界就会被搞得天翻地覆。
adv. 在楼上，向楼上；上楼；往楼上 adj. 楼上的 n. 楼上 同义词:abovestairs The boy came upstairs with agility .那男孩敏捷地走上楼来。
vt. 力劝，催促；驱策，推进 n. 强烈的欲望，迫切要求；推动力 vi. 强烈要求 同义词:crowd, rush up, impulse, driving force, scream for He urged her to study English.他极力劝她学习英语。
adj. 紧急的；急迫的 同义词:emergency, instant I cannot consider the matter as in any way urgent .我不能用紧急的方式来考虑这件事情。
n. 使用；用法；惯例 同义词:employment, utilization, tradition, use, convention They feed location and usage information directly to the upper levels .它们直接向上一层提供位置和使用情况的消息。
adj. 通常的，惯例的；平常的 同义词:traditional, conventional, common, ordinary, regulation For such a series it is usual to design a standard margin .对于这种系列图幅，通常是设计一种标准图廓。

n. 实用；效用；公共设施；功用 adj. 实用的；通用的；有多种用途的 同义词:practical use, public facility, applied, universal, current Diminishing marginal utility also expresses a " variety is the spice of life ".边际效用递减也表现为一种“多样化是生活乐趣”。
vt. 利用 同义词:do with, trade on, capitalize on, avail of, presume on We must utilize all available resources.我们必须利用可以得到的一切资源。
n. 极限；最大可能 adj. 极度的；最远的 同义词:limitation, threshold, terminal, excessive, extreme The child tried his patience to the utmost .孩子闹得他都几乎没有耐心了。
vt. 发出，表达；发射 adj. 完全的；彻底的；无条件的 同义词:release, put, voice, project, let go, thorough, full, complete, absolute, total He could not utter a word.他什么话也讲不出来。
adj. 空虚的；空的；空缺的；空闲的；茫然的 同义词:available, empty, blank, leisure, hollow The mid-level has one vacant unit for lease .现在中层有一个出租房子的。
n. 假期；（房屋）搬出 vi. 休假，度假 同义词:hols, have a holiday, take time off from sth. Two years ago , they had three weeks of vacation and stayed with us .两年前，他们有个三星期的假期，并和我们在一起度过。
n. 真空；空间；真空吸尘器 adj. 真空的；利用真空的；产生真空的 vt. 用真空吸尘器清扫 同义词:room, gamma space She vacuumed the room this morning.她今天上午用吸尘器清扫了房间。
adj. 模糊的；含糊的；不明确的；暧昧的 同义词:fuzzy, dark, uncertain vague commitments only serves to create fears that little substance lies behind the words .含糊的承诺只会引发人们担忧：在相关言辞背后很少有实质内容。
adj. 徒劳的；虚荣的；空虚的 同义词:empty, blank They protested to the President but in vain .他们向总统提抗议，但没有结果。
adj. 有效的，有根据的；正当的 同义词:available, effective, virtual, telling, significant A valid totals type is required for this aggregate to be created .将要创建的这种合计需要一种有效的总计类型。
n. 山谷；流域；溪谷 同义词:hollow, hill and dale The river snakes through the valley .河流迂回前进通过山谷。
adj. 有价值的；贵重的；可估价的 n. 贵重物品 同义词:worthy, of value, preciosity The most valuable weapon in this sort of asymmetrical warfare is intelligence .在这类不对等战争中，最有价值的武器便是情报。
n. 值；价值；价格；重要性；确切涵义 vt. 评价；重视；估价 同义词:importance, significance, price, stress, weight, score, rate, prize The painting has been valued at ￡60 000.这张画被估价6万镑。
n. 先锋；厢式货车；增值网 vt. 用车搬运 同义词:vanguard, pioneer Raab walks over to a steel vacuum chamber as big as an van .拉布走向一间钢制的真空室，看起来好像竖立的厢型货车。
vi. 消失；突然不见；成为零 vt. 使不见，使消失 n. 弱化音 同义词:disappear, blank, unmake The mysterious woman passenger vanished.这位神秘的女乘客突然不见了。
n. 虚荣心；空虚；浮华；无价值的东西 同义词:blank, mud The least defensible motive is vanity .最牵强的理由就是虚荣心。
n. 蒸气（等于vapor）；水蒸气 Help ! I 'm turning into vapour .救命！我快要变成水蒸气了。
adj. 变量的；可变的；易变的，多变的；变异的，[生物] 畸变的 n. [数] 变量；可变物，可变因素 同义词:mobile, liquid, unstable Fixed , variable , and mixed costs can be graphed as functions of their cost drivers .固定、变、合成本可以以其成本动因的不同功能用图表表示。
n. 变化；[生物] 变异，变种 同义词:shift, change, differentiation, diversification, turn This normal variation in rhythm is known as sinus arrhythmia .节律的这种正常变化称为窦性心律失常。
n. 多样；种类；杂耍 同义词:category, manner, nature, kind, sort Readers should benefit from the greater variety .读者应该受益于更大的多样性。
adj. 各种各样的；多方面的 同义词:varieties of, miscellaneous QUOTE】 The judge quoted various cases in support of his opinion .那法官引证许多不同的案例来支持他的意见。
vi. 变化；变异；违反 vt. 改变；使多样化；变奏 同义词:pass, change from, influence, fashion, shift, innovate I can vary the speed at will.我可以随意改变速度。
n. 瓶；花瓶 同义词:cruse Can I take this cloisonné vase ?我能买这个景泰蓝花瓶吗？

adj. 广阔的；巨大的；大量的；巨额的 n. 浩瀚；广阔无垠的空间 同义词:huge, massive, extensive, tremendous, enormous, voluminousness But vast majority of the matter in the universe may not emit photons of any wavelength .但是宇宙中大多数的物质也许不会发射任何光子（无论其波长为何）。
n. 蔬菜；植物；植物人 adj. 蔬菜的；植物的 同义词:plant, greenstuff, floral, botanic Potatoes are a very popular vegetable in North America .土豆在北美是一种非常受欢迎的蔬菜。
n. [车辆] 车辆；工具；交通工具；运载工具；传播媒介；媒介物 同义词:instrument, engine, tool, gear, implement It subsequently evolved into an even more complex investment vehicle .并随后发展成为一种更为复杂的投资载体。
n. 面纱；面罩；遮蔽物；托词 vt. 遮蔽；掩饰；以面纱遮掩；用帷幕分隔 vi. 蒙上面纱；出现轻度灰雾 同义词:yashmak, facemask, shadow, shield, curtain She veiled her face when she went out into the street.她上街时用面纱蒙着脸。
n. [力] 速率；迅速；周转率 同义词:speed rate, expedition But such velocity antiatoms are not very useful .不过这种高速的反原子并不是很有用。
n. 天鹅绒，丝绒；天鹅绒似的东西 adj. 天鹅绒的 同义词:continental quilt, velour It feels like velvet to me .我摸起来像天鹅绒。
vt. 敢于 vi. 冒险；投机 n. 企业；风险；冒险 同义词:dare to, be bold to, adventure, take a risk, enterprise, risk, undertaking, throw Men ventured their lives in war.人们在战争中冒着生命的危险。
vt. 核实；查证 同义词:touch bottom, check on Later,findings verified the scientist's theory.后来的发现证实了这位科学家的理论。
n. 版本；译文；倒转术 同义词:edition, translation The witness corroborated her version of the event .证人证实了她对那事件的看法。
adj. 垂直的，直立的；[解剖] 头顶的，顶点的 n. 垂直线，垂直面 同义词:standing, perpendicular, perpendicular plane, perpendicular line We call this the vertical migration .我们叫他们垂直迁徙。
adj. 恰好是，正是；甚至；十足的；特有的 adv. 非常，很；完全 同义词:typical, characteristic, proper, own, badly, extremely, greatly, highly, too So , as you can see , he was a very important person .由此你们可以看到，他是一个非常重要的人物。
n. 船，舰；[组织] 脉管，血管；容器，器皿 同义词:container, ship, pocket a vessel of wrath遭天罚的人
n. 背心；汗衫 vt. 授予；使穿衣 vi. 归属；穿衣服 同义词:shirt, waistcoat, award, grant, invest, habit, give The celebrant vested himself in the sanctuary.主持弥撒的神甫在祭坛上穿上祭袍。
n. 老兵；老手；富有经验的人；老运动员 adj. 经验丰富的；老兵的 同义词:old moustache, warhorse, seasoned I have a son who is a veteran - he just came back from Iraq .我的一个儿子是退伍军人，他刚刚从伊拉克回来。
vt. 使烦恼；使困惑；使恼怒 vi. 烦恼 同义词:trouble, irk, trouble, worry, bother about His conduct vexed her very much.他的行为使她大为恼火。
prep. 取道，通过；经由 同义词:by way of, THRU through They are going from Shanghai to Los Angeles via Tokyo.他们从上海经东京去洛杉矶。
vi. 振动；颤动；摇摆；踌躇 vt. 使振动；使颤动 同义词:swing, hesitate, oscillate The entire house vibrates when a big truck goes by.大卡车从旁经过时整个房子都颤动。
n. 振动；犹豫；心灵感应 同义词:oscillation, hesitation This hardly ever happens out of the blue : there are usually warning signs such as noise , vibration or heat .机器是不可能突然故障的：通常机器在故障前会有告警信号，例如噪音、振动或发热。

n. 恶习；缺点；[机] 老虎钳；卖淫 prep. 代替 vt. 钳住 adj. 副的；代替的 同义词:defect, deficiency, fault, disadvantage, abuse, in place of, in stead of, vise, deputy, auxiliary He has been appointed editor in chief vice Mr.White,who has retired.他被任命为总编辑，代替已退休的怀特先生。
n. 受害人；牺牲品；牺牲者 同义词:sacrificial lamb My first victim was you young brother .我的第一个受害人是你的弟弟。
adj. 胜利的；凯旋的 同义词:winning, triumphal His commitment to the cause was solid by 1949 , when he victorious communist army into Shanghai .随着1949年共产党的军队进入上海后，他的革命立场更加坚定了。
n. 胜利；成功；克服 同义词:success, prosperity, win, hit Well , is it victory or humiliation ?这是一场胜利还是耻辱？

n. [电子] 视频；录像，录像机；电视 adj. 视频的；录像的；电视的 v. 录制 同义词:television, Vedio, televisual, to produce It secures data , it helps with manipulating audio and video , it restores data , it makes slide shows and lets you watch TV .它可以保护数据，它有助于操作音频和视频，它能储存数据，它能做成幻灯片并让你看电视。
n. 观察；视野；意见；风景 vt. 观察；考虑；查看 同义词:observation, opinion, scenery, scope, comment, watch, study, regard, think of, think about We will go and view the house before we buy it.在买房前我们先去看一看房子。
n. 观点，看法；视角 同义词:perspective, outlook, eye, perception, sentiment The essence of these structures was so clearly exposed by the transformation viewpoint .这些结构的要点被变换观点显露得十分清楚了。

adj. 有力的；精力充沛的 同义词:male, live, energetic, mighty The efficacy of an alarm clock is explained as a very vigorous sensory input that triggers a large , synchronous assembly .闹钟铃声之所以有效，可以解释成一个非常强大的感觉输入，引发一个大的同步组合。
n. 藤；葡萄树；藤本植物；攀缘植物 vi. 长成藤蔓；爬藤 同义词:grape, rattan She told him about Johnsy and the leaves on the ivy vine .她把有关蔷希及常春藤蔓的叶子的事情告诉了他。
n. 醋 同义词:acetum You can imagine their surprise to find out that it was almost a hundred percent vinegar !你可以想像得出当他们发现那调料几乎是百分之百的醋时他们惊讶的神情。

n. 暴力；侵犯；激烈；歪曲 同义词:invasion, infringement In the novel , them , or in almost all of Oates? s works , there are three themes : woman , violence , and community .在小说《他们》，或在其几乎所有的作品中，主要体现了三种主题思想：女性，暴力和社区。
adj. 暴力的；猛烈的 同义词:fierce, hard Violent crust movements always happen near the continental shelf.陆坡区域的地壳经常出现剧烈的活动。
n. 紫罗兰；堇菜；羞怯的人 adj. 紫色的；紫罗兰色的 同义词:Violet Mist, johnny-jump-up, Tyrian purple Clouds are violet In the summer twilight .在夏天黄昏时的云彩是紫罗兰色的。
adv. 事实上，几乎；实质上 同义词:actually, really, almost, nearly, most Direct criticism of leaders is still virtually taboo in China .在中国，直接批评领导人实际上依然是禁忌。
n. 美德；优点；贞操；功效 同义词:asset, excellence, efficiency, morality A virtue of this plan is that it should help us find out .这项救援计划的一个优点就是，它应会有助于我们找到答案。
adj. 明显的；看得见的；现有的；可得到的 n. 可见物；进出口贸易中的有形项目 同义词:obvious, distinct, seen, evident The damage is visible .损害是显而易见的。
n. 视力；美景；眼力；幻象；想象力 vt. 想象；显现；梦见 同义词:sight, imagination, eye, seeing, eyesight, image, envision He tried to vision himself in a past century.他假想自己身处百年之前。
n. 访问者，参观者；视察者；候鸟 同义词:transient, fetcher Visitor : The large area nearby is the Urban Best Practices Area ( UBPA ), isn 't it?参观者：那旁边的一大片应该就是城市最佳实践区了，是吗？
adj. 视觉的，视力的；栩栩如生的 同义词:optical, Life-like Nearsightedness is a visual defect .近视是一个视力缺陷。
adj. 至关重要的；生死攸关的；有活力的 同义词:dynamic, life-or-death The data these probes collect provides information that vital to your enterprise network .这些探头收集的数据提供了对企业网络至关重要的信息。
n. [生化] 维生素；[生化] 维他命 同义词:thiamine hydrochloride But more and more research is suggesting that vitamin D might also help prevent many diseases .但是越来越多的研究正在建议维他命D同样能帮助预防多种疾病。
adj. 生动的；鲜明的；鲜艳的 同义词:telling, live, bright An old soldier gave us a vivid account of the Long March .一位老战士有声有色地给我们叙述了长征的故事。
n. 词汇；词表 同义词:lexis Why , with that vocabulary you could tour my country from Maine to California .哎呀，用这些词汇你可以从我国的缅因州旅行到加州了。
n. 声音；嗓音；发言权；愿望 vt. 表达；吐露 同义词:organ, sound, dream, throat, put, to express They voiced their approval of the plan.他们对这项计划表示赞成。
n. 火山 Let 's look inside a volcano .让我们来看看火山内部。
n. 排球 同义词:center forward The girls are playing volleyball .女孩子们正在打排球。
n. 伏特（电压单位）；环骑；闪避 同义词:jook Chevy Volt , a car that can go up to 40 miles before it uses any gas at all. That 's an American revolution .雪佛兰伏特，能不耗费一滴油跑完40英里。这就是美国式的革命。
n. [电] 电压 同义词:electric tension, electrical pressure The control of voltage and reactive power are inseparable .电压控制和无功功率的控制是分不开的。

n. 量；体积；卷；音量；大量；册 adj. 大量的 vi. 成团卷起 vt. 把…收集成卷 同义词:lots of, wealth, ocean, sea, bulk, massive, extensive, substantial, macro, much Coal is the biggest single cargo , accounting for 45% by volume and 23% by value .煤炭是最大的单一运输货物，占总货运体积的45%和货运总值的23%。

adj. 自愿的；志愿的；自发的；故意的 n. 志愿者；自愿行动 同义词:autonomous, willing, studied, designed, intended Import quotas are sometimes dressed up as voluntary export restraint agreements between exporting and importing countries .进口配额有时被装扮成出口国和进口国达成的自愿出口限制协议。
n. 投票，选举；选票；得票数 vt. 提议，使投票；投票决定；公认 vi. 选举，投票 同义词:election, poll, make the offer, propone, poll I didn't vote in the last election.上次选举时我没投票。
n. 航行；航程；旅行记 vi. 航行；航海 vt. 飞过；渡过 同义词:navigation, salling, put, sail, wing, cross They spent a year voyaging around the world.他们花了一年的时间航海周游世界。
vi. 进行；发动；从事 n. 工资；代价；报偿 vt. 进行；开展 同义词:progress, do, price, expense, pay, cost, do, carry with to wage a struggle进行一场斗争
n. 四轮运货马车；运货车 waggon must go whither the horses draw it.马往哪里拉，车就往哪里走。
n. 腰，腰部 同义词:middle, loin The upshot is a device that weighs around 5kg and can be strapped to a user 's waist .其产物便是一种重量仅为5千克左右、可被绑在使用者腰部的装置。
vi. 醒来；唤醒；警觉 vt. 叫醒；激发 n. 尾迹；守夜；守丧 同义词:awake, arouse, inspire, make someone tick, vigil, night watch I wake at seven every morning.我每天早晨七点醒来。
vt. 唤醒；使觉醒 vi. 醒来；觉醒 同义词:arouse, wake sb. up, wake up, awake I wakened early this morning.我今早很早醒来。
n. 钱包，皮夹 同义词:bag, purse A young lady handed in a brown wallet yesterday .昨天一位年轻女士交来一个棕色钱包。
vi. 徘徊；漫步；迷路；离题 vt. 游荡，漫游 同义词:lose oneself, hang about, range, louse around The speaker's eyes wandered round the whole house.讲演者的眼睛环视了整个房屋。
n. 温暖；热情；激动 同义词:passion, flame, fire Do you feel the warmth of the sun ?你感觉到太阳了温暖了吗？
vt. 警告，提醒；通知 vi. 发出警告，发出预告 同义词:alarm, jack, message, alert warned against smoking in the hospital医院内不准吸烟
n. 瀑布；瀑布似的东西 同义词:fall, chute That evening , the hunters arrived and camped next to the waterfall .那天晚上，猎人们到达了，并在瀑布旁边扎营。

adj. 防水的，不透水的 vt. 使防水 n. 防水材料 同义词:splashproof, hose-proof, rainproof Sitting there in a well- worn waterproof , she talked with striking familiarity of the courts of Europe .她坐在那儿，穿着一件旧雨衣，谈笑自若，显得对欧洲各国的风土人情多么熟悉。
vi. 波动；起伏；挥手示意；摇动；呈波形 vt. 卷（烫）发；向…挥手示意；使成波浪形 n. 波动；波浪；高潮；挥手示意；卷曲 同义词:roll, rock, undulate, fluctuation, undulation flags waving in the breeze在微风中飘扬的旗帜
n. [物] 波长 Sectors of it represent corresponding fractions of a wavelength .它的各个弧段则代表一个波长的相应分数。
n. 蜡；蜡状物 vt. 给…上蜡 vi. 月亮渐满；增大 adj. 蜡制的；似蜡的 同义词:increase, make, waxen to wax angry发怒
n. 方法；道路；方向；行业；习惯 adv. 大大地；远远地 adj. 途中的 同义词:path, method, direction, orientation, approach, aspect, system, greatly, large Happiness is the way .幸福本身就是路。
vt. 减少；使变弱；使变淡 vi. 变弱；畏缩；变软弱 同义词:shorten, to cut down, moderate, recoil from The flood weakened the dam.洪水损坏了大坝。
n. 弱点；软弱；嗜好 同义词:habit, appetite, hobby But the " weakness " must be kept in perspective.但必须正确地对待欧元的“疲弱”。
n. 财富；大量；富有 同义词:treasure, lots of, ocean, money, fortune, sea Everyone is talking about sovereign wealth funds .人人都在谈论主权财富基金。
adj. 富有的；充分的；丰裕的 n. 富人 同义词:rich, sufficient, plenary, the rich, haves Japan is a wealthy , homogenous , developed nation with a stable political system .日本是一个富裕的同质型发达国家，政治体制稳定。
n. 武器，兵器 同义词:arm, armament to be weaponed to the eyebrows全副武装
adj. 疲倦的；厌烦的；令人厌烦的 vi. 疲倦；厌烦 vt. 使疲倦；使厌烦 同义词:tired, worn, trying, boring, harassed, jade, be tired out, labor, jade Mary wouldn't admit how much the children wearied her.玛丽无法容忍孩子们对她的烦扰。

n. 天气；气象；气候；处境 vt. 经受住；使风化；侵蚀；使受风吹雨打 vi. 风化；受侵蚀；经受风雨 adj. 露天的；迎风的 同义词:climate, situation, last out, eat into, bloom out, effloresce, outdoor, unroofed They are going to weather the corn in the thrashing field.他们要把玉米在打谷场晾晒干。
vt. 编织；编排；使迂回前进 vi. 纺织；编成；迂回行进 n. 织物；织法；编织式样 同义词:pleach, complect, cloth, web This is hand-woven scarf.这是一条手织围巾。
n. 婚礼，婚宴；结婚；结合 v. 与…结婚（wed的ing形式） 同义词:marriage, combination, coupling, bond, join She will wed her daughter to a rich man.她准备把女儿嫁给有钱人。
n. 星期三 Wednesday and Thursday of next week .下周的星期三和星期四。
vt. 除草；铲除 n. 杂草，野草；菸草 vi. 除草 同义词:shovel, fireweed, ruderal You should weed the garden before supper.晚饭前你该把花园的草除掉。
vi. 哭泣；流泪；哀悼；滴落；渗出液体 vt. 哭泣；流泪；悲叹；流出或渗出液体 n. 哭泣；眼泪；滴下 同义词:water, shed tears, shed tears, pipe one's eye, tears, eyedrop James broke down and wept.詹姆斯控制不住感情哭了。
vt. 权衡；考虑；称…重量 vi. 重量为…；具有重要性；成为…的重荷；起锚 n. 权衡；称重量 同义词:view, measure, study, regard, think of, break ground, trade-off to weigh oneself on the scales在磅秤上称自己的体重
n. 重量，重力；负担；砝码；重要性 vt. 加重量于，使变重 同义词:significance, burden, stress, strain, consequence fishing nets weighted with lead用铅增加渔网的重量
adj. 受欢迎的 n. 欢迎 vt. 欢迎 int. 欢迎 同义词:popular, sought-after, Huanying, salute, greet, ave to welcome a foreigner欢迎一位外宾
vt. 焊接；使结合；使成整体 vi. 焊牢 n. 焊接；焊接点 同义词:combine, bond, jointing, soldering to weld the crack in the water pipe焊接水管的裂缝
n. 福利；幸福；福利事业；安宁 adj. 福利的；接受社会救济的 同义词:happiness, weal " They will create the perfect welfare state , " he says .他说：「它们会创造出完美的福利国家。」

adj. 著名的；众所周知的；清楚明白的 同义词:famous, noted, renowned, distinguished, celebrated Today they arrested a suspect who has confessed to killing a well-known businessman back in 1985 .今天他们逮捕了一个嫌疑犯，他已经承认它在1985年杀了一个有名的商人。
adv. 很好地；充分地；满意地；适当地 adj. 良好的；健康的；适宜的 n. 井；源泉 同义词:fully, properly, fine, adequately, wide, healthy, favorable, robust, fine, fit, principle, fountain I felt tears well up in my eyes.我感到眼泪涌出我的双眼。
n. 小麦；小麦色 同义词:triticum aestivum, trigo Farmers are planting more wheat and rice .农民种植更多的小麦和大米。
n. 车轮；方向盘；转动 vt. 转动；使变换方向；给…装轮子 vi. 旋转；突然转变方向；盘旋飞行 同义词:cartwheel, steering control, turn, roll, circle, spin to wheel a baby buggy推婴儿坐的手推车
conj. 同时；时时，有时；当…的时候 The Top / Bottom filtered field '| 0 ' is hidden , whilst the field below it , '| 1 ', is a custom group field .顶端/底端筛选字段“|0”是隐藏的，同时它下面的字段“|1”是一个自定义分组字段。
vt. 抽打；煽动；搅打（蛋，奶油）；彻底击败 n. 鞭子；抽打；车夫；[机] 搅拌器 vi. 抽打；急走；拍击 同义词:fan, egg, leather, mixer, flagellum, whirl to whip out a knife突然抽出刀来
n. 旋转，回旋；昏乱；一连串的事；短暂的旅行 vi. 旋转，回旋；急走；头晕眼花 vt. 使旋转；卷走，飞快地带走 同义词:revolution, rotation, rolling, turning, wheel, circle, spin, turn, spin, swing couples whirling round the dance floor一对对舞伴在舞池里旋转着翩翩起舞
n. 威士忌酒 adj. 威士忌酒的 同义词:wiskey It was an empty whisky bottle .这是个威士忌空酒瓶。
n. 私语；谣传；飒飒的声音 vi. 耳语；密谈；飒飒地响 vt. 低声说出 同义词:aside, collogue Stop whispering in pairs.别交头接耳了。
n. 口哨；汽笛；啸啸声 vt. 吹口哨；鸣汽笛（过去式whistled，过去分词whistled，现在分词whistling，第三人称单数whistles） 同义词:hooter, tyfon The boy whistled happily when he walked along.男孩边走边高兴地吹口哨。
adj. 白色的；白种的；纯洁的 n. 白色；洁白；白种人 同义词:stainless, pure, leuko, chalkiness Snow is cold and white .雪很冷而且是白色的。
n. 粉饰；白色涂料；石灰水 vt. 掩饰；把…刷白 同义词:embroidery, window dressing, mask, belie to whitewash the house粉刷房屋
adv. 完全地；全部；统统 同义词:totally, entirely, completely, absolutely, thoroughly, strictly, fully The other thing May is into is wholly anonymous transactions .梅现在正在干的另外一件事是匿名交易。
adj. 邪恶的；恶劣的；不道德的；顽皮的 同义词:evil, ill, black, gross, ugly You have been raking and smoking too much , you wicked boy .你成天胡闹，吸烟吸得太多了，你这个淘气的孩子。

adj. 广泛的；宽的，广阔的；张大的；远离目标的 adv. 广泛地；广阔地；充分地 n. 大千世界 同义词:extensive, comprehensive, broad, vast, fully, extensively, well, adequately, substantially But people now understand that they can have better control over a wide spectrum of relationships .如今，人们已经认识到他们有能力对更大范围内的关系保持良好的控制。
adv. 广泛地 同义词:far and wide, diffusely This last point is not widely understood .最后一点不是那么容易理解。
vt. 放宽 vi. 变宽 同义词:broaden They are trying to widen the discussion to include environmental issues.他们正在尽量拓宽讨论范围以纳入环境问题。
adj. 普遍的，广泛的；分布广的 同义词:extensive, universal, comprehensive, ruling, generalized Its memory is the embryonic form of the widespread now virtual memory .它的存储器是现在广为采用的虚拟存储器的雏形。
vt. 使成寡妇 n. 寡妇；孀妇 同义词:relict to be widowed by the war由于战争而成寡妇的
n. 宽度；广度 同义词:breadth, extents The purpose is to keep the tree within height and width bounds for more economical management .目的是使树冠保持在一定的高度和宽度的范围内，更经济地管理。
n. 翼；翅膀；飞翔；派别 vt. 使飞；飞过；空运；增加…速度；装以翼 vi. 飞行 同义词:ala, faction, lift, air transportation, to fly, fly away to wing an arrow at a target放箭射靶
vt. 擦；消除；涂上 vi. 擦；打 n. 擦拭；用力打 同义词:eliminate, avoid, strike, hit, towelling to wipe the dishes擦碟子
adj. 无线的；无线电的 n. 无线电 vt. 用无线电报与…联系；用无线电报发送 vi. 打无线电报；打无线电话 同义词:threadless, marconi He wirelessed his mother on the way to Japan.他在去日本的路上给他爸爸拍了电报。
n. 智慧，才智；明智；学识；至理名言 同义词:wit, scholarship Wisdom of the ancients always served civilisation well.古代人的智慧总是推动着文明发展。
n. 希望；祝福；心愿 vt. 祝愿；渴望；向…致问候语 vi. 愿望；需要 同义词:hope, pleasure, promise, desire, will, long for, die for, have need of, want for I wish to have a job.我渴望有个工作。
n. 智慧；才智；智力 同义词:wisdom, intelligence, brain, mind, mentality They would overcome them with their wit .他们将用智慧战胜这些困难。
vt. 撤退；收回；撤消；拉开 vi. 撤退；离开 同义词:beat a retreat, bug out, leave, split a government decision to withdraw funding一项撤销政府财政支持的决定
prep. 在…之内 adv. 在内部 n. 里面 同义词:in, inside, interiorly, inwardly, inside within a mile在一英里以内
vt. 抵挡；禁得起；反抗 vi. 反抗 同义词:low range, strive against, strive against, come out against As a politician, he is able to withstand public criticism.作为一名政治家，他经得住公众批评。
n. 证人；目击者；证据 vt. 目击；证明；为…作证 vi. 作证人 同义词:proof, teste, demonstrate, prove, argue I can witness that he wasn't at the scene of the crime.我可以证明他不在案发现场。
n. 狼；色狼；残忍贪婪之人 vt. 大吃；狼吞虎咽地吃 同义词:Lothario, lady-killer, tie into, gulp down He wolfed down his breakfast and went to school.他狼吞虎咽地吃了早饭上学去了。
adj. 木制的；僵硬的，呆板的 同义词:mechanical, rigid, dead There , on a dusty windswept plain , a small wooden statue of a man in robes teeters upon a short pole .你瞧那里，在一片风尘滚滚的平原上，一个身穿长袍的小木人，摇摇晃晃地立在一根短柱上。
n. 羊毛；毛线；绒线；毛织品；毛料衣物 同义词:erio, Lana Now it is time to dye the wool .现在是时候给羊毛染色了。
adj. 羊毛制的 n. 毛织品 同义词:haircloth In winter we wear woollen clothes to keep us warm .冬天我们穿毛料衣服以保暖。
n. 车间；研讨会；工场；讲习班 同义词:plant, proseminar If China is emitting ever more carbon , that is partly because it has become the workshop ofthe world .如果中国继续排放更多的二氧化碳，那部分原因是因为它已经变成了世界工厂。
adj. 遍及全世界的 Disease epidemics are now world - wide events because of travel between countries .疾病的流行由于人们在各国间的往返而变成一个世界范围内的事件。
n. 虫，蠕虫；蜗杆；螺纹；小人物 vt. 使蠕动；给除虫；使缓慢前进 vi. 慢慢前进；蠕行 同义词:nobody, endless screw, work, inch A snake wormed on the wet ground.一条蛇在潮湿的地上慢慢爬行。
adj. 更坏的；更差的；更恶劣的（bad的比较级）；（病情）更重的（ill的比较级） adv. 更糟；更坏；更恶劣地；更坏地 n. 更坏的事；更恶劣的事 They could be even worse economics .从经济上说甚至可能更糟。
n. 崇拜；礼拜；尊敬 vt. 崇拜；尊敬；爱慕 vi. 拜神；做礼拜 同义词:respect, church, praise, exercise, honor, love, regard, go to church to worship reverently虔诚地崇拜
adj. 无价值的；不值钱的；卑微的 同义词:cheap, valueless Stock cost is fictitious , can devalue at any time , worthless even .股票成本是虚拟的，随时可以贬值，甚至一文不值。
adj. 值得做的，值得花时间的 It is also easier in a poorer country to find worthwhile infrastructure projects — from railways to power grids — to spend money on.对于最贫穷国家来说，也更容易找到有价值的基础建设项目---从铁路到电网---进行投资。
adj. 值得的；有价值的；配得上的，相称的；可尊敬的；应…的 n. 杰出人物；知名人士 同义词:valuable, matching, out-and-outer, dilly This is a spirit worthy of American support .这是一种值得美国去支持的精神。
n. 创伤，伤口 vt. 使受伤 vi. 受伤，伤害 同义词:trauma, cut, vulnus, hurt, get hurt, get injured The hunter wounded the deer.猎人打伤了鹿。
vt. 包；缠绕；隐藏；掩护 vi. 包起来；缠绕；穿外衣 n. 外套；围巾 同义词:wind, lock, wind, outerwear, outer coat to wrap a baby in a blanket用毯子把婴儿裹起来
n. 花冠；圈状物 vt. 环绕（等于wreathe） vi. 盘旋（等于wreathe） 同义词:crown, lei, corolla, zone, environ, orbit, serpentuate He had to pose wearing a laurel wreath .他得摆好戴着月桂花冠的姿势。
n. 破坏；失事；残骸；失去健康的人 vt. 破坏；使失事；拆毁 vi. 失事；营救失事船只 同义词:destruction, breaking, blasting, remain, disruption, destroy, undermine, founder My car was completely wrecked in the accident.我的车在这次车祸中彻底毁了。
n. 手腕；腕关节 vt. 用腕力移动 同义词:savoir faire With your other hand , grasp wrist .用另一只手抓住握拳手的手腕。
n. 书写；作品；著作；[法] 笔迹 v. 书写（write的ing形式） 同义词:works, production, literature, calligraphy For a passage - writing test , write one or more paragraphs to answer one question .对于段落写作测试，写一段或者更多的段落来回答一个问题。

adv. 错误地；邪恶的，不正当地 n. 坏事；不公正 adj. 错误的；失常的；不适当的 vt. 委屈；无理地对待；诽谤 同义词:in error, incorrectly, bad, injustice, false, incorrect, unhappy, improper, inadequate, vilify, asperse The policeman wronged him and sent him to prison.警察冤 枉了他，把他送进了监狱。
vt. 用X光线检查 vi. 使用X光 n. 射线；射线照片 adj. X光的；与X射线有关的 “I think you should be X-raied.” the doctor said.医生说：“我认为你应该做一下X光检查”。
n. 哈欠；裂口 vi. 打呵欠；裂开 vt. 张开；打著呵欠说 同义词:breakage, chasm, gap, seam, splay She yawned during his lecture.她在他的课上不停地打呵欠。

adj. 每年的 adv. 每年；一年一次 n. 年刊；年鉴 同义词:annual, etesian, annually, annual, year book But estimates of when that will happen are as scattered , or more , than the yearly predictions .但是至于何时发生的预测依然各持其说，或着比年度海冰预测更加散乱。
vi. 大叫，叫喊 n. 喊声，叫声 vt. 喊叫着说 同义词:scream out, shout out, cry, wow He yelled with pain.他疼的大叫。
adj. 黄色的；黄皮肤的 n. 黄色；黄种人；黄色颜料 vt. 使变黄或发黄 vi. 变黄或发黄 同义词:maize, xanthic, sunking, giallo Bleach keeps the white clothes from yellowing.漂白剂防止白衣服变黄。
vt. 屈服；出产；放弃 vi. 屈服，投降 n. 产量；收益 同义词:desert, quit, succumb, to surrender, crop, output, harvest, proceeds an orchard that yielded a good crop收成好的果园
n. 青年；青春；年轻；青少年时期 同义词:green, prime, young man So somewhere in my youth or childhood .在我的童年，或者是在少年时。
adj. 年轻的 同义词:young, baby-doll And his youthful optimism could work at home too .他的年青和乐观对其家乡也起作用。
n. 热情；热心；热诚 同义词:passion, flame, fire, warmth, fervor But in their zeal to act , politicians and regulators are looking through the wrong end of the telescope .但行动热情高涨的政治家和监管者正从望远镜的错误一端看问题。

adj. 热心的，热情的，积极的 同义词:intense, active, positive, eager, warm This happened in Poland zealous sleaze -hunters of the Law and Justice Party squandered their election win in 2005 .这种情况在波兰发生过，雄心勃勃的公平法制党在2005年赢得了大选便轰轰烈烈的反腐。
n. [脊椎] 斑马 adj. 有斑纹的 同义词:zabra, brinded, freaked No . it 's zebra .不是。那是一匹斑马。
n. 零点，零度 num. 零 同义词:nullity Zero choice is the fastest route to low quality .零选择是通向低质量的最快捷路线。
n. 地带；地区；[体]联防 vi. 分成区 vt. 使分成地带；环绕 同义词:region, area, section, corner, quarter, environ, circle round Germany , however , is not the whole zone .但是，德国并不是整个欧元区。
